story:
We successfully reached our stretch goal! That means that not only is CHAOS THEORY Vol. 2 happening, but it will receive a super high quality print run, and our backers will get a BONUS DIGITAL COMIC by DJ Wooldridge's Only Stupid Answers co-host Sam Bashor!

Not only that, but our backers will vote on the setting, plot, and villains of the Bonus Comic's story! Stay tuned for more updates!

In a world where unchecked science has not only resulted in a relentless zombie plague, but been used to resurrect dinosaurs back from extinction, super-scientist Persy, sarcastic gear head Max, and ultimate survivalist Zora fight for humanity’s future as the ultimate battle between the undead and the extinct takes them from the desolate remains of the United States to outer space and beyond! 

("Our Heroes" - All Original Concept Art by Pietro Antognioni)

CHAOS THEORY Vol. 2 is a rollercoaster ride filled with non-stop adventure and intense action! A bombastic blend of Dawn of the Dead and Jurassic Park with some Mad Max, Aliens, Army of Darkness, and Escape from New York thrown in for good measure. It's jam-packed with enough exciting twists and turns to fuel several major blockbusters, because everything is possible in the world of CHAOS THEORY!

("Dino-Raiders" - Chaos Theory Vol. 2: Issue #1)


✘ THE STORY SO FAR... The creation of the first volume of CHAOS THEORY was a wild adventure! From an exciting crowdfunding campaign, to the self-published one-shot hitting the shelves of over 40 comic shops across the U.S. for a second and even a third printing! Now, the goal of this campaign is to continue the adventures of Max, Zora, and Persy in a new graphic novel with bigger adventure, bolder action, and weirder monsters!

✘ WE NEED YOU... to make the next chaotic chapter possible! CHAOS THEORY Vol. 2 is already well into production, and is 100% creator owned, which means no publisher financing. Your contribution to this project will not only make Volume 2 possible, it gives you an opportunity to receive crazy perks that are exclusive to this campaign! 

✘ THE CREATORS! This bold monster mash-up is brought to you by a dedicated group of passionate professionals. It's written and conceived by DJ Wooldridge (co-creator of the hit Only Stupid Answers podcast) with luscious art by dedicated up-and-comer Pietro Antognioni, colors by Lisa Moore (Adventure Time, Darkwing Duck), letters by Taylor Esposito (New Suicide Squad, Constantine), and amazing covers by Tom Neely (The Humans, Henry & Glenn Forever). This crazy collective of creators is dedicated to giving you the wildest comic book adventure possible!

("Max's New Ride" - Chaos Theory Vol. 2: Issue #1)

☣THE COMIC! You can get CHAOS THEORY Vol. 2 in both digital and physical softcover formats, with full color pages stuffed with zombie-on-dinosaur-on-alien action for you to enjoy! All physical copies will have an IndieGoGo EXCLUSIVE Cover, and will be SIGNED by the writer!

(All contributions to a perk that's $150 or more will receive 2 copies of Volume 2!)

☣IN CASE YOU MISSED IT! New to CHAOS THEORY? You can also get a digital or a physical softcover copy of CHAOS THEORY Vol. 1 and join the journey from the beginning. This is the oversized one-shot that started it all! All physical copies will have a Limited Edition Cover and will be SIGNED by the writer!

(All contributions to a perk that's $150 or more will receive 2 copies of Volume 1, the Limited Edition black-and-white cover and the Deluxe Edition which features a bonus short story!)

 ☣THE CHOICE IS YOURS! You can get exclusive SIGNED PRINTS from amazing artists such as Darick Robertson (Happy!, The Boys, Transmetropolitan) and Brittney Williams (Patsy Walker AKA Hellcat, Goldie Vance)!

☣ONLY STUPID ANSWERS FANS! Not able to attend the 100th Episode Live Event for Only Stupid Answers (the podcast that writer DJ Wooldridge co-hosts with Sam Bashor)? Well now you can get the special OSA 100 Event Poster SIGNED by DJ, Sam, Steve Zaragoza, Mike Falzone, Maude Garrett, and Roxy Striar, while still supporting CHAOS THEORY!

☣COLLECT IT ALL! Why choose when you can have it all? With the Mesozoic Pack and up you can collect all the prints along with a SIGNED PRINT from our cover artists Tom Neely (The Humans, Henry & Glenn Forever), while the Complete Mesozoic Pack and up includes all that along with the SIGNED OSA 100 Event Poster and MORE! PLUS, there are exclusive TRADING CARDS and plenty of other rewards that are unique to specific tiers, like our Team Zombie or Team Dinosaur STICKERS. Pay close attention when picking your reward so you get exactly what you want! 

 ☣BE IN THE COMIC! You can also become part of the adventure... literally! The Paleogne,  Neogene, and Quaternary Packs offer opportunities to be drawn into the comic as a character, either as a zombie, a survivor, or a "legendary warrior". That last one is top secret and considered a SPOILER, but you'll be an important part of the comic's finale and will even receive a UNIQUE PRINT of your character!

☣OWN ORIGINAL COVER ART! Want an original piece of the creation of this comic all for your own? With the Cenozoic and Xenozoic Packs you can get one of Tom Neely's original cover designs! These measure 15x20", are ink on archival watercolor paper, signed, dated, and ONE OF A KIND! Also, with the Xenozoic Pack, not only will you receive original cover art but you will be DRAWN INTO THAT COVER which will be used for the retail edition of the comic!

("Great Escape" - Chaos Theory Vol. 2: Issue #2)

✘ ARE THERE RISKS? There are always challenges with any creative endeavor like this, especially when outside factors such as printing companies and the postal service are taken into consideration. Things don't always go as planned. Heck, the planet could explode Krypton-style tomorrow!

That said, creator DJ Wooldridge has previously run two successful crowdfunding campaigns, for a short film and Volume 1 of this comic series. Not only that, but the the comic itself, and various other rewards, are already well into production and are being brought to you by a dedicated team of creators with years of experience. We'll do all we can to get this comic and the corresponding rewards into your happy hands, and have the track record to back that up!

NOTE: If you contribute to this project you acknowledge that the comic and any other perks you receive come "as is", and may not look exactly as presented here as some designs may change over the due course of production. There are no refunds once the campaign ends and the project is successfully funded. However, we're confident that you will be satisfied with the final product.

We're applying all the valuable lessons we've learned from past campaigns to make sure that this is another enjoyable experience for the contributors to this project!

✘ WHERE WILL THE MONEY GO? Good question! Here's a sexy graph to show you how the funding for this campaign will be used. 

✘ HAVE MORE QUESTIONS? You can contact us at ChaosTheoryCampaign@gmail.com!

 

Here's a SNEAK PEEK at the first 5 pages of CHAOS THEORY Volume 2, to give you a taste of the adventure to come! We hope you enjoy it, and thanks again for supporting CHAOS THEORY, and independent comics!

story:
Kamen America, Volume 3, continues the saga of our heroine as she pursues the identify of her arch nemesis. Charlotte Vanders is a fashionista-turned-reluctant hero who must balance her rising stardom against a world whose principles run contrary to her own: and that's on top of her equally super-human rivals who want to take her down a notch!

  • Created by Timothy Lim and Mark Pellegrini 
  • Art, colors, and lettering by Timothy Lim
  • Written by Mark Pellegrini
  • First published by Iconic Comics 
  • Made and Printed in the USA

A sleeper independent hit that debuted in the spring of 2020, Kamen America has grossed more than $150,000 between 2 volumes and 2 platforms and is the flagship character of the imprint company Iconic Comics. It has since appeared on store shelves in a shortened form courtesy of independent publishing company Antarctic Press.

When we last left off in Volume 2, the Kamen Corps was squaring away with the triple threat of Machiavellian agent Niro Lansky, the mud-manipulating Vermillion Masquerade, and the arrogant, armored Kamen U.N. Having successfully teamed up to defeat the rampaging kaiju O-Scar, the Kamen Corps sets their eyes on expanding their grassroots support while looking for a way to take down Vermillion Masquerade for good!

Vermillion Masquerade, Lansky and Kamen U.N. form an alliance in a final bid to ruin the Kamen Corps for good! But an unexpected ally comes to their rescue at the last minute-- will Kamen America and her newfound friends save the day and uncover the secret of Vermillion? And who will emerge victorious in the final showdown between Kamen America and Kamen U.N? Find out in the latest volume of the Kamen America saga!

HARDCOVER & ADD-ON INSTRUCTIONS

We are pleased to have upgraded our 2021 lineup of books to a new hardcover stock, beginning with Volume 3! This new standard feature will ensure the durability and protection of our work, and we are happy to offer this to our loyal readers at no extra cost with this volume. We are also offering premium hardcover reprints of Volume 1 and Volume 2: great for new readers and perfect for those just wanting to complete their collection. Both feature brand new cover art by Hibren!

ADD-ONS are AVAILABLE AT CHECKOUT!

  • To add on Volume 1, 2, the CD, or the lenticular poster, simply pledge to a tier and checkout. You will then have the option to add on items before processing your order

 

MASKS

We are pleased to introduce our first line of WEARABLE and DISPLAYABLE leather masks! Made of 100% pure American leather in the heart of Texas, these are one-size fits all masks with soft leather ribbon ties to secure them onto the face. The back of each mask is left unpainted and smooth to allow for breathability while wearing!

ACRYLIC STANDEE

Our best selling acrylic standees are back, this time featuring the current Kamen Corps roster! Art by Timothy Lim and GENZOMAN!

 

ORIGINAL ART

The very first original art created for KAMEN AMERICA was done by our friend Matthew Weldon: he's back, this time providing you with original, unique art on shikishi board! The highest perk comes with original art on a bigger board, but it's the same great Matthew Weldon art.

KAMEN AMERICA STATUE

We've created these unique hand-painted statues exclusive to our campaign! Each one is digitally sculpted, printed, sanded, varnished and hand painted: this makes them one-of-a-kind maquettes where no two are exactly alike. Each one will come in extremely secure packing and, it being the highest tier, will come with most of the perks associated with the other pledges!

MORE ADD-ONS

We are happy to be able to offer add-ons now on Kickstarter thanks to their beta testing program! In addition to the hardcover reprints of Volume 1 and Volume 2, we are also offering an 11x17 lenticular poster with art by Shikari Shambu: depending on where you are viewing it, you will Kamen America's face in various stages of transformation! We are also offering the official theme song of Kamen America, Velvet Thunder, as a physical CD album. Each copy is signed by Sheilava and comes with an exclusive variant sleeve with art by Man Tsang: it contains 3 songs, including the instrumental and lyrics version of Velvet Thunder and an unused track by composer Doug Garrett!

 

IMPORTANT: FULFILLMENT POLICIES and PRACTICES

We are proud of our 100% fulfillment rate and are committed to providing quality customer service and an expedient delivery: all of our books are 100% complete at the time of a campaign launch and the majority of our physical offerings are also in-hand. Every package comes with standard tracking, e-mailed to you the moment the label is printed. To ensure best-practices as far as fulfillment is concerned, we ask that you read this VERY CAREFULLY before ordering.

DIGITAL DOWNLOADS

Digital files are sent out 24 hours after we receive our funding, which is typically 14-17 days after the last day of the campaign. These are e-mailed to the address on file and are valid for 7 days. Any extension of this is subjective. 

We will not be mailing out links after 31 days. 

No questions asked, no extensions past this point.

To ensure that you receive the necessary e-mails that contain these links, DO NOT block, filter, or unsubscribe ICONIC COMICS, KAMEN AMERICA, WETRANSFER, or ORANGEDOX. 

New to this year is a tracking function that we have backstage that allows us to see download activity based on the e-mail addresses that the link is sent to. We reserve the right to terminate any current or future download ability based on unusual spikes in downloads coming from certain e-mail address. We are aware that people like to enjoy books on multiple devices, but it is at our discretion to evaluate individually any cases that seem to suggest piracy or link sharing.

SHIPPING

All physical items come with an automatically generated tracking number e-mailed to you once the label is printed. We will offer replacements for any lost or damaged item. We will NOT offer refunds / replacements for books that we track as "DELIVERED", as it is your word against ours that any form of theft has occurred. Should this happen, please file a complaint with your local UPS / USPS / FEDEX provider.

We are not responsible for missing parcels after 3 months from the day they are sent out: that is when tracking information is no longer available to us, and it becomes the customer's word against our fulfillment that a package was not sent. Please read our fulfillment policies very carefully so that there is no confusion later on.

Risks and challenges

We have minimized risks over the last 2 years of crowdfunding by being very transparent with our policies and fulfillment procedures on our campaign pages. We have a dedicated fulfillment team that is 100% committed to the speedy delivery of campaign perks. Our books are 100% finished before launching our pre-order campaigns, meaning you won't be waiting several months or years for your orders: we deliver early or on-time, provided that your surveys are filled out expediently upon the campaign closing.

story:
The Johnny Phantasm Action Figure!

Your friendly neighborhood supernatural gangster has taken the leap from the comic book pages into the toy package!

Collectible, fun, and just in time for the holidays, these 4 inch retro style figures are sure to be a HIT!

Part gangster, part demon! 

Johnny Phantasm was once New Detroit’s premier hitman. Now imbued with enhanced supernatural powers, Johnny has his sights set on the city’s top spot! If you’re going to take people out on your way up the ladder, you might as well do it in style! 




 


 

 

Many indie forces, in toys and comics, have come together to bring you this super rad campaign: Riot Press Productions™, Glyos™, Toy Pizza™, and Alterna Comics™. This project would not be possible without their hard work, creativity and dedication.

Available in his classic 1977 PURPLE suit, his 1985 Halloween BLACK attire, or a super cool GLOW-IN-THE DARK-Japanese variant! Each Glyos™ figure features 8 points of articulation, twin .45 pistols, removable holster, and interchangeable head with hat! 

All figures will feature the Glyos™ joint system. 

 

 

 

 

 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Glyos™ System is a peg and socket system. Created by Onell Design, this joint system is only made available to Glyos™. 

Each figure is housed in breathtaking clamshell packaging, featuring the fantastic artwork of Johnny Phantasm co-creator Patrick Thomas Parnell! A spectacular addition for both the toy collector and the comic book enthusiast!

There is even a LIMITED EDITION ashcan comic book, created specifically for the launch of our inaugural toy campaign!

 SCARLET HEART: SILENT FRIGHT will knock even Santa’s boots off!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The original cover from Scarlet Heart : Silent Fright 1989

 

Creative Team

Evan K. Pozios is a professional writer and attorney from Detroit, MI. Most notably, Evan is the creator of Time Grunts, published by Caliber Comics.

 

Patrick Thomas Parnell is a professional illustrator and college instructor from Sarasota, FL. Patrick has worked on projects such as Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, Mega Man and Sonic the Hedgehog. 

 

Edited by Dr. Andrea Lorenzo Molinari (Scout Comics, Caliber Caliber), writer of The Shepherd (Caliber Comics). 

 

Special thanks to our partners in this campaign: Alterna Comics™, Toy Pizza™, and Glyos™. This project would not be possible without their hard work, creativity and dedication.

 

Note: Adult Collectibles. These items are not Toys. Ages 15+ Only. 

M.O.F.O.s are © & ™ 2020 Most Management, LLC. All Rights Reserved.

Knights of the Slice, Toy Pizza are © & ™ 2020 Eerie Theory Entertainment, Inc. All Rights Reserved.

Glyos is ® & ™ 2020 Onell Design, All Rights Reserved.

Johnny Phantasm are ™ 2020 Riot Press Productions, LLC. All Rights Reserved.
story_txt: The Johnny Phantasm Action Figure!Your friendly neighborhood supernatural gangster has taken the leap from the comic book pages into the toy package!Collectible, fun, and just in time for the holidays, these 4 inch retro style figures are sure to be a HIT!Part gangster, part demon! Johnny Phantasm was once New Detroit’s premier hitman. Now imbued with enhanced supernatural powers, Johnny has his sights set on the city’s top spot! If you’re going to take people out on your way up the ladder, you might as well do it in style!    Many indie forces, in toys and comics, have come together to bring you this super rad campaign: Riot Press Productions™, Glyos™, Toy Pizza™, and Alterna Comics™. This project would not be possible without their hard work, creativity and dedication.Available in his classic 1977 PURPLE suit, his 1985 Halloween BLACK attire, or a super cool GLOW-IN-THE DARK-Japanese variant! Each Glyos™ figure features 8 points of articulation, twin .45 pistols, removable holster, and interchangeable head with hat! All figures will feature the Glyos™ joint system.      ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------The Glyos™ System is a peg and socket system. Created by Onell Design, this joint system is only made available to Glyos™. Each figure is housed in breathtaking clamshell packaging, featuring the fantastic artwork of Johnny Phantasm co-creator Patrick Thomas Parnell! A spectacular addition for both the toy collector and the comic book enthusiast!There is even a LIMITED EDITION ashcan comic book, created specifically for the launch of our inaugural toy campaign! SCARLET HEART: SILENT FRIGHT will knock even Santa’s boots off!----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------The original cover from Scarlet Heart : Silent Fright 1989 Creative TeamEvan K. Pozios is a professional writer and attorney from Detroit, MI. Most notably, Evan is the creator of Time Grunts, published by Caliber Comics. Patrick Thomas Parnell is a professional illustrator and college instructor from Sarasota, FL. Patrick has worked on projects such as Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, Mega Man and Sonic the Hedgehog.  Edited by Dr. Andrea Lorenzo Molinari (Scout Comics, Caliber Caliber), writer of The Shepherd (Caliber Comics).  Special thanks to our partners in this campaign: Alterna Comics™, Toy Pizza™, and Glyos™. This project would not be possible without their hard work, creativity and dedication. Note: Adult Collectibles. These items are not Toys. Ages 15+ Only. M.O.F.O.s are © & ™ 2020 Most Management, LLC. All Rights Reserved.Knights of the Slice, Toy Pizza are © & ™ 2020 Eerie Theory Entertainment, Inc. All Rights Reserved.Glyos is ® & ™ 2020 Onell Design, All Rights Reserved.Johnny Phantasm are ™ 2020 Riot Press Productions, LLC. All Rights Reserved.

story:
Hello. My name is Rob Shaffer. I am a long-time fantasy illustrator. I have done work with both large and small press roleplaying companies and have completed concept work for video games.

This book is a passion project for me. When I was younger, I played tabletop roleplaying games. Many of these games had amazing books about the monsters and denizens of fantasy worlds. They mostly were printed in black and white. As a younger person, I used to draw and color the pictures from those books. The art taught me a lot about drawing and creating my own creatures. Eventually, this became one of the many important influences in my art journey. I want to replicate that experience for others with this book. I hope you all enjoy coloring and starting your art journey from here.

 

NEW COVER ANNOUNCED! 

Check it out!

 

 

 

I hope with this campaign we will make this coloring book the most successful on indie go go! This campaign will help fund the last 25 drawings and give many backers the opportunity to be featured in the book or receive a piece of original art designed by them! I want as many backers as possible to join me in the creative process.

 

To cover the basics

We are hoping to raise $4000. With over 75 images already done, this figure will cover the cost of finishing the book and designing the cover. I have successfully published a coloring book before and know the ins and outs of taking up a campaign such as this. Once the $4000 threshold is met, then the stretch goals kick in.

If this book goes on to do really well, the profits will go on to fund more books. I have 2 others already finished and plans for 10 more! Think of this as getting in on the ground floor on the creation of some amazing coloring books!

 

What you get

At the base level of $20 + shipping you will receive a HUGE coloring book. I will also be personally signing each book. As stretch goals are unlocked, the pot is sweetened!

 

Stretch Goals

 

$8,000- 8.5 X 11 inch Color print of the new cover!

 

$10,000- THREE 8.5 X 11 inch color by numbers prints with exclusive art.

 

$15,000 – The book goes up 10 pages! New art drawn with the help of some guest artists! (to be named later)

 

$20,000 – A deck of 52 custom Playing cards featuring all new art!

 

$30,000 – The book goes up 10 more pages! New art drawn with the help of some guest artists! (to be named later)

 

$50,000 – Puzzle of the new front cover! (size to be announced later)

 

$75,000 – ???

 

The rest of the tiers are great ways to get original art and other perks.

 

Risks and Challenges

Apart from meeting the funding goal I don't see many. But there are always things that CAN happen. I am shooting for a JUNE 2019 release. This could be pushed back if the campaign does exceedingly well. More stretch goals met means more items to produce and ship. I do believe this is more than enough time to still meet the ship date.

 

The art is 75% done and the rest is prepared to be finished up. Some pieces will be contingent on supporter feedback. This can cause slight delays.

 

Shipping can be an issue, but all precautions are being taken to lessen that impact.

 

Please share and spread the word!

story:
Overview

THE LOST PAGES is a 68 page fully colored Graphic Novel
The first book in an epic connected universe of new Heroes. When a mystical book finds its way into the hands of a homeless man, stories lost to time of Heroes from different eras, backgrounds and genres are revealed. Destined to one day come together and write the end of the world.

Paired with our supplemental BONUS COMIC 52 supplmental book containing a 4 page short story for every character that will expand with stretch goals, you will get the most stories and content for the whole universe. Don't miss our on all the reading material.

ATTENTION-ALL BOOKS ARE NOW SHIPPING! Order today and your book will on its way!
STRETCH GOALS MAY RUN OUT

New-WRAP AROUND COVER by John Joe Ball. For the BONUS COMIC

Cover by The Legendary SIMON BISLEY (Lobo, Batman Judgement on Gotham, ABC Warriors)

The hobo tells stories of the heroes in The Book of Lost Pages!
Get drawn into the book as a homeless character, amazed by these tales.
Art: Maxi Dall'O, Colors: Steve Cannon

The Silhouette -  Modern day super natural vigilante, 

Art:  Maxi Dall'O  in black/white and red.

A look into a city of sin through the eyes of The Silhouette.

interior cover by Joe Ball


WILDCARD - ancient mage, balancing myths with man. Art: John Joe Ball, Colors: Eugene Betivu.

Being immortal, leads Wildcard through time, in the tale "Staccato at Sea" he finds himself in the height of piracy, sailing the seas, when his crew succumbs to the song of the horrific Sirens.

Wildcard Double page spread for sale with its own perk! Own this original Black and white art made up of 2 pages!

INTERIOR COVER ART [SOLD] by Maria "The Wolf" Lopez

CRIMSTONE- Power lifter, Taz Stone reunites with her long lost imaginary friend after tragedy is thrust into her life.

Crims bombastic ultra-violent attitude helps her become a crime fighter. Art: Maria "The Wolf" Lopez Colors: Steve Cannon

THE MASQUERADE- 1930s pulp crime fighter with a fondness for the theatrics. Art and Colors: Allen Alonzo

 

The master of disguise speaks in Shakespearean language, rhyming in the face of danger as he cleans up the mob.

Every Physical Backer will be getting 8 Trading cards, plus Backers who ordered during the first week will get the EXCLUSIVE SILHOUETTE CARD by Andrew Huerta. And Mailinglist members will get the final Artist Jam Card.

COMPLETION
Pages Done-66
Pages waiting for colors- 1
Pages being drawn- 3

BONUS COMIC COMPLETE

 

 

MYTHS OF THE LOST PAGES
GROWING BONUS COMIC

This companion book contains 4 page short stories for the heroes of The Lost Pages. Action packed looks into each characters life. As we hit more stretch goals we add MORE stories to this book!  More Stories of NEW HEROES within the Lost Pages Universe.

MASQUERADE short. (Briane Andan). To be Colored


CRIMSOTNE Bar Brawl Short (Maria The Wolf)

WildCard vs. Anubis (maxi Dall'O)

-THE PIANIST (Brandon Diaz)-Unlocked!

-THE PEOPLE Layouts by EJ Morges art by Avery Butterworth - UNLOCKED

COVER FOR SALE^

-VANE art by SIM Pothier - UNLOCKED

-DRIFT LEGEND by Keung Lee- UNLOCKED


-MATTE BLACK by Illustrator Monk-UNLOCKED 




Tales of the worlds greatest heroes, recanted from the ancient Book of Lost Pages by a homeless man. As the hobo tells these stories to passers by, we are introduced to the ones that keep the world balanced. The fight between good and evil has many soldiers, from different eras and walks of life. Ghostly vigilantes, immortal mages, psycho brawler babes, and masked masters of disguise. As the stories of these heroes flow on, their paths will cross, building the force that this universe will need in preparation to the end of the book. 

The Diaz brothers bring you a 60 page fully colored graphic novel that highlights the new heroes of their connected universe. Each hero's story being drawn by a different artist that embodies the theme and era of that character.


Along with the 4 chapter book, we have a "Growing"  Bonus Comic, containing action packed short stories for our heroes. This book will grow when we hit certain stretch goal to over 30 pages and adding new characters to the universe, with their first appearances you wont want to
miss out on.

$4,000-MASQUERADE Paper Mask for all backers!-UNLOCKED
$5,000- Bookmark by Brandon Diaz for all backers!-UNLOCKED
$8,000- BlockHedz for all backers!-UNLOCKED
$10,000- Wildcard Trading card-UNLOCKED
$11,000- Crimstone Trading Card by DAN FRAGA-UNLOCKED
$12,000- MASQUERADE Trading Card by PASSION4DRAWING-UNLOCKED
$13,500- Add THE PIANIST 4 page short story to BONUS COMIC by Brandon Diaz +
PIANIST Trading Card by DoodleBags!-UNLOCKED
$15,000- Add THE PEOPLE 4 page short story to BONUS COMIC by EJ MORGES + THE PEOPLE Trading Card by Avery Buttersworth!  UNLOCKED
$17,000- Add VANE 4 page short story to BONUS COMIC by SIM POTHIER + VANE Trading Card by PRESTON ACEVADO! UNLOCKED
$20,000- Add DRIFT LEGEND 4 page short story to BONUS COMIC art by KEUNG LEE + DRIFT LEGEND Trading Card by MANGAKA ODY! - UNLOCKED
$25,000- Add MATTE BLACK 4 page short story to BONUS COMIC art by ILLUSTRATOR MONK + Trading Card by (TBA)!-UNLOCKED
More to come!

FOR ALL PHYSICAL BACKERS
100 BACKERS- Masquerade Paper mask-UNLOCKED
200 BACKERS- Lost Pages Post Card-UNLOCKED
250 BACKERS- MP3 of The Lost Pages Theme song for all backers-UNLOCKED

 


 

Phillip Diaz- Writer and creator

Brandon Diaz- Creator (The Pianitst 4pg Bonus Comic Artist)
Simon Bisley-Cover
Adam Brown-Cover Colors
Maxi Dall'O- (Jack Irons) Artist of THE SILHOUETTE and THE HOBO (Wildcard and Silhouette 4pg Bonus Comic)

TRADING CARDS

Matt Yackey- CRIMSTONE (Colors)

story:
Saving the World: Number Two

Written and Illustrated by Tonimole

Full color, high gloss cover by Sashi. Back cover by Ryan Foust

32 page Black and White interiors

STW is a super hero comicbook that takes inspiration from the rich history of super hero comics, and combines it with the sensibilities of 90's underground comix. It's a sexy, funny, action packed, adventure all seen through the eye's of two 19 year old girls who find themselves thrust into a world of capes and super villains. Issue one introduced you to Kierra and Nora who meet on the streets of Maplewood City. Issue Two see's our heroes facing off with their first super villain. Roger! Can they outwit him? Can they out hit him? Will Kierra smash him with a car? Maybe.?.

On October 3rd at 10:30 PM the National Astronomical Detection Agency (NADA) detected a massive global disturbance. Though the disruption lasted mere seconds it's effects would be immediately felt by hundreds of thousands of people, and change life on earth forever.

All across the globe people reported strange mutations, some as simple as a sixth finger, or as outlandish as our hero Kierra who developed unlimited super strength. This is where our story begins. In the early days of a world frantically trying to make sense of the unimaginable. The rise of a world of god's and monsters, and the heroes that protect it.

Kierra: By day, Kierra is the mild mannered cashier at Big Burger. By night she’s an awkward ginger nerd hanging out at Hall of Legends comics and collectibles. That is till one night her life takes a dramatic turn for the heroic!

Nora: As a wanna-be fashion designer, and aimless college drop out Nora lives with her boyfriend while struggling to find her place in the world. However, nothing cures uncertainty like a heaping helping of super powers.

 

STRETCH GOALS, BABY!!!

STANDARD COVER by Sashi

INDIEGOGO EXCLUSIVE “3.0 NSFW VARIANT” by Tonicmole

story:
After successfully funding the Deborah Daring Detective series finale, Robbie MacK and the creative crew at Vigilante Comix are on Indiegogo offering people that missed the Kickstarter campaign a chance to pre-order the the graphic novel, as well as the opportunity to order other issue(s) from the Vigilante Comix library!

Issue 6 will be a 20 page, full-color comic of standard dimensions available digitally and in print. The graphic novel will also be available digitally and as a 132 pg hard cover book.  All back issues will be available in this campaign, as well as a wide variety of awesome Add-On perks, such as pinups, posters, trading cards, stickers, t-shirts and custom art. We are even offering a variant cover to issue 6 that is exclusive to this campaign!

The Deborah Daring series has been Robbie MacK’s passion project for the last four years and he is absolutely thrilled to see it come to fruition! As the writer and editor for the series, Rob enlisted some top-indie talent from around the world to bring this epic tale to life. The main character was inspired by his wife and the story is a modern take on the private detective genre with a uniquely Canadian spin. If you like sexy, tough, yet vulnerable female characters in a suspenseful story packed with action, then this is the comic series for you! By ordering one of the Vigilante Comics books, not only will you get a great comic/graphic novel, you’ll also be helping Robbie MacK and the creative crew at Vigilante Comix keep doing what we love, which is creating comics!

Deborah Daring is the story about a perky paralegal with a military background and a taste for trouble. Deb started moonlighting as a private investigator, because she was getting bored to death with her work at the office. Her investigations hadn’t been very exciting until recently, when she took on a strange case from a mystery client. Now she's got all the intrigue and excitement she can handle! Fortunately, she's got the assistance of police officer, Jacques Brousseau, who was her army buddy in Afghanistan. Soon the two of them find themselves embroiled in a case involving the Russian Mafia and corruption too close to home. If that wasn't enough to worry about, Deb keeps having nightmares about her service time in Afghanistan and they're starting to take a toll on her relationship with her boyfriend, Ray. Can Deb solve the case for her client, not get killed by a Russian assassin and keep her relationship together? Join Deb as she battles the bad guys, unravels her first big mystery and gradually becomes a true DETECTIVE!

 Click HERE to download PDF previews of issues 1-3 from Dropbox.

You can also get a recap of the story so far by watching the video below.

Here's a sneak peek at a double-page spread fight scene from issue 6, where Deb fights her nemesis, Danuta!

After running Danuta off the road outside Toronto, Deb finally has a chance to get some answers and give her a good old fashioned ASS KICKIN'... but Danuta won't go down that easy!
 

The creative crew at Vigilante Comix has come together like never before to produce the best quality campaign perks for you, our valued backers!
story_txt:
After successfully funding the Deborah Daring Detective series finale, Robbie MacK and the creative crew at Vigilante Comix are on Indiegogo offering people that missed the Kickstarter campaign a chance to pre-order the the graphic novel, as well as the opportunity to order other issue(s) from the Vigilante Comix library!Issue 6 will be a 20 page, full-color comic of standard dimensions available digitally and in print. The graphic novel will also be available digitally and as a 132 pg hard cover book.  All back issues will be available in this campaign, as well as a wide variety of awesome Add-On perks, such as pinups, posters, trading cards, stickers, t-shirts and custom art. We are even offering a variant cover to issue 6 that is exclusive to this campaign!The Deborah Daring series has been Robbie MacK’s passion project for the last four years and he is absolutely thrilled to see it come to fruition! As the writer and editor for the series, Rob enlisted some top-indie talent from around the world to bring this epic tale to life. The main character was inspired by his wife and the story is a modern take on the private detective genre with a uniquely Canadian spin. If you like sexy, tough, yet vulnerable female characters in a suspenseful story packed with action, then this is the comic series for you! By ordering one of the Vigilante Comics books, not only will you get a great comic/graphic novel, you’ll also be helping Robbie MacK and the creative crew at Vigilante Comix keep doing what we love, which is creating comics!Deborah Daring is the story about a perky paralegal with a military background and a taste for trouble. Deb started moonlighting as a private investigator, because she was getting bored to death with her work at the office. Her investigations hadn’t been very exciting until recently, when she took on a strange case from a mystery client. Now she's got all the intrigue and excitement she can handle! Fortunately, she's got the assistance of police officer, Jacques Brousseau, who was her army buddy in Afghanistan. Soon the two of them find themselves embroiled in a case involving the Russian Mafia and corruption too close to home. If that wasn't enough to worry about, Deb keeps having nightmares about her service time in Afghanistan and they're starting to take a toll on her relationship with her boyfriend, Ray. Can Deb solve the case for her client, not get killed by a Russian assassin and keep her relationship together? Join Deb as she battles the bad guys, unravels her first big mystery and gradually becomes a true DETECTIVE! Click HERE to download PDF previews of issues 1-3 from Dropbox.You can also get a recap of the story so far by watching the video below.

Here's a sneak peek at a double-page spread fight scene from issue 6, where Deb fights her nemesis, Danuta!

After running Danuta off the road outside Toronto, Deb finally has a chance to get some answers and give her a good old fashioned ASS KICKIN'... but Danuta won't go down that easy! 

The creative crew at Vigilante Comix has come together like never before to produce the best quality campaign perks for you, our valued backers!

story:
Story

An illegal genetic research lab was set up on a remote planet. But after the corporation in charge came under investigation by officials on Earth, all communications were cut off and the colonist abandoned, leaving them marooned on a world with harsh conditions and limited natural resources.

Seventy years later, the outlaw Sunday Childs, born into this world, struggles to survive the apocalyptic landscape populated by warring factions and escaped genetic experiments.  Sunday's luck will change for the better or the worse when she is sent on an assassination mission by the planet's ancient ruler know as the Mother.

What Are You Backing

  • A post-apocalyptic sci-fi comic
  • Third issue in a five issue mini series
  • The comic is 32 pages

Preview

  Read the first 10 pages of issue 1

 Rewards

All physical backers get this print for FREE if they back within the first 24 hours of launch. 

Creators

Joshua Metzger

Writes the crime comics Punch Drunk (Arcana Comics),  Metzger and Pawlak Presents: Villain (Evoluzione Publishing) and Le Fay (No Sleep).

Carlos Nieto

Carlos Nieto is a comic artist and illustrator from Madrid, Spain. He graduated in Fine Arts from the Complutense University of Madrid. After some first experiences in the world of comics with several web-comics and fanzines, he published with a national publisher his first creator-owned comic-book called ‘Fated’. His international professional career in comic-books started with ‘Star Trek’ series for IDW Publishing. Since then, he have worked for several international publishers of different countries.

Besides that, Carlos works for advertising illustrations, character designs and and many more projects involved with drawing, illustration and sequential art process.

Finally, Carlos Nieto is a highly creative professional who has solid, clean and clear storytelling with excellent illustration skills. He is passionate about telling stories and he also enjoys working with other professional to create them!

Luis Antonio Delgado

Luis Antonio Delgado, colorist for the fan favorite series, Ghostbusters, was born in Mexico City in 1982, he discovered comic books at the age of eight with the “Dark Night over Metroplois” story, and never looked back. After studying Graphic Design in Mexico, he went to Halifax, Nova Scotia and studied Illustration before meeting his mentor Raúl Cruz back in Mexico in 2005. He followed Raúl’s steps and in 2007 went to San Diego Comic Con and met IDW editor, Tom Waltz. After months of uncertainty, he finally got the long awaited email that changed his life, Tom Waltz offered him a project coloring a 12-page story in Gene Simmons House of Horrors #3. Thirteen years, over a 100 comic books and half a dozen board games later he has worked on properties such as Ghostbusters, TMNT, Star Wars, Transformers, My Little Pony, Spider-Man, Batman, Superman, GI JOE, Archie, Sonic, Mega Man, Star Trek and more.

story:
ANDREW HUERTA PRESENTS: "SOVEREIGN"

SOVEREIGN is an action-adventure epic that takes place in the year 2516 M.E. (Machine Era). A post-apocalyptic future where advanced sentient machines known as The Grey, have laid waste to most of humanity and are draining the planet of it’s Eon-Energy. But the Earth resurrects it’s champion, the destroyer and waste layer... Sovereign. But Sovereign is no hero. He is a force of nature and once the Grey is destroyed, will humans be next?

 

THE CHARACTERS:


 



I wish I could ask for less money but $12,000 is the amount I need to make this happen. And I cut as many corners as possible to bring the costs down to something thats still realistic for making a book at a high quality at this size. About half the funds are going to the production of the content, I, Andrew Huerta , will be writing, penciling and inking. Joshua Perez will be on colors and a professional letterer will be lettering the book.

STRETCH GOALS:

$20,000 STRETCH GOAL: If we reach 20k, I will add 12 pages to SOVEREIGN #1 filled with behind the scene stuff like creator commentary, secret history, fan art and pinups! Bringing the total page count from 48 pages to a 64 page 1-Shot.

$30,000 STRETCH GOAL: ​If we reach 30k, I will upgrade the cover stock and interior pages to a higher quality stock and also ADD 8 MORE PAGES OF STORY, bringing the total page count from 64 pages to a whopping 72 page MONSTER 1-shot!

If at any time you have a question, you can find me on twitter @andrewhuerta93 or by email at thehuerta@yahoo.com. 

The book is fully scripted and I am 7 pages deep into the art. Pages will be worked on as the campaign runs and will be done ON TIME to ship.

story:
My name is Tonicmole, and I've been making Underground Comix for roughly 20 years. My passion for comics began as a child in the wake of DC's Crisis of Infinite Earth's. However, in my mid teens I discovered the amazing world of alternative comics such as The Crow, Ghost World, and the many works of R. Crumb. These comics inspired me to think outside the box, and beyond the big two. "Saving the World" is my love letter to everything comics. From Batman, to Johnny the Homicidal Maniac. You've NEVER read a super hero book like this.

SPECS:
32 pages

Color Cover by Illustrator Monk (100lb paper weight)

Back Color Cover by Ryan Foust

B/W interiors by Tonic (70lb paper weight)

Pinup by Tony Sizzle

Saddle Stitched



Kierra: By day, 19 year old Kierra is the mild mannered cashier at Big Burger. By night she’s an awkward ginger nerd hanging out at Hall of Legends comics and collectibles. That is till one night her life takes a dramatic turn for the heroic!

Nora: As a wanna-be fashion designer, and aimless college drop out Nora lives with her boyfriend while struggling to find her place in the world. However, nothing cures uncertainty like a heaping helping of super powers. 

On October 3rd at 10:30 PM the National Astronomical Detection Agency (NADA) detected a massive global disturbance. Though the disruption lasted mere seconds it's effects would be immediately felt by hundreds of thousands of people, and change life on earth forever.

All across the globe people reported strange mutations, some as simple as a sixth finger, or as outlandish as our hero Kierra who developed unlimited super strength. This is where our story begins. In the early days of a world frantically trying to make sense of the unimaginable. The rise of a world of god's and monsters, and the heroes that protect it.

I need your help! Saving the World is an on going series that I hope to see through to the end. To do that I'll need a jump start. The funds you contribute will go to not only the print costs and distribution of this issue, but to future issue's to insure the vast world of StW can be realized in all it's glory. 

At $700 we hit our first stretch goal which will give all backers of the physical edition an ashcan that expands the universe of Saving the World, with art by Peter Palmiotti, and Tony Sizzle. I am very excited to bring this to you, and hopefully with your help it can be done!

The comic is done and ready to go to print. Honestly, this thing is happening no matter what. However, the more we build right now, the brighter the future! 

As a comicbook artist I fully understand that sometimes money can be tight, but there's more ways you can help:

  • Share this campaign on social media! Tell your friends and family!
  • Really talk me up. Say stuff like "Tonicmole is a legend in the comic industry."
  • I mean really talk me up. Like, "Tonicmole's writing reminds me what it means to be a human being."
  • I mean really lay it on thick like "Tonicmole is a force of nature! He's like a hurricane of pure sexually charged imagination! He's a modern wordsmith, and master illustrator!"
  • Be so fanatical about my art online that it get's awkward. Like people start reporting your tweets for harassment. So fanatically obsessed that even I have to mute you. 
  • But seriously though, anything you can do to spread the word will be greatly appreciated!

story:
Missed Issue #1 on Kickstarter?

Now you can get your hands on Issue #0 and #1 right here

"Fans of Fantasy and independent comics can rejoice. Forbidden #0 sets the stage for a promising series". – Brokenfrontier.com

FORBIDDEN ISSUE #1 

(THE FOLLOW-UP TO ISSUE #0) 

Forbidden© 2021

 “I like the comic book! (Forbidden) and it's well written, I just got through reading it. Good start to the series!“? - Backer on Indiegogo

 

20 YEARS IN THE MAKING

WOW! I can't believe we are here...

Hello I am Samuel Vera. I am an indie Comic Creator and podcaster for "Catch Da Craze" . I have been creating my own comics since 2000. In fact, I first created and wrote Forbidden© in May of 2000.

"An Epic Masterpiece that is a MUST READ"! – Paul Dale Roberts

I self produced Forbidden© in 2005 with interior art by Artist Anibal Arroyo. With only two issues released and a dozen amazing Critic reviews, I found myself walking away from comics for 10 years. Several friends of mine persuaded me to finish the series and produce it independently. I took my time creating this world and I truly love this story. If you are a fan of Epic Fantasy stories, you will enjoy the journey I am about to take you on.

THE PREMISE

For centuries they've hidden, lost forever to the world. Buried beneath the confines of a curse cast upon the sins of their fathers. Now, one will challenge that very curse which has enslaved a people. Standing in opposition of a mighty ruler, a revered King, defying all that has been built to protect them. One man... one vision... one chance to escape the evil or risk destroying everything. Walk with me as I take you on a Journey into the Forbidden©.

An intriguing Fantasy setting with good strong dialogue". – Silverbulletcomicbooks

You will Learn about the Nocturnals and how they were cursed for centuries to remain underground.

You will learn about the legend that calls for the destruction of Nocron at the hands of the son of Voxe.

You will learn about Nocron and his quest for Global Dominance in the form of Billionaire David Hunter.

STOP! NO SPOILERS!

WHAT WILL YOU GET?

27 PAGES OF STORY ART IN ISSUE 1

AND ADDITIONAL 16 PAGES OF STORY ART IN ISSUE 0

 

PREVIEW PAGES ISSUE #0

PREVIEW PAGES ISSUE #1

ADD ONS

THE RACE TRADING CARDS ADD-ON

DARKNESS TRADING CARD ADD-ON

 

WHERE THE MONEY GOES

Every cent goes to the production of the book and to pay the colorist to complete the series. 

 

Risks & Challenges

Project is completed and ready to go. 

Once campaign is over and funded. All rewards will go out immediately. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to make a pledge, please share this campaign with friends and family.

story:
Call of the Void Presents: BLACKHART MANOR!

A training drill at a derelict manor spirals into a world of terror for a team of close-knit firefighters!

BLACKHART MANOR  is a self-contained 40 page BLACK & WHITE one-shot. The second volume to a series of interconnected pulp horror stories, featuring a new breed of "Lovecraftian" inspired monsters by Gilbert Deltrez & J.L. Giles. This particular story here is co-created with special guest, Marinus Reininga!

 

(BLACKHART MANOR - COVER A - MANSION)

(BLACKHART MANOR - COVER B - FIREFIGHTER PAINTING)

HORROR-ZINES

We are offering an affordable pro-quality comic book experience inspired by the Silver Age Creepy magazines from Warren Publishing, but featuring our new "Lovecraftian" breed of pulp horror in an 8.5" x 12" black & white magazine. 

Our mission is to bring you an immersive cinematic-style experience to your hands in a comic book format.

BLACKHART MANOR PREVIEW PAGES

Story by - G. Deltrez & M. Reininga            Art by - J.L. Giles

 

(PAGE 1)

(PAGE 2)

(PAGE 3)

(PAGE 4)

(PAGE 9)

(PAGE 10)

THE PERKS

 

 

The Team:

Gilbert Deltrez, creator of Under the Flesh, LAIR, PISTOLERA, and GALACTIC RODENTS of MAYHEM, is reuniting with his longtime friend and comic book artist extraordinaire, JL GILES, to bring you BLACKHART MANOR.

J.L. Giles has been drawing since childhood and broke into the indie scene with Under the Flesh, which led to him working with MARVEL comics, breathing life into such iconic characters as The Avengers, Spider-Man, Captain America, and Black Panther. He also provided the artwork to such notable MARVEL projects like the exclusive comic book for the SPIDERMAN: HOMECOMING (Blu-ray/DVD), and the THOR: RAGNAROK PRELUDE SERIES.

Marinus Reininga is a diehard comic book fan and lover of all things eldritch and Lovecraft. He approached CALL OF THE VOID Comics, to pitch his cool idea for a story. Gilbert Deltrez & J.L. Giles loved the idea so much, they fused it with their own sensibilities, evolving the story into something cooler, crazier and darker.

story:
Overview

BLACK TIGER: LEGACY OF FURY is a no-holds barred martial arts, super-powered adventure, in which brother battles sister with the fate of their city and family legacy at stake!

BLACK TIGER: LEGACY OF FURY is a riveting story with amazing art packed into a 172-page, full-color graphic novel featuring all six issues of the eponymous mini-series that until now has only been available in it's entirety digitally (https://beyondtimecomics.com/series/legacy-of-fury). This Indiegogo campaign is offering readers a chance to own a printed, limited edition collectible of this modern-day martial arts epic!

Production is complete and reward fulfillment is in process.

Black Tiger Rolls Deep

BLACK TIGER: LEGACY OF FURY is created and written by John Hervey (Troubleman), with pencils by Rod "Super" Luper (Star Wars: Outlander) and Diego Bernard (X-Men Gold, Witchblade), covers by Greg Horn (New Avengers, Justice League: The Rise of Arsenal, X-Men Universe), inks by Arne Starr (The Legion of Super-Heroes, Star Trek), JP Mayer (X-men Gold, Amazing Spider-man) and Chuck Drost (Supergirl Plus,Troubleman), colors by Robert Hawkins, Vinicius Townsend (G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero) and Beezzz Studios and letters by Marco Della Verde (Howard Lovecraft and the Undersea Kingdom). 

Seriously, only a $500 Campaign Goal?

The budget for pencils, inks, colors and letters for 158 interior comic book pages and 6 cover images is tens of thousands of dollars (with an emphasis on the "s" in "tens"). Fortunately the production has already been financed. The 140 pages that make up the current six-issue mini-series were financed as the issues were produced and the additional 18 pages that are being added to put a bow on this graphic novel were financed via a crowdfunding platform that is not to be named.

Your campaign dollars will go to printing, shipping and stretchy-stretch goodness... speaking of which...!

Time to Stretch Y'all!!

You've gotten us to our goal, now it's time to take this to next level with a 4-page, full-color, collage wraparound cover drawn by the man, the myth Rod "Super" Luper  with colors by the incomparable Artecide for all paper graphic novels!!! 

Oh, We Can Handle It! We're Professionals

Even for a graphic novel for which production is complete, it takes time to get the book printer ready, printed and received from the printer. Once we receive the books then the logistics of fulfilling the campaign perks is another job unto itself. But please don't fret, we have successfully fulfilled a crowdfunding campaign to the satisfaction of our backers in the past and in the process gained some valuable experience regarding the reward fulfillment process.

We will work diligently to fulfill all rewards in a timely fashion, but it's possible that printing or logistic issues could arise and the graphic novel could be delayed. In such a case, backers will be notified, given updates regarding the fulfillment process and new ETAs.

We understand the faith that backers have in us and this project so we will be transparent and communicative throughout the process, posting frequent and timely updates.

Other Ways You Can Help

You can also greatly help the campaign by:

Sharing the Indiegogo campaign on Facebook, Google+, Twitter, Instagram and any other social media site you are a part of. The more people we can attract to our cause, the better chance of a successful campaign, and the more people we can share our graphic novel with once made! For more info, check out www.beyondtimecomics.com!

Tell friends, family, everyone you know and everybody you meet!

Like and repost our Instagram posts, like and share our Facebook posts and Indiegogo updates and retweet our tweets... or even better, give us a shout out and include...
story_txt:
Overview
BLACK TIGER: LEGACY OF FURY is a no-holds barred martial arts, super-powered adventure, in which brother battles sister with the fate of their city and family legacy at stake!
BLACK TIGER: LEGACY OF FURY is a riveting story with amazing art packed into a 172-page, full-color graphic novel featuring all six issues of the eponymous mini-series that until now has only been available in it's entirety digitally (https://beyondtimecomics.com/series/legacy-of-fury). This Indiegogo campaign is offering readers a chance to own a printed, limited edition collectible of this modern-day martial arts epic!
Production is complete and reward fulfillment is in process.








Black Tiger Rolls Deep
BLACK TIGER: LEGACY OF FURY is created and written by John Hervey (Troubleman), with pencils by Rod "Super" Luper (Star Wars: Outlander) and Diego Bernard (X-Men Gold, Witchblade), covers by Greg Horn (New Avengers, Justice League: The Rise of Arsenal, X-Men Universe), inks by Arne Starr (The Legion of Super-Heroes, Star Trek), JP Mayer (X-men Gold, Amazing Spider-man) and Chuck Drost (Supergirl Plus,Troubleman), colors by Robert Hawkins, Vinicius Townsend (G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero) and Beezzz Studios and letters by Marco Della Verde (Howard Lovecraft and the Undersea Kingdom). 

Seriously, only a $500 Campaign Goal?
The budget for pencils, inks, colors and letters for 158 interior comic book pages and 6 cover images is tens of thousands of dollars (with an emphasis on the "s" in "tens"). Fortunately the production has already been financed. The 140 pages that make up the current six-issue mini-series were financed as the issues were produced and the additional 18 pages that are being added to put a bow on this graphic novel were financed via a crowdfunding platform that is not to be named.
Your campaign dollars will go to printing, shipping and stretchy-stretch goodness... speaking of which...!
Time to Stretch Y'all!!

You've gotten us to our goal, now it's time to take this to next level with a 4-page, full-color, collage wraparound cover drawn by the man, the myth Rod "Super" Luper  with colors by the incomparable Artecide for all paper graphic novels!!!

We will work diligently to fulfill all rewards in a timely fashion, but it's possible that printing or logistic issues could arise and the graphic novel could be delayed. In such a case, backers will be notified, given updates regarding the fulfillment process and new ETAs.
We understand the faith that backers have in us and this project so we will be transparent and communicative throughout the process, posting frequent and timely updates.

story:
In 2013-2014 I crowdfunded 3 issues of a comic called "Sinsationals"...

...it was the story of seven extraordinary women in an extraordinary world getting into adventures. I always loved the idea, but the comic didn't raise the funds I felt it needed to be sustainable so the only ones I did were issue #0,1 & 2.

THE GOAL FOR THIS CAMPAIGN

...is to compile those three comics into a trade paperback collection of sorts, including a variety of additional pinups, sketches and other assorted content in one book. It should be around 120 pages in length, possibly more. 

I will be adding a cover featuring brand new art of the Sinsationals characters.

story:
STRETCH GOALS

23k - Narwhal Sticker

25k - Narwhal Mafia Business Card

30k - Narwhal postcard print.

Follow my channel here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCk88i5ofuTBcT8IMOLPM30A?view_as=subscriber

 

 

A Matter of Survival

Foreign Agent is a 190 page graphic novel for teens and adults that follows two soldiers who force their way into a home.  There is a language barrier between the soldiers and the family that lives there.  They begin exchanging drawings in an attempt to communicate.  At this point the comic becomes a comic-within-a-comic, and I have 'cast' collaborators A.O.M. and Wayward Nerd to represent the art of the characters within the story.  

The nature of the relationships within the family, as well as the soldiers, isn't clear.  Tension mounts.  Communication is key, and all they have are drawings to exchange.  The soldiers are running from something.  Will their shaky deal with the family pan out or make things worse?

This book is a full affecting graphic novel, 190 pages.  It's already completely drawn.  Funding goes towards a print run and production on future releases from Narwhal Books, including Earthbound, part 2.

 

"Foreign Agent is so f*cking good.  It's like a good foreign film I can't turn off." - Von Klaus, creator of Monster M.D.

 

 

 

A focus on Perks

This campaign offers a softcover, a hardcover, and a sketchbook in any combination.  The sketchbook continues the installments of the sketchbook from the Earthbound campaign.  Including Nosferatu pt. 2, a full 20 page comic, and The Naked Samurai shorts.  

The Bundle tier will recieve all three items as well as a Special Thanks in the book and a sketch on the inside cover of the Hardcover book.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Foreign Agent is a very special book.  It's really intense, and only takes place in one house.  Comics don't have to do that, they can do whatever they want.  They can have a spaceship or a dragon come down.  The fact Foreign Agent is so focused and tense is part of the originality and fun that make it stand out. 

I've been working on this book over the past three years.  I used to sometimes get adrenaline rushes when I was working on it at certain moments in the story, just anticipating the moment of it's release and a first-time reader's experience.  Very glad that moment has come!  Thanks for checking it out.

 

Risks & Challenges

This will be my second big campaign!  It's actually my fifth campaign total.  I did several small ones before the previous Earthbound campaign.  So i know the ropes pretty good and can improve on that one.  However I'm still nervous enough about the whole process to the be extra careful and treat it with great respect.  Running an indiegogo is a big life changer.  Even just packing and shipping books is a big endeavor.  However, I've done it all, on a pretty big scale because Earthbound sold over 600 copies, so I'm ready!  I call it the Peter Simeti LIFE holla atcha boi

story:
NEW !!


AND - this just happened ...


********************************************

nce upon a time... an author named L. Frank Baum created one of the greatest masterpieces in American literature. An adventure tale so bold, with characters so endearing, that the Library of Congress declared it "America's greatest and best-loved homegrown fairytale."

This year marks the 100th anniversary of the death of L. Frank Baum, the author, and creator of the "Wizard of Oz". This trading card set offers fans a unique look at the original books and the silent films that happened BEFORE the famous 1939 MGM film.

Here's your chance to go 'behind the scenes' and meet the author, the artists, the stars of the silent films, and more.

                Please see REWARDS and STRETCH GOALS at the bottom of the page !!
 






Why crowdfund this project ?

In the small press market, a lot of releases aren't found in stores... retail or specialty. And with the small number of distributors and catalogs available today, we've found that crowdfunding (coupled with the internet advertising) is the most productive and effective way of putting our products directly into the hands of collectors.

We consider the fans and collectors our 'partners' in these endeavors. Their direct contact and feedback is important to us, and through that, we can answer any questions and offer support in a more direct fashion. By dealing direct you avoid the often impersonal 'middle-men' and get to deal directly with the publishers and creators involved.

What are the funds being used for ?

The funds collected from the project will cover the costs of printing the cards and rewards, as well as certain obligations to the artists such as postage and compensated returns. We will also be covering the costs of the original materials used to enhance the project.

DISCLAIMER...
Please understand that final imagery and design may differ slightly from the final product. We are always working to upgrade our projects and make them more entertaining to the fans.

Artwork used in this campaign comes directly from trading card, sketch card, and comic book imagery. Look for a gallery of sketch card artists and ways to contact them for commissions coming soon !

Additional art used in this campaign and project were supplied by Samuel Chase, Jiggy, and Evil Lance.

story:
The Gary Shipman Art Store is NOW OPEN!

https://igg.me/at/GaryShipman/x/18833604

Hello, welcome to my first Indiegogo campaign.  My name is Gary Shipman, and I have been making art for 30 years working on comics, movies and other properties. I'm probably best known for my comic book series Pakkins' Land that was nominated for Eisner, Harvey, and Russ Manning Awards. My work has been published through Disney Publishing, Caliber Press, Image Comics, Alias Comics, Cryptozoic, and Zondervan. I have been exploring different styles of art throughout my adult life, with no formal art training. My wife Rhoda and I have beed married for 30 years and have 3  beautiful children.

I'm just an artist trying to share a little beauty where I can. You are the biggest part of what I do, my expression in art means nothing without your contribution. I do what I do for you.

What We Need & What You Get

My goal is to provide a quality product for you and I hope that you are as excited about this campaign as I am. We need enough for the printing, distribution, and fees to create this sketchbook. Anything beyond that will help to make it possible for me to focus on creating new story and art for the future issues of my Pakkins' Land comic book series.

We're keeping the perks simple, and the prices as low as possible:

• $10 DIGITAL: gets you a Digital Download 2018 Sketchbook, and Digital Comic of Pakkins' Land issue #1

• $20 GARY'S OFFSPRING ART: gets you a hand draw original piece of art by Shani, Gary's daughter, and a Digital Download 2018 Sketchbook, and Digital Comic of Pakkins' Land issue #1 

• $25 SKETCHBOOK: gets you a printed copy of my 2018 Sketchbook and a Digital Download 2018 Sketchbook, and Digital Comic of Pakkins' Land issue #1 (shipping not included)

• $35 SIGNED: gets you a signed, printed copy of my 2018 Sketchbook, a Digital Download 2018 Sketchbook, and a Digital Comic of Pakkins' Land issue #1: All Stretch Goals Included (shipping not included)

• $50 CALENDAR: gets you a Pakkins' Land 2019 Calendar, a signed, printed copy of my 2018 Sketchbook, a Digital Download 2018 Sketchbook, and Digital Comic Pakkins' Land issue #1: All Stretch Goals Included (shipping not included)

• $75 1, 2, 3: gets you all 3 of my printed Sketchbooks (2013, 2016, and 2018) signed and a Digital Download 2018 Sketchbook, a Pakkins' Land 2019 Calendar, and a Digital Comic of Pakkins' Land issue #1: All Stretch Goals Included (shipping not included)

• $100 EARLY BIRD SPECIAL: gets you a printed copy of Pakkins' Land #1, and all 3 of my printed Sketchbooks (2013, 2016, and 2018) signed, and a Digital Download 2018 Sketchbook, a Pakkins' Land 2019 Calendar, and a Digital Comic of Pakkins' Land issue #1: All Stretch Goals Included (shipping not included)

• $150 SKETCH & SIGNED: gets you a Hand Drawn Rough Sketch in the printed 2018 Sketchbook, signed copies of my printed Sketchbooks (2013 and 2016), a printed copy of Pakkins' Land #1, and a Digital Download 2018 Sketchbook, a Pakkins' Land 2019 Calendar, and a Digital Comic of Pakkins' Land issue #1: All Stretch Goals Included (shipping not included)

• $250 ORIGINAL ART: gets you an Original piece of 8.5" x 11" Art, a Hand Drawn Rough Sketch in the printed 2018 Sketchbook, signed copies of my printed Sketchbooks (2013 and 2016), a printed copy of Pakkins' Land #1, and a Digital Download 2018 Sketchbook, a Pakkins' Land 2019 Calendar, and a Digital Comic of Pakkins' Land issue #1: All Stretch Goals Included (shipping not included)

• $500 OWN-A-COMIC-PAGE: gets you a Cool page featuring the character(s) from Pakkins' Land. Note: For international shipping there will be an additional charge for insurance & tracking which will be determined before mailing. Plus an Original piece of 8.5" x 11" Art, a Hand Drawn Rough Sketch in the printed 2018 Sketchbook, signed copies of my printed Sketchbooks (2013 and 2016), a printed copy of Pakkins' Land #1, and a Digital Download 2018 Sketchbook, a Pakkins' Land 2019 Calendar, and a Digital Comic of Pakkins' Land issue #1: All Stretch Goals Included (shipping not included)

• $2000 COVER ART: gets you the Original Cover Art for the newly printed Pakkins' Land #1 Exclusive! Plus: a Hand Drawn Rough Sketch in the printed 2018 Sketchbook, signed copies of my printed Sketchbooks (2013 and 2016), a printed copy of Pakkins' Land #1, and a Digital Download 2018 Sketchbook, a Pakkins' Land 2019 Calendar, and a Digital Comic of Pakkins' Land issue #1: All Stretch Goals Included (shipping not included)

Please check the perks out for more specific details!


Other Ways You Can Help

If you like this campaign but just can't contribute at this time, but you still want to help...you can! By getting the word out and sharing on your social media.

And that's all there is to it folks.

 

•

• 4K STRETCH GOAL - UNLOCKED - 1 Pakkins' Land Trading Card (Paul).

• 5K STRETCH GOAL - UNLOCKED - Extend the Sketchbook by 10 pages with an exciting Pakkins' Land art gallery.

• 6K STRETCH GOAL - UNLOCKED - A Second Pakkins' Land Trading Card (Mr Brambles).

• 7K STRETCH GOAL - UNLOCKED - A Third Pakkins' Land Trading Card (Jeremiah).

• 8K STRETCH GOAL - UNLOCKED - A Fourth Pakkins' Land Trading Cards (Gus).

• 9K STRETCH GOAL - A Fifth Pakkins' Land Trading Cards.

story:
NOTE: ALL PHYSICAL BOOKS/PRINTS PERKS COME SIGNED BY BILLY TUCCI UNLESS OTHERWISE REQUESTED!

NEW PERK - BUY DEBI TUCCI A DRINK!

Deborah has been working 12 hours a day calculating, organizing, fulfilling and shipping all rewards and she desperately needs a drink! And dealing with a husband like Billy and over 3,000 total backers, she really could use a glass of wine and being an adult there's no limit!

SHI: RETURN OF THE WARRIOR ROUGH CUT EDITION!

SHI: RETURN OF THE WARRIOR ROUGH CUT PRINT!

SHI: RETURN OF THE WARRIOR INDEMAND "SHIROI" EXCLUSIVE EDITION!

Original Art!!!

Indiegogo Exclusive Shi: Return of the Warrior SunFire Edition!

 

 

SHI: WAY OF THE WARRIOR #1 AMAZING SPIDER-MAN 300 HOMAGE FAN APPRECIATION EDITION!

STRETCH GOALS!!! (For all physically shipping pledges!)*

*Some stretch goals rewards might vary if backer pledged after August 1, 2020

BILLY TUCCI'S ORIGINAL COVER "SHI'S BACK!" COVER ARTWORK!

SHI’s BACK! Cover by Billy Tucci

There I was…

Armed with a portfolio holding the very pages in this book and storming the floor of the 1993 Comic Con International in San Diego…

I was anxious.  I knew no one, but even though my heart was pounding through my chest at this “one shot” at comic book fame, I held a strong conviction that I could somehow scratch out a living in this fantastically creative industry.  Like many a budding cartoonist at this biggest of all conventions, I stood in long lines and when it was my turn to show my wares, opened my book hoping the bored and hung-over editor would awake from his stupor and look up at me wide-eyed like he’d just made a great discovery… And offer me a job.

 

STRETCH GOALS!!!! (Distributed per Backer)

Problem was, that aside from Lady Death creator, Brian Pulido (who graciously offered me a pin up), no one was interested.  From the “Big Two” all the way down to the smallest of publishers, all turned me down -- every single one of them. To say I was heartbroken would be a callous understatement, but I was undeterred.  I remember thinking to myself, on that long flight back home to New York, about a life of illustrating licensing products, or even going back to designing children’s wear.  Perhaps I could go back to the National Guard.   Either way, I had to do something as I was incredibly broke and way behind in my rent.

I put on my Sony “discman” (remember those?) and removed the portfolio from the aircraft’s overhead storage bin.  Listening to Kitaro’s Kojiki, (which was the soundtrack I crafted up the “Way of the Warrior” story arc) I began thumbing through the book, critiquing each and every panel and determining which pages were good and which had to be redone.  My mindset was one of defiance as my train of thought was  “I’m not going to forget these pages and come back in six months with new material” like I had been instructed by the editors.  I will keep them, improve upon them and move forward with “my story”… the story of Ana Ishikawa and her monogatari titled, “Shi.” I was going to self-publish comic books.

Billy Tucci - Creator

And that, pretty much, is how it all started.  Of course the next six months were utterly painful, but so exciting, as I delved into researching - just how in the hell does one “self-publish?”  This was before the internet, so I hit every library, read every book andbothered every retailer who would speak to me, trying to figure out just how to do this.  All the while, I worked freelance design by day and sharpened the Shi pages by night.   I “employed” two great friends, co-writer Peter Gutierrez and designer Barry Orkin, with my ever-suffering wife (then ever-suffering girlfriend), Deborah to refine the script and define the artwork.  There was much aggravation, missteps, late hours and fear – at one point I almost sold half the creation to a pair of predatory business “partners”, but that’s a story for a different day. There were also triumphs -- none so gratifying as March 23, 1994 – the day, “Shi – The Way of the Warrior #1” shipped to comic shops across North America and Europe, making the anxious drama that seemed to daunt its creation every step of the way all well worth it.

As they say, from that day forward, things have never been the same.  And it’s all because of my friends, family, retailers and most of all, you – the reader.  Especially those of you who, for some reason or another, chose my book among hundreds that day in 1994, and for that I am forever grateful.  

SHI: Way of the Warrior #1, 1994

So join us for the first new Shi graphic novel in 15 years ... A story in which a comic book character has grown up in real time. .. A story that is literally 25 years in the making and one we hope you will love reading as much as we have loved making.

Thank you… #SHISBACK!

Billy Tucci

SHI’S BACK!!!!

Billy Tucci’s SHI: Amazing Spider-Man #301 Homage Cover

 

Crusade Comics is so excited to bring you the debut crowdfunding campaign for our all new 48-page graphic novel Shi: Return of the Warrior!

Nigen-Sei Cover by Billy Tucci

In this story over a quarter century in the making we now find our heroine Ana Ishikawa 15 years removed from when she last graced the pages of a comic book. Ana is divorced from her husband, disgraced NYPD detective Peter DeNyse and now lives a peaceful, quiet exitance raising their teenage daughter Hotaru.

Most importantly, her warrior days far behind her…

SHI: Return of the Warrior, Interior

But that all changes when Dr. YOU (a character that will be named after one of our backers via a special pledge level) brings the terrifying news that Masahiro Arashi has escaped from a New York City Mental Institution. Her former antagonist, now suffering from dementia has regressed back to his younger more violent self and is vengefully obsessed with the one person responsible for his incarcerated existence… Ana Ishikawa!

SHI: Return of the Warrior, Interior page

Manhattan is once again gripped in fear as a series of gruesome copycat Shi Killings resurface – with the order of victims proving ever closer to Ana. A desperate Ana must now, alongside Dr. You, seek out and stop Arashi before he can fulfill his murderous destiny… a destiny whose road ends with her own daughter Hotaru.

Dr. "You" (to be named after one of our backers!)

As Doctor You and Ana get ever closer, he confesses to her of Arashi’s twisted and dangerous obsession with the young Ana’s secret warrior persona, SHI, the living embodiment of death.

Worse still, the maddened Arashi is convinced that everyone: nurses, orderlies, janitors and especially the man treating him is in love with the lithe mistress of the underworld (Yomi).

                                                          The "Maddened" Masahiro Arashi!

Ana is mortified that the doctor is fully aware that she is indeed a murderess and knows that if ever exposed would rightly be the end of her world. But You assures her secret is safe and even though his own life is in danger, he promises to take it (due to both professional and personal reasons) “to the grave.”

SHI: Return of the Warrior, Interior 

But the grave just might be waiting for them all. For Ana will realize that measured acumen only goes so far in protecting those you love and, once again, the lioness within Ana will resurface to take up her trusted naginata, transform the hunted into the hunter, and unsheathe… The Return of the Warrior.

SHI: Return of the Warrior, Interior

In Return of the Warrior, Shi creator Billy Tucci is joined by co-writer Steven Peros, co-artist Ricardo Silva, colorist Brian Miller, designer Mindy Lopkin and superstar cover artists Amanda Conner, Paul Mounts, Wes Hartman, Conny Valentina and Mike Renzine.

Our Troops

Special Guest Cover Artists!

Cover by Amanda Conner

And as a very special bonus the legendary George Perez (colored by Wes Hartman) has gracefully come out of retirement to provide one last and unforgettably beautiful Shi cover.

Cover by George Perez

With tons of fun reward levels for you to become the hero!!!!!

Cover by Conny Valentina

 

Challenge Coins!

SHI-Shirt

 

Cover by Mike Renzine

 

Risks and challenges

We are so grateful to the OUTSTANDING fans Shi has had these last 25 years and are so very appreciative of how patiently you all waited for the next chapter in the saga. Because of YOU, this graphic novel is already in production! But we need you to help us see it to completion! Please share, tweet, and recommend SHI to new readers and collectors, so she can be bigger and better than ever! Thank you in advance for your generosity, loyalty, and dedication!!!!
story_txt: NOTE: ALL PHYSICAL BOOKS/PRINTS PERKS COME SIGNED BY BILLY TUCCI UNLESS OTHERWISE REQUESTED!NEW PERK - BUY DEBI TUCCI A DRINK!Deborah has been working 12 hours a day calculating, organizing, fulfilling and shipping all rewards and she desperately needs a drink! And dealing with a husband like Billy and over 3,000 total backers, she really could use a glass of wine and being an adult there's no limit!SHI: RETURN OF THE WARRIOR ROUGH CUT EDITION!SHI: RETURN OF THE WARRIOR ROUGH CUT PRINT!SHI: RETURN OF THE WARRIOR INDEMAND "SHIROI" EXCLUSIVE EDITION!Original Art!!!Indiegogo Exclusive Shi: Return of the Warrior SunFire Edition!  SHI: WAY OF THE WARRIOR #1 AMAZING SPIDER-MAN 300 HOMAGE FAN APPRECIATION EDITION!STRETCH GOALS!!! (For all physically shipping pledges!)**Some stretch goals rewards might vary if backer pledged after August 1, 2020BILLY TUCCI'S ORIGINAL COVER "SHI'S BACK!" COVER ARTWORK!SHI’s BACK!
