story:
The Story:

People have wondered for ages: "Why do bad things happen to good people? "

That is exactly what Father Patrick Retter, a Catholic priest who was wounded in combat during his youth, is asked at the start of Soulfinder: Demon's Match — and it is the question he must grapple with after he becomes involved in a series of supernatural events.

Retter is the parish priest in the small, quiet town of Steepleton, Maryland. Assigned to the tiny locale despite his expertise in demonology and the occult, Retter is often called upon by county authorities to advise on matters with religious significance.

Things don't stay quiet for long, as a series of related deaths imply that a great evil has been residing in Steepleton, waiting to arise.

Father Retter isn't alone. He is aided by a young detective and ultimately mentored by a mysterious figure who introduces Retter to an ancient, high order of exorcists known as the Soulfinders.

Retter is reluctant to accept his calling, but the evil he encounters in his investigation — a sinister cult and the demons it worships — may convince him otherwise.

There are many tales to tell about this band of brothers and their clashes with evil. Soulfinder: Demon's Match gives readers, by the last page, a taste of the vast and unexplored spiritual battlefield that these men face.

What we are offering is 56 pages of engaging visual storytelling, removed from the predictable contrivances of post-modern, agenda-driven narratives.

My plan is to continue the adventures of these brave men in future books, and I'd like you to join us from the very start. We humbly ask that you back Soulfinder: Demon's Match today.

 

A Professional Track Record

Backing Soulfinder: Demon's Match means that you will be backing the work of four men with a proven track record of quality and reliability.

  • Timothy Lim is a practicing Roman Catholic, professional illustrator, and political cartoonist from the state of Arkansas. With more than 8 years of industry experience working as a freelance illustrator for major companies, he has created and illustrated multiple works within the last 2 years that have gone on to be major bestsellers. These include but are not limited to Thump: The First Bundred Days, Black Hops: USA-*-GI, My Hero Magademia, and Trump’s Space Force.
  • Brett R. Smith is a professional colorist, advertising specialist, and creative director with decades of industry experience, which includes work for the "Big Two" — Marvel and DC. He spearheaded and colored the #1 New York Times bestselling adaptation of Peter Schweizer's book, Clinton Cash: A Graphic Novel, served as creative director and editor for Thump: The First Bundred Days, and has done collaborative work with Breitbart as well as other media entities.
  • Douglas Ernst is a professional journalist who has devoted nearly a decade of covering the comics industry via his blog and YouTube. He currently works for The Washington Times and has interviewed many high profile figures both cultural and political, including Gary Sinise and Mike Rowe.
  • Dave Dorman is the renowned painter and illustrator whose work set the standard for cover art for more than a decade. Having worked with virtually every major comic book company in the world, he is most known for his cover art for Star Wars, Indiana Jones, Aliens, and Predator.

Goals:

Besides compensating the creative team for the work that has already been accomplished (the art by Timothy Lim has already been finished for all 56 pages), we want to prove a strong enough market to hopefully get this book into the hands of comic book retailers.

We also want, as the campaign progresses, to improve the book by adding more pages to an optimal 64 total pages! Other goals that we have to surpass audience expectations is to square-bind the book, improve the page quality, and use the best possible cover stock to ensure a rigid, solidly crafted physical copy.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this campaign on as many social media platforms as possible. We have a solid product and want to get it into as many hands as possible. People who love comics need to see first-hand that they don't have to settle for mediocrity and subversive activists masquerading as creators.

story:
After a haphazard sequence of locations and interactions with many shady folks, Myre‘s life got thrown around. Myre is left stranded with no escape, no weapons and no allies, facing the herd of the most infamous and notoriously dangerous people on Yria: The Dwellers.

With no escape route, all that she has left is her own skill to overcome the next burden of her journey.

 

After exceeding its crowdfunding goal in 2014, Myre I came out in 2017, was nominated for awards and has even reprinted in German.  In it, the fiercely self-reliant Myre wanders the hauntingly beautiful desert realm of Yria with her trusty mount, making colourful enemies and shady friends who propel her toward a destiny she can't yet know. 

Talks about the Dwellers followed her constantly, and it was only a matter of time until she ran into what she believed to be just rumours.  

 

Myre is a large series for which I have planned three big books of 180 pages each.

Each of the books contains 160 pages of story, fully illustrated and in full bleed. The panels are in the same style as you see in my fleshed out concept paintings. When it comes to Myre and the world of Yria, I make no compromises in regards of the vastness and complexity of the paintings. 

The next Volume of Myre will reveal an even broader spectrum of the world of Yria and leads you further into the story, experienced through the eyes of the characters, their way of living and the dangers they have to endure. As the story evolves, new characters will be brought to life and contribute their part to the unique tapestry of Yrian Lore.

Now, it is finally time to continue with Myre‘s story and lead you further into the deserty and barren world from where her journey began. The storyboarding has begun, all brushes are ready to fire up.

-Get ready for Myre Volume 2-

 

What started as a vague dream many years ago has grown into a big story that takes place in the vast world of Yria. Myre‘s journey has grown since 2014, when it started off with my first successfully funded campaign here on Indiegogo. It was thanks to my founders‘ invaluable support that helped me create and complete the first Volume, which I published in 2017. From then, my work continued with my spin-off comic, "Haunter of Dreams“, which was as well successfully funded and published last year in 2019.

Find more information about Myre Vol 1  and get your own copy here, if you don't have it yet:

Yriachronicles.com

Myre and HoD were both published in two languages so far and may be released on a wider market with translations in more languages in the future. Myre has been a big part of my life. From the very first baby sketch to fully fleshed out characters that roam the world of Yria and stumble further into its mysteries, there hasn‘t been a day when I didn‘t tinker with new ideas and possibilities to lead you further into the world of Yria. 

Of course, this isn‘t only about me. Over the course of the past five years, a wonderful community of readers has formed around the world of Yria. The community spirit, from which great ideas can flourish, is one of the most important aspects for me. 

 

 

"MYRE" is a huge graphic novel project where each panel is getting the same treatment as one of my fully fledged digital paintings. I made this choice because the story and the characters are very dear to my heart. I also want to make the story as exciting and convincing as possible for you. My biggest goal is to breathe life into the characters in their environment. 

Myre 2 is still in the making, but for you who don't know what Vol 1 looks inside, here are some pages, taken directly from it.

 

Yria is a big world building project of mine that involves many creatures and characters. For the past several months, I have taken the time to explore new ideas, new characters as well as returning to already existing characters that made their appearance in the first volume of Myre. Along with the preparation for Myre 2, I painted pictures to explore the style and give you glimpses of happenings, which you can expect for Myre Volume 2.

 

 

Myre Volume 2 is currently in the storyboarding process. That means, while the story has been fleshed out so far, it‘s still in baby shoes in terms of the art. The storyboard is the very beginning of a comic, and a very crucial part of the process. It is the scaffold that brings all ideas together. This process is generally the one that requires the most action and focus. It will also hold the dialogue between the characters, which I will later base the final illustrations off of.

So far, I‘m 20 pages into the storyboard. This process will however go more smoothly and faster when I have the ability to focus entirely on that.

 

With your help, you will allow me to utilise all my energy and focus to do nothing else but giving life to the characters the world of Yria in which they live.

Myre is an extensive comic project that is very dear to me. Every single piece of art gets my full attention and the same care, because I care for the story as much as for the support I‘m getting to help me make this project come to fruition. A single graphic novel of this extend takes its time, however, which is why I want to focus on it entirely and solely from beginning to end. One single person can realise a dream when they work hard and tirelessly for it. But sometimes, despite their hard work, the basics of life will keep their hands tied.

Those basics require a financial basics into which we must pour most of our time just to keep living, and our dreams are stored in a box for an uncertain time. This is why I believe that many people together can realise big dreams.

Myre has always been a big part of my life.

It is therefore important to me that I can work on the next Volume without interruption by outer forces that would put me under financial risk. It is also very important for me to take the time and illustrate the story as best as my abilities allow me to. I personally can‘t wait to embark on the next part of of Myre‘s journey myself and would like to invite you to the ride.

Of course, you won't be left empty handed. This campaign will come with great and exclusive rewards:

 

 

 

Please remember that all campaigns come with risks. Indiegogo, especially my Myre campaign, is not a store. You're a patron of making this project come to reality. A project of this scope takes a while to accomplish, since I am the sole artist working on the illustrations. 

Luckily, I have a great team of friends who help me propel me towards my goals. Their immense effort means the world to me as they take big portions of time of their day to provide me with feedback and critique on how to improve with the story, the writing as well as the art. From the very beginning of the storyboard to getting all pages ready for print, there are many steps involved to make it perfect. This process can take up to 2 years. 

In those 2 years, I have a strict time schedule and personal deadlines that I try to reach with all of my dedication and love. It's important for me to bring you an immersive story which you can enjoy. Therefore, the word "rushing" is nonexistent.

The big challenge is always focus. It will most likely become very quiet on my social media timelines as well as my art channels. However, I have planned to provide all of you with frequent updates on my progress while keeping everything spoiler free. If you decide to join my founders' channel on Telegram, there will be a Live Ticker in the channel's title. 
If you are a supporter on Patreon, I will provide you with  art and updates as well while trying my very best to keep it spoiler free.
Keep an eye on your email inbox to find Myre 2 updates coming directly from Indiegogo.

All funds collected in this campaign will go entirely into the production of the next volume where the biggest portion of it will go into print production, packaging, postage and extras. All additional funds will even help me continue with the worldbuilding of Yria and Myre's story. 

There's yet so much more to explore! 
If you need more information, please go to the F.A.Q. section where I will hopefully cover everything for you. 

 

Not everyone is in the position to fund the campaign financially. But there are other ways to help reach the goal of this big project by spreading the word about "Myre 2". Please like, share and tell others by linking to this campaign to help set the path for Myre's journey!

Every single bit coming from you means the world to me. 

Thank you so much for helping make Myre Vol 2 become a reality!

Talks about the Dwellers followed her constantly, and it was only a matter of time until she ran into what she believed to be just rumours.  

 
Myre is a large series for which I have planned three big books of 180 pages each.
Each of the books contains 160 pages of story, fully illustrated and in full bleed. The panels are in the same style as you see in my fleshed out concept paintings. When it comes to Myre and the world of Yria, I make no compromises in regards of the vastness and complexity of the paintings. 
The next Volume of Myre will reveal an even broader spectrum of the world of Yria and leads you further into the story, experienced through the eyes of the characters, their way of living and the dangers they have to endure. As the story evolves, new characters will be brought to life and contribute their part to the unique tapestry of Yrian Lore.
Now, it is finally time to continue with Myre‘s story and lead you further into the deserty and barren world from where her journey began. The storyboarding has begun, all brushes are ready to fire up.
-Get ready for Myre Volume 2-

 

What started as a vague dream many years ago has grown into a big story that takes place in the vast world of Yria. Myre‘s journey has grown since 2014, when it started off with my first successfully funded campaign here on Indiegogo. It was thanks to my founders‘ invaluable support that helped me create and complete the first Volume, which I published in 2017. From then, my work continued with my spin-off comic, "Haunter of Dreams“, which was as well successfully funded and published last year in 2019.
Find more information about Myre Vol 1  and get your own copy here, if you don't have it yet:
Yriachronicles.com
Myre and HoD were both published in two languages so far and may be released on a wider market with translations in more languages in the future. Myre has been a big part of my life. From the very first baby sketch to fully fleshed out characters that roam the world of Yria and stumble further into its mysteries, there hasn‘t been a day when I didn‘t tinker with new ideas and possibilities to lead you further into the world of Yria. 
Of course, this isn‘t only about me. Over the course of the past five years, a wonderful community of readers has formed around the world of Yria. The community spirit, from which great ideas can flourish, is one of the most important aspects for me. 
 

 

"MYRE" is a huge graphic novel project where each panel is getting the same treatment as one of my fully fledged digital paintings. I made this choice because the story and the characters are very dear to my heart. I also want to make the story as exciting and convincing as possible for you. My biggest goal is to breathe life into the characters in their environment. 
Myre 2 is still in the making, but for you who don't know what Vol 1 looks inside, here are some pages, taken directly from it.

 

Yria is a big world building project of mine that involves many creatures and characters. For the past several months, I have taken the time to explore new ideas, new characters as well as returning to already existing characters that made their appearance in the first volume of Myre. Along with the preparation for Myre 2, I painted pictures to explore the style and give you glimpses of happenings, which you can expect for Myre Volume 2.

 

 
Myre Volume 2 is currently in the storyboarding process. That means, while the story has been fleshed out so far, it‘s still in baby shoes in terms of the art. The storyboard is the very beginning of a comic, and a very crucial part of the process. It is the scaffold that brings all ideas together. This process is generally the one that requires the most action and focus. It will also hold the dialogue between the characters, which I will later base the final illustrations off of.
So far, I‘m 20 pages into the storyboard. This process will however go more smoothly and faster when I have the ability to focus entirely on that.
 

With your help, you will allow me to utilise all my energy and focus to do nothing else but giving life to the characters the world of Yria in which they live.
Myre is an extensive comic project that is very dear to me. Every single piece of art gets my full attention and the same care, because I care for the story as much as for the support I‘m getting to help me make this project come to fruition. A single graphic novel of this extend takes its time, however, which is why I want to focus on it entirely and solely from beginning to end. One single person can realise a dream when they work hard and tirelessly for it. But sometimes, despite their hard work, the basics of life will keep their hands tied.
Those basics require a financial basics into which we must pour most of our time just to keep living, and our dreams are stored in a box for an uncertain time. This is why I believe that many people together can realise big dreams.
Myre has always been a big part of my life.
It is therefore important to me that I can work on the next Volume without interruption by outer forces that would put me under financial risk. It is also very important for me to take the time and illustrate the story as best as my abilities allow me to. I personally can‘t wait to embark on the next part of of Myre‘s journey myself and would like to invite you to the ride.

Of course, you won't be left empty handed. This campaign will come with great and exclusive rewards:






 



 


 


Please remember that all campaigns come with risks. Indiegogo, especially my Myre campaign, is not a store. You're a patron of making this project come to reality. A project of this scope takes a while to accomplish, since I am the sole artist working on the illustrations. Luckily, I have a great team of friends who help me propel me towards my goals. Their immense effort means the world to me as they take big portions of time of their day to provide me with feedback and critique on how to improve with the story, the writing as well as the art. From the very beginning of the storyboard to getting all pages ready for print, there are many steps involved to make it perfect. This process can take up to 2 years. 
In those 2 years, I have a strict time schedule and personal deadlines that I try to reach with all of my dedication and love. It's important for me to bring you an immersive story which you can enjoy. Therefore, the word "rushing" is nonexistent.The big challenge is always focus. It will most likely become very quiet on my social media timelines as well as my art channels. However, I have planned to provide all of you with frequent updates on my progress while keeping everything spoiler free. If you decide to join my founders' channel on Telegram, there will be a Live Ticker in the channel's title. If you are a supporter on Patreon, I will provide you with  art and updates as well while trying my very best to keep it spoiler free.Keep an eye on your email inbox to find Myre 2 updates coming directly from Indiegogo.All funds collected in this campaign will go entirely into the production of the next volume where the biggest portion of it will go into print production, packaging, postage and extras. All additional funds will even help me continue with the worldbuilding of Yria and Myre's story. There's yet so much more to explore! If you need more information, please go to the F.A.Q. section where I will hopefully cover everything for you. 
 

Not everyone is in the position to fund the campaign financially. But there are other ways to help reach the goal of this big project by spreading the word about "Myre 2". Please like, share and tell others by linking to this campaign to help set the path for Myre's journey!Every single bit coming from you means the world to me. 
Thank you so much for helping make Myre Vol 2 become a reality!

story:
The sequel to 2018's IRON SIGHTS takes the franchise across the border into Mexico!

 

Esme is running her own cartel with Ramadi as one of her enforcers. Harm, a deep-cover operative recruited by Special Agent Woods for OPERATION MARGRAVE finds himself trapped in his undercover assignment after Woods' death. Add in a schizophrenic tourist, a depressed homicidal giant and two young people in love and you get...IRON SIGHTS: 2 PSYCHOS!

 

Why TELL you about this already-completed 100-page graphic novel and not just SHOW you the first 12 pages?

 

 

List of Creators

Story & Lettering by Richard C. Meyer

Interior Art by Ibai Canales

Cover by Kelsey Shannon

Esme Pin-Up Poster by Sasha Perdigao

IRON SIGHTS Logo by Bob Stone

 

If you missed out on the original IRON SIGHTS graphic novel, you have a chance to get it along with the sequel!

story:
FULLY FUNDED IN 3 DAYS! 
 

COVER ART BY MARVEL ARTIST JON MALIN (Cable, Jawbreakers: Lost Souls) AND BRETT R. SMITH! 

 

 

 

 

Jon Del Arroz is a #1 Amazon Bestselling author, "the leading Hispanic voice in science fiction," according to PJ Media.com, and winner of the 2018 CLFA Book Of The Year Award. He is best known for his steampunk novel, For Steam And Country and his forthcoming Alt-Hero novel with Vox Day.

Jethro Morales is a professional artist having worked for Image and Dynamite, most notably for Hack/SLASH, Green Hornet, and Dejah Thoris. 

Del Arroz and Morales have teamed up to produce a superhero comic with intense personal drama like the Batman/Catwoman relationship has promised but never delivered. FLYING SPARKS: a hero and villain in love. You can help make this book a reality, with this volume including the first three chapters of this planned ongoing series, 66-pages of storytelling by a professional science fiction writer. The best part is: the art is already complete, which means this book can get into your hands much more quickly than most crowdfunded comics! Digital books can be delivered as soon as this crowdfund ends! Great story! Great Art. No Wait! 

But it gets even better: this book features a stunning cover by the acclaimed creative team that brought you JAWBREAKERS: LOST SOULS, John Malin (Cable, Thunderbolts) and Brett R. Smith!

 

Sparks Will Fly

What if you met the person of your dreams, but they're not only your direct opposite, but also your enemy? 

Chloe Anderson is a physics student by day, a hard working, smart girl who's close with her mad scientist professor, working with him as a teacher's assistant. She has access to several of his inventions, and in order to help test them, she moonlights as the superhero, Meta-Girl.

Johnny Benvinutti comes from a well-established Italian crime family, and recently found he has the ability to shoot lightning from his hands. His descent into deeper crime only creates the need to cover more up as he runs his operation out of a coffee shop front business. 

When the two of them meet, sparks fly on multiple levels. But will they be able to maintain their relationship while keeping secret lives from each other? 

FLYING SPARKS will feature the first three chapters collected in one volume. 66-pages of action packed story of a quality only one of the top science fiction authors in the field today can bring you. 

This campaign will help Del Arroz pay for art, lettering, editing, a print run of 1,000 books for the graphic novel, and the beautiful cover by superstar artists Jon Malin and Brett R. Smith. 

All Print Editions Will Receive A PDF Of The Book Free! 

If you want a T-Shirt or Poster + PDF, indiegogo allows you to back campaigns twice! 

Stretch Goals

  • $6,000 Fully Funded! The book becomes a reality. WINNING! 
  • $10,000 The book will have the original single issue "chapter" covers added to the interior as chapter covers for 3 extra pages of gorgeous art. One of the chapter covers will be drawn by a disabled military veteran, Will Caligan, in order to help support his dream of working professionally in comics. WINNING! 
  • $12,370 A special stretch goal only viewers of my interview with That Umbrella Guy can know about. There will be memes and plenty of fun. Plus, all backers will be getting a special 6-Page short story PDF comic to celebrate which was one of the original proof of concept stories to get Flying Sparks going.  WINNING! 
  • $15,000  All-Star Artist Timothy Lim (My Hero MAGAdemia, Trump's Space Force) Will Do An Exclusive Meta-Girl Print For backers! WINNING! 
  • $20,000 8-Page Prequel Short Comic PDF will be included for all backers! WINNING! 
  • $25,000  Character Bios And Pin Up Page for Meta-Girl and Johnny! [Locked]
  • $26,000 Character Bio For Hannah (Meta-Girl's Roommate) [Locked]
  • $27,000 Character Bio For Paul (Johnny's Coffee Shop Assistant) [Locked]
  • $28,000 Character Bio for Meta-Man [Locked]
  • $29,000 Character Bio For Peter Buxton  [Locked]
  • The further we get... the more bios we can unlock! Let's get the whole cast and explore the rich and deep world of Flying Sparks! 

Spread The Word!

$26,000 Character Bio For Hannah (Meta-Girl's Roommate) [Locked]
$27,000 Character Bio For Paul (Johnny's Coffee Shop Assistant) [Locked]

Spread The Word!

story:
Graveyard Shift VOL II Variant cover by Andrew Huerta!!

GRAVEYARD SHIFT VOL II is a 50 page Graphic Novel! Best described as WHAT IF the Universal Monsters were the X-Men! Jon Malin(Jawbreakers) and Mark Poulton(Hawkman) bring you the next chapter in the GRAVEYARD SHIFT adventure! ARISE! DRACULA, ARISE! The Dark Lord himself has returned to dominate mankind and the only thing in his way is the GRAVEYARD SHIFT!

 

Featured "BLOOD BAG" tier includes a special edition Mick"The Monster" Mayhew trading card. Exclusive to backers of this tier, highly limited to 350 in total, 

 

 

        Graveyard Shift VOL II Andrew Huerta variant.

         

       

 

          Interiors by Jon.

     

 

 

 

$22, 068 STRETCH GOAL UNLOCKED! Artist Andrew Huerta receives a $1000 bonus and all backers receive a Lillith "The Bride" Mayhew trading card!

 

$65,000 STRETCH GOAL! Andrew Huerta receives another $1000 bonus and all backers receive secret 6X9 print!

story:
"It looks like something I would've created at 15. It just looks like fun." - Ethan Van Sciver

Hello There!

It is my honor and privilege to present to you Maverix™​ Decimation!  Decimation is a stand-alone 80-page-long graphic novel.  With 76 full-color story pages of pure epicness!  It's a heartfelt, heart racing story chock full of everything you could ever want in a comic: action, drama, mystery, and just pure fun!  Created due to a challenge made by my new friends at ComicsGate who had seen my artwork and thought I should continue to master my craft at 15 years old and make a graphic novel.

 

What would you do if you didn't know who to trust and the world's future relied on your decision? Tough question!  Right?  That's the situation in which Maverix finds himself. Want to find out the outcome?  Come on, buckle up, 'cause you're in for the ride of your life.

 

The Story!

Everdale City is overrun by entrenched crime.  The streets aren't safe.  The underground's power is rising!  And corruption is seeping through the cracks of the city!  In the midst of this, the hero Maverix learns there's more than what meets the eye.  Humanity is on the brink of collapse and he is the only hope.  Will he be able to fight through the physical and emotional challenges that await him and stop the DECIMATION?

 

Stretch Goals!

For $800 USD - A Mutant Soldier (Enemy Soldier) Trading Card - UNLOCKED

For $2,000 USD - A Galabonni-Joey (Anti-Heroes) Trading Card - UNLOCKED

For $6,000 USD - A Maverix (Hero) Trading Card

For $10,000 USD - A Damascus (Villain) Trading Card

Here's a look at some of the pages!

The Artist!

The wonderful wordsmith bringing you this tale of honor and perseverance is Noah T. Mactutus who meticulously built this story to have as much action, excitement, drama, and pure comic awesomeness as possible! 

The pages are brilliantly brought to life by Mactutus who uses his fertile unadulterated 15-year-old imagination to its fullest and gives you everything your teenager self would want while maintaining a level of sophistication that appeals to any comic book enthusiast giving you emotion and energy with every stroke of his brush and every line that he lays on his bristol board!  Hand-drawn out of a pure love for the artistic craft used by the greats from a time gone by.

 

Thank you for stopping by.

And thank you to all who back my campaign!

story:
1stMan is a 64-page graphic novel! $25!

1stMan is a 64-page full-color, perfect bound, graphic novel!

Andy Smith here and I've been a professional comic book artist for almost three decades. Some of my clients include Marvel, DC, Image, Valiant, Cross Gen, and, Ominous Press. Check out some of my work at www.andysmithart.com. Go ahead, take a peek! I'll be here when you're done perusing my work.

1stMan is back better than ever!

I created 1stMan back when I was a kid in the 80s when I was still only dreaming of being a professional comic book artist. I grew up reading Marvel's Captain Marvel and DC's Shazam, those books are a huge part of what I love about comics, and I modeled my guy after them!

Harkening back to the silver-age of Marvel and DC Comics, this return of 1stMan is fast-paced, action-packed, character-driven fun!

1stMan is the story of Luke Henry a freshman in college that is chosen to carry on the last Essence of the 10. There are 10 powerful Essences scattered across the universe, each inhabiting a being on different planets. If the being dies, the Essence will search out another worthy vessel. If somehow, all 10 essences were collected into one single being, that being would become the most powerful force in the Universe, a virtually unstoppable force.

Once Luke gains that power, he can change into Apollo, the 1stMan!

What, you still need more? OK, fine...

Monarch, the larger-than-life, power-hungry villain of this story, has collected 9 of the essences of the 10 by destroying the worlds they inhabited. He now has his sights set on the last one. Monarch travels to the world inhabited by the 10th essence, only to see it escape his grasp and find a worthy being to protect it and contain its power: 1stMan!

But 1stMan isn't the only character in this tale. Penumbra is the last survivor of one of the worlds destroyed by Monarch. She's a femme fatale, not an ally of 1stMan so much as she is concerned with self-preservation. Her main goal is to stop Monarch from gaining the 10th Essence. Once he wields the power of the Ten, Monarch will be unstoppable.

The main cast of 1stMan!

Each character will get their own biography page!

 

 

Some of the interior art!

 

The Parody ad is back!

I grew up in a time where comic books were filled with your favorite heroes pitching products and I've created one for the book to take you back in time!

 

$35-Bart Sears' variant cover

Are you a fan of Bart Sears' art? I know I am so I asked my long-time pal if he'd contribute a variant cover to the project and he was thrilled to do so!

 

1stMan Program Book! $15!

This is an extra 40-page book that contains pin-ups of 1stMan by some of today's top superstar talents like Adam Hughes, Alan Davis, Bart Sears, J. Scott Campbell, and more! A making-of 1stMan showing unused layouts, model sheets, sketches, and more!

 

In our stay at home and no conventions world, I want to give you the chance to own a piece of my original art.

Pledge $100 and get a copy of the comic book a head sketch on the inside back cover of the book!

Pledge $200 and get a copy of the comic book and a single figure sketch on the inside back cover of the book!

 MY COLLABORATORS 

I created 1stMan when I was a kid and when I got the opportunity to do the book in 1997 through Image Comics I asked a good friend of mine Rob Snyder, who is also a cartoonist, to help me with some of the dialogue. He'll be returning to lend his writing talent again to the dialogue with me. The colorist is Periya Pillay, he colored my Jungle Lords/ Ultra comic-book and the lettering is done by Steve Dutro, a buddy of mine that I attended the Kubert School with. Steve has been lettering comics for almost 30 years, working for Marvel, DC, and more! He also did the logo design for 1stMan. Another buddy of mine, Keith Champagne, will again serve as an editor on the book.

What are the funds for?

Great question and I'll keep the answer simple. I've produced all of the new art to finish the story and will use the funds to pay myself, the colorist, the letterer, additional production costs, and printing.

Penumbra is the last survivor of one of the worlds destroyed by Monarch. She's a femme fatale, not an ally of 1stMan so much as she is concerned with self-preservation. Her main goal is to stop Monarch from gaining the 10th Essence. Once he wields the power of the Ten, Monarch will be unstoppable.The main cast of 1stMan!Each character will get their own biography page!  Some of the interior art! The Parody ad is back!I grew up in a time where comic books were filled with your favorite heroes pitching products and I've created one for the book to take you back in time! $35-Bart Sears' variant coverAre you a fan of Bart Sears' art? I know I am so I asked my long-time pal if he'd contribute a variant cover to the project and he was thrilled to do so! 1stMan Program Book! $15!This is an extra 40-page book that contains pin-ups of 1stMan by some of today's top superstar talents like Adam Hughes, Alan Davis, Bart Sears, J. Scott Campbell, and more! A making-of 1stMan showing unused layouts, model sheets, sketches, and more! In our stay at home and no conventions world, I want to give you the chance to own a piece of my original art.Pledge $100 and get a copy of the comic book a head sketch on the inside back cover of the book!Pledge $200 and get a copy of the comic book and a single figure sketch on the inside back cover of the book! MY COLLABORATORS I created 1stMan when I was a kid and when I got the opportunity to do the book in 1997 through Image Comics I asked a good friend of mine Rob Snyder, who is also a cartoonist, to help me with some of the dialogue. He'll be returning to lend his writing talent again to the dialogue with me. The colorist is Periya Pillay, he colored my Jungle Lords/ Ultra comic-book and the lettering is done by Steve Dutro, a buddy of mine that I attended the Kubert School with. Steve has been lettering comics for almost 30 years, working for Marvel, DC, and more! He also did the logo design for 1stMan. Another buddy of mine, Keith Champagne, will again serve as an editor on the book.What are the funds for?Great question and I'll keep the answer simple. I've produced all of the new art to finish the story and will use the funds to pay myself, the colorist, the letterer, additional production costs, and printing.

story:
FINALLY AFTER 2 YEARS.

HE HAS COME.

Clay-Man is now coming to crowdfunding! Digital and physical comics galore!

 

With the help and inspiration of many comic pros and indie pros alike a big boys dream will come true and people will get their hands on the smiling ray of hopes books!

  • Over 18 pages of Clay-Man content!
  • Campaign perks include digital copys of the books, and the ginourmous combined physical book!
  • Featuring bonus art from the likes of Kristian Rossi (Voidwalker) and Ivan Fiorelli the future main artist of Clay-Man!

 

CLAY-MAN ONE-SHOT

Its a simple quiet night in Futorica. Clay just wants to go to his favorite store to buy some food and drinks for nightly patrol. Too bad for him he got some unwelcomed patrons.

Clay-Mans one-shot is 12 pages of comedic action filled with good one liners and in your face excitement! 

This book wouldn't be possible without my team for this: Jared Ballinger my editor. Chunlin Zhao AKA Sunny my artist/colorist. You may know her as the main artist/colorist of Tom N Artie! And lastly we got Micah Myers who is also letterer to Tom N Artie. Simple guy and super easy to work with.

 

CLAY-MAN X DEMON HUNTER RAVEN PT.1

 

 

By some twist of fate or just sheer tomfoolery, Clay meets a guy as old as he is, with powers of his own, and with villains of his own. Good thing hes a good guy like him and doesn't mind the power of TEAMWORK!

Clay-Man X Demon Hunter Raven is 6 pages of short but sweet action and witty dialogue. All culminated cause one guy liked my character so much he HAD to make a crossover comic with him. This book was made by the loveable Nicholas Mueller who has made a few successful IGG campaigns involving his character Raven and is doing a Issue #3 campaign later this year! Also yes there will be a crossover again of Clay and Raven in spring 2021!

WHAT IS CLAY-MAN?

Clay-Man was an idea I had for 2 years. I've been studying, grinding, and paying good artists to sculpt and mold Clay into the hero he is today! A futuristic superhero comic inspired by the likes of Spider-Man, static shock, batman beyond, and many other hero comics!

Clay-Man X Jack Irons

I get that but I mean whats the actual story inside Clay-Man?

Futorica, the future, 2118. In a time of peace and filled with evolved animals, plants, and robots the worlds known a century of peace. That is until a nasty gas invades the city of Futorica Wisconsin, turning some of the residents into villanous mutants. Not only that, criminals and gangs are starting to make their move, taking the city piece by piece. Theres only one person who can stop them, a mutant himself! HAVE NO FEAR! CLAYMANS HERE!

Clay-Man X Paragon Prime

 

Wait wait wait, the comic is free on Tapas/Webtoons. Why would I wanna buy the book?

Its simple: My fanbase is sweet and they really wanna get their hands on this, plus having some money to fund my comics isn't a bad thing either.

 

What kind of perks you offering?

Not much but enough to get you interested! We got 7 perks! 3 will be digital and 3 will be physical. You can get either the main one-shot, the crossover book, or all 2 in a digital bundle! The physical package itself will be the biggest as it combines the one-shot and the crossover book! I'm so excited to see how people react to it! We'll also be offering Otis Stein as an add-on digital perk 1 dollar!

Otis Stein

Where will the money go to and to whom?

Most of the money will be going to me and to be used for comic book content, some will go to IGG of course and others for helping with the campaign. Any extra money of course like I said will go to comic book content.

 

OVERALL GOALS

The main purpose of this campaign is of course to get some physical copies out to people. With the added money and possible experience it will be MUCH easier to make a 2nd campaign in the future for my other comic projects!

In short:

  • Make a combined comic of the one-shot and the crossover book, with bonus art content!
  • Get physical copies to peoples hands!
  • Learn from this so the 2nd campaign for my comics is much easier to make!
  • Ship to USA and POSSIBLY international (At least maybe Canada?)
  • Get this to the base goal of course ($500)

 

 

HIGH RISKS = HIGH REWARDS

With Covid-19 kicking our butts I know it'll be hard to get these books to hungry customers. And to be honest with you guys I am quite scared, as this is my first ever campaign and I wanna be sure each and every person who contributes either gets their book or gets a full refund and or compensation from yours truly.

Be sure of course too all funds WILL be going to comic book content ONLY.

Thanks for reading all this and thanks for being of my comics! Godspeed ladies and gentlemen!

Learn from this so the 2nd campaign for my comics is much easier to make!

Get this to the base goal of course ($500)

And to be honest with you guys I am quite scared, as this is my first ever campaign and I wanna be sure each and every person who contributes either gets their book or gets a full refund and or compensation from yours truly.Be sure of course too all funds WILL be going to comic book content ONLY.Thanks for reading all this and thanks for being of my comics! Godspeed ladies and gentlemen!

story:
STRETCH GOALS

Our stretch goals are here!  Watch this project as we announce and unlock future freebies coming soon!

 

 

BY

ART ADAMS & JOYCE CHIN

THE COMICS THAT INSPIRED

Arthur and Joyce were both influenced by Red Sonja early in their careers. We worked hand in hand with them to select comics that represent what they love about the character for these very special editions!  And the end result is something truly incredible!

ARTHUR ADAMS RED SONJA SPECIAL EDITION

The brilliant debut of Frank Thorne on Red Sonja began with Marvel Feature #2 waaaay back in 1975. It was in the 70s that an impressionable young aspiring Adams first discovered the character and fell in love with the incredible art and action that the team of Roy Thomas and Frank Thorne would breath into the comics.  Its this first beautiful impression of the character with a script by the legendary Bruce Jones that we celebrate in this new special edition!

 

JOYCE CHIN RED SONJA SPECIAL EDITION

Joyce was also inspired by early Red Sonja adventures, specifically the crossover with Spider-Man. She enjoyed seeing the character with modern super hero cohorts and to celebrate the spirit of that crossover we are combining Joyce's beautiful cover with work by two of the biggest super hero creators of the modern era - Amanda Conner and Jimmy Palmiotti - with Invincible Red Sonja #1! Amanda and Jimmy have been the driving force behind incredible comics like Harley Quin and have brought that energy to Red Sonja!

 

CGC GRADED REMARQUED COVERS

Covers remarqued by Arthur or Joyce with unique head sketches and slabbed and graded at 9.2 or better!

REMARQUED COVERS

Have Joyce or Arthur sketch an original Red Sonja head on a special sketch edition of their cover...

(NOTE: Art shown is an example of what your cover may look like. Each piece is unique and your art will vary.)

CGC COVERS

​Have your copies slabbed and graded at 9.6 or better...

CGC SIGNED COVERS

...or have your copies signed by the artist and then slabbed and graded at 9.2 or better! ("Metal" cover not available signed)

story:
Story

Speed of Light is a brand new bi monthly sci-fi anthology. Each issue will have nine, 8 page stories by different creators. Some stories will be serialized and some will be one shots.

 

What Are You Backing

  • Black & White Sci-FI Anthology Series
  • First issue of an ongoing 
  • This is a  72 page square bound magazine

Preview

72:00 by Corey Hardman and Jok 

He may not know who he is, where he is, or what the timer on his wrist is counting down to, but he did know the answers were somewhere within the dilapidated city. If he could just stay alive long enough to find them...

Veiled by Matt Ringel and Luis Morocho

A father must venture into a fog plagued land known as The Veil to save his children, but within it horrors lay resting and waiting.

Europa Outpost 6 by Tristan Vik and Alfredo Torres

On the icy moon Europa, two NovaCorp employees lose all contact with home. But this is only the beginning of their strange encounter with the unknown.

Hunters by Guido Martinez & Pablo Arias

One soldier is being hunted by a group of armed aliens. Can he survive using the equipment on him and his wits?

Argosy by Adam Lawson and Maan House

a serialized deep-space horror tale about an outlaw band of space-prospectors who rip precious metals from corporate-controlled asteroids. On their latest scavage, they're overtaken by an ancient evil that once lived on Earth.

Day One Print 

All physical backers get this print for FREE if they back by Thursday, March 11th at 8am PST.

story:
You thought it was one and done... But here's your second chance! 
That's right! We're running a 2nd Chance campaign for Undead Border: Escape or Die! But beware, there are only a limited amount of first editions and we're not offering reprints of any kind on this campaign. Don't miss out on this zombie sleeper hit!  

Undead Border: Escape or Die is best described as Return of the Living Dead meets Mad Max meets The Running Man! 124 pages of zombie carnage and border horror!

The Story...
After losing her father to the mindless hordes of flesh eaters, Tania finds salvation in her new family, The Rot Riders. Skateboarders surviving as outcasts and riding out the end of times.

But surviving the border is no easy task. A larger threat than the undead is The Commune, a brutal organization hellbent on shaping the remnants of humanity into their own savage image. Grudgingly, The Rot Riders and The Commune coexist as long as everyone stays in their lane.

Foolishly, the uneasy alliance is broken and Tania is captured by the villainous Commune. Her life now hangs in the balance between the living and the undead as she is banished to No Man's Land. Tania and two other “insurgents”, Rulo and Emilio, find themselves trapped in an isolated section of the city where death and decay hold dominion.

Now Tania and her new allies must learn to cooperate and trust each other to overcome the necropolis that is No Man's Land. But what other dangers dwell within the Undead Border besides joining the swelling ranks of hungry ghouls? For these kids, the only option is to ESCAPE OR DIE!!!

THE TEAM

WRITER: Francisco Arce @farce656
ARTIST: Javier Gutierrez @exeiviermx
LETTERER/DESIGNER: Oliver Lee Arce @oleea656
TRANSLATIONS: Ray Ramos @cryptidnals
LOGO DESIGN & TRAILER: Dominique Arce @domoarce656

story:
THE ACE Volume One-

THE ACE is a 32 page full color comic. It's the story of David Diaz a young man who is looking to find his purpose in life. When one day a shooting star crash lands nearby and what he finds in the wreckage changes his life forever. As he becomes the armored being named THE ACE who turns out to be the most sought after object in the entire universe.

Creative team-

THE ACE cover by Donal Delay  (Brutas)

Edwin Acevedo - Writer/creator 

  • Main story art by Ibai Canales  (Iron Sights) colors by Teo Gonzalez  (Brutas)
  • ACE Epilogue Part 1 art and colors by Sweens (Oddity)
  • Angelyke Origin art and colors by The Howl Comics (The Lost Pages)
  • Letters by Adam F. (More Lethal)

 

THE ACE Main Story Pages by Ibai Canales and Teo Gonzalez

ACE Epilogue Part 1 Page by Sweens-

Angelyke Origin Panels by The Howl Comics-

 

 

Additional Tiers-

  • MIke McMahon (Usassassin) comic sized print colored by Simon SIM Pothier  (Tales from the Nat verse)

 

  • Hardline Jam Piece poster featuring Art by Joe Ball (Super Harem), Sweens (Oddity), Simon SIM Pothier (Tales from the Nat verse), Passion4Drawing (Doom Fate), Brandon Diaz (Magic Cop). Colors by Michael Beacon (Seven Legions) & Letters by Adam F. (Deepwell)

 

 

    Stretch goals- 

    • $3,500 funding stretch goal- Angelyke trading card by Doodle Bags ( Vestige 2) colored by Passion4Drawing  (Doom Fate) 
    • $4,000 stretch goal- THE ACE & Akula stickers by Six AM Comics  (Star Fetched) 
    • $4,500 stretch goal- Angelyke & Ace Red & Blue stickers by Six AM Comics (Star Fetched)
    • $5,000 stretch goal- Jim Oriley (MOJO Risen) Kaiju Print 
    • $5,500 stretch goal- P.M. Antunes (Theres No Kill Like Overkill) Sexy Angelyke Print 

    Risks & Challenges-

    While there are challenges with the current pandemic the good news is that all of the artwork on the book is complete. The letters are also complete, but there is still some work to be done before looking to set up the print file. Like getting the fan art section set up as well as finalizing the credits and thank you pages. I will make sure to provide updates on the progress of the book as much as possible throughout the campaign.

    Other Ways You Can Help-

    Please help support the campaign by not only backing but sharing the link to THE ACE comic volume 1 on all your social media accounts. Help us spread the word about this project and thank you!.

story:
Shadow Sentry Book 1 is Fulfilled!

At this time all books have been shipped and all perks are out! Thanks so much for making this an amazing first outing for this incredible new series that will be on-going!

The campaign will officially be ending at the end of may... but before we go! We want to offer one last perk that will really make this campaign complete!

Get a look at all the lines that went into making Shadow Sentry Book 1: up-close and personal in an over-sized 7.5" x 11.5" 80 page, Hard Cover Edition! Shipping out in July!

 

 

Book 1: Into the Eternal

Will be a 48 page comic (NOW 54 PAGES!) that will launch a totally new and wide world of Heroes and Villains that will be an ongoing series if funded! Pencils, inks, and story will be done by Eric Ninaltowski, with colors provided by Kid Ikaris and Carbon Graphics! The comic will also include a Newsletter section in the back like the comics of yesteryear where you can submit Fan Art, letters, etc! The "Thank you" page will be in the Newsletter section as well! Any backer who claims a perk at $25 or more will be included on the Thank you page! (Anyone who wishes to submit comments or Fan Art for consideration in the Newsletter please check out the "FAQ" section above!)

BOOK 1 IS CURRENTLY BEING

SENT TO THE PRINTER!

 

NEW PERK ADDED!

8 METAL Trading Cards by some of the amazing talents featured on the weekly drawing competition known as Drawn and Quartered! Ceage O'Seanachain, Matt Cossin, Matthew Weldon, Elliot Fernandez, Mike S. Miller, and Kevin Sharpe! A Mystery Card from yours truly         + a DnQ Crew sticker to adorn your gear and show your love!

These will only be available with this campaign! Check em' out!

 

Variant Covers-

There are two perks for ordering a Variant Cover, a single, or the Double Variant Option! If you'd like to get all three variant covers you can simply click on the Double Option and then "Add-on" the third Variant cover! Those options will appear after you click "Get this perk!" You will also save on shipping by using the Add-on perk.

Regular Cover- Art by Eric Ninaltowski - Colors by Carbon Graphics!

PAGES!

Matthew Weldon Cover- Variant A

Here is the original line work by Matthew- This Original Cover is available for sale!! Get it quick!

Kevin Sharpe Cover - Variant B

Mike S. Miller Cover - Variant C                                                                               

MEET THE TEAM! This is the "Promo Art" - a metal comic sized version will be available in the Early Bird Special ONLY! (Names will not be on the final version)

Summary

Are you tired of the same old, same old? Constant remakes, deaths, and rebirths of your favorite characters, AGAIN!? Well I have a new and exciting concept that will unleash a world of characters and stories that will keep you busy for years to come!

  • I've been a published professional for about 14 years and I'm always drawing other creator's ideas, it's time work on my own! I'm passionate about creating and want to bring a new world to fans that can get them excited about comics again!
  • This book is my baby and I want to treat it right; with QUALITY and with that 90's flare that got me excited about comics in the first place! If we can get this book funded then it will be an ongoing series, and will constantly build upon itself! That means more stories, characters and adventures to explore!

Funding-

  • 10K is the bear minimum it will cost to get this book made- and that's why I'm doing a Fixed Goal. If I can't make the minimum then I just can't fund the book to completion, but we'll try again another time!
  • Cost for page colors + Covers and additional art + letters = $4600
  • Cost for printing = $2400
  • Additional funds will help supplement my time while I work on getting the book done!

STRETCH GOALS!

Once we hit these milestones, these extras will be going to everyone who gets a physical perk!

  • 5K -Stickers! - UNLOCKED!! You'll get a High Born and Hell Born sticker to embellish your gear! Way to go!

  • 8K- Book Marks! UNLOCKED!! How else will you hold your place in there!?
  • 10K- Trading Cards! UNLOCKED!! Oh yeah! Each backer gets one!
  • 12K - Poster! UNLOCKED!! Everyone will get a fold-out poster of the Promo Art of the Shadow Sentry!
  • 15K- Book Mark level up - from paper to METAL! UNLOCKED!!
  • 20K - UNLOCKED!! You'll get an extra Trading Card!
  • 25K- I'll add more pages featuring an art section of sketches and prelim drawings!
  • 30K- Level up- Book goes Perfect bound!
  • 50K- I'll offer a limited edition "Unwrapped" BLACK and WHITE version of the book to all backers plus it will include sketches and preliminary art!
  • 60K- TBA - Let's see if we can do it! I've got wonderful plans in store!

Hell Born Characters- Vengent and Blood Bane!

Risks & Challenges

My main concern is just getting the book done on time. Art is always difficult because it's easy to get caught up in the little details, and my work is detailed! That's why I pushed it back to August 2020 (just in case!) I don't want to be late on this campaign! But that means I can be early!!

I want to make sure I give myself enough time and it's always good to plan for unforeseen events! They will happen! (Update: Now with the Corona Virus at hand, I'm glad I gave myself some extra time! I'll still be working to get this done early, I'm just working around my kids at home schedule etc. (Plus, my wife is due any day now with baby #4! =)) Update #2 : My wife had baby #4; on March 27th we welcomed into the world EmmaLynn James! =)

Other than that there are no concerns!

 

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

    • If you think someone else might enjoy this book, simply get the word out and make some noise about the campaign!
    • Just use the Indiegogo share tools!

    That's it!!
story_txt:
Shadow Sentry Book 1 is Fulfilled!
At this time all books have been shipped and all perks are out! Thanks so much for making this an amazing first outing for this incredible new series that will be on-going!
The campaign will officially be ending at the end of may... but before we go! We want to offer one last perk that will really make this campaign complete!

Get a look at all the lines that went into making Shadow Sentry Book 1: up-close and personal in an over-sized 7.5" x 11.5" 80 page, Hard Cover Edition! Shipping out in July!
 

 
Book 1: Into the Eternal
Will be a 48 page comic (NOW 54 PAGES!) that will launch a totally new and wide world of Heroes and Villains that will be an ongoing series if funded! Pencils, inks, and story will be done by Eric Ninaltowski, with colors provided by Kid Ikaris and Carbon Graphics! The comic will also include a Newsletter section in the back like the comics of yesteryear where you can submit Fan Art, letters, etc! The "Thank you" page will be in the Newsletter section as well! Any backer who claims a perk at $25 or more will be included on the Thank you page! (Anyone who wishes to submit comments or Fan Art for consideration in the Newsletter please check out the "FAQ" section above!)
BOOK 1 IS CURRENTLY BEING
SENT TO THE PRINTER!
 
NEW PERK ADDED!
8 METAL Trading Cards by some of the amazing talents featured on the weekly drawing competition known as Drawn and Quartered! Ceage O'Seanachain, Matt Cossin, Matthew Weldon, Elliot Fernandez, Mike S. Miller, and Kevin Sharpe! A Mystery Card from yours truly         + a DnQ Crew sticker to adorn your gear and show your love!
These will only be available with this campaign! Check em' out!

 

Variant Covers-
There are two perks for ordering a Variant Cover, a single, or the Double Variant Option! If you'd like to get all three variant covers you can simply click on the Double Option and then "Add-on" the third Variant cover! Those options will appear after you click "Get this perk!" You will also save on shipping by using the Add-on perk.

Regular Cover- Art by Eric Ninaltowski - Colors by Carbon Graphics!
PAGES!








Matthew Weldon Cover- Variant A

Here is the original line work by Matthew- This Original Cover is available for sale!! Get it quick!

Kevin Sharpe Cover - Variant B

Mike S. Miller Cover - Variant C                                                                               

MEET THE TEAM! This is the "Promo Art" - a metal comic sized version will be available in the Early Bird Special ONLY! (Names will not be on the final version)
Summary
Are you tired of the same old, same old? Constant remakes, deaths, and rebirths of your favorite characters, AGAIN!? Well I have a new and exciting concept that will unleash a world of characters and stories that will keep you busy for years to come!

I've been a published professional for about 14 years and I'm always drawing other creator's ideas, it's time work on my own! I'm passionate about creating and want to bring a new world to fans that can get them excited about comics again!
This book is my baby and I want to treat it right; with QUALITY and with that 90's flare that got me excited about comics in the first place! If we can get this book funded then it will be an ongoing series, and will constantly build upon itself! That means more stories, characters and adventures to explore!



Funding-

10K is the bear minimum it will cost to get this book made- and that's why I'm doing a Fixed Goal. If I can't make the minimum then I just can't fund the book to completion, but we'll try again another time!
Cost for page colors + Covers and additional art + letters = $4600
Cost for printing = $2400
Additional funds will help supplement my time while I work on getting the book done!



STRETCH GOALS! 
Once we hit these milestones, these extras will be going to everyone who gets a physical perk!
5K -Stickers! - UNLOCKED!! You'll get a High Born and Hell Born sticker to embellish your gear! Way to go!


8K- Book Marks! UNLOCKED!! How else will you hold your place in there!?
10K- Trading Cards! UNLOCKED!! Oh yeah! Each backer gets one!

15K- Book Mark level up - from paper to METAL! UNLOCKED!!
20K - UNLOCKED!! You'll get an extra Trading Card! 
25K- I'll add more pages featuring an art section of sketches and prelim drawings!
30K- Level up- Book goes Perfect bound!
50K- I'll offer a limited edition "Unwrapped" BLACK and WHITE version of the book to all backers plus it will include sketches and preliminary art!
60K- TBA - Let's see if we can do it! I've got wonderful plans in store!


Hell Born Characters- Vengent and Blood Bane!

Risks & Challenges
My main concern is just getting the book done on time. Art is always difficult because it's easy to get caught up in the little details, and my work is detailed! That's why I pushed it back to August 2020 (just in case!) I don't want to be late on this campaign! But that means I can be early!!
I want to make sure I give myself enough time and it's always good to plan for unforeseen events! They will happen! (Update: Now with the Corona Virus at hand, I'm glad I gave myself some extra time! I'll still be working to get this done early, I'm just working around my kids at home schedule etc. (Plus, my wife is due any day now with baby #4! =)) Update #2 : My wife had baby #4; on March 27th we welcomed into the world EmmaLynn James! =)
Other than that there are no concerns!
 


Other Ways You Can Help
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

If you think someone else might enjoy this book, simply get the word out and make some noise about the campaign!
Just use the Indiegogo share tools!

That's it!!

story:
MY STORY:

My name is Dusty, aka Tonicmole, creator of Saving the World! I’m extremely excited to bring you the third issue in my ongoing series! I hope you’ll join me to keep this amazing journey going! STW combines the nerdy depth of mainstream super heroes with the sensibilities of 90’s alternative comics. In my opinion the perfect mix of counter culture intellect, and fan service sex appeal. Something like that.

INTRODUCTION

Saving the World #3 continues the adventures of our minimum wage super heroes Kierra and Nora in their never ending fight to save the world and pay the rent. STW is like no other comic that's came before. I promise that every issue is packed full of fun, excitement, and plenty of self deprecating humor. That's a Tonic Comix guarantee!

THE COMIC:

STW #3 is a 32 page, black and white comic with a beautiful color cover by Illustrator Monk. It features two stories. "Big Burger" written by Tonicmole with art by TMNT Legend Jim Lawson, and "Witching Hour" Written and illustrated by Tonicmole. 

THE STORY:

On October 3rd at 10:30 PM the National Astronomical Detection Agency (NADA) detected a massive global disturbance. Though the disruption lasted mere seconds its effects would be immediately felt by hundreds of thousands of people, and change life on earth
forever. Across the globe people reported strange mutations, some as simple as a sixth finger, or as outlandish as our hero, Kierra who developed unlimited super strength. This is where our story begins. In the early days of a world frantically trying to make sense of the unimaginable. The rise of a world of gods and monsters, and the heroes that protect it.

ADD-ONS:

I’ve set up add-one to allow you to build the bundle that suits you. All physical bundles can have additional issues added. Do you want STW #3, and STW #1 redux? Simply choose the STW #3 tier and add a copy of STW #1 and your good to go. All comics are available as an add-on. However I’ve also included the most popular bundles as a tier if you want the easy road.


INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING:

For the first time we now provide shipping to Canada, UK, Germany and France. We will be adding new locations with future campaigns.
 

THE HYPE TRAIN:

This campaign is by far the most exciting campaign I've been a part of! My long time hero, and Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtle legend Jim Lawson joins the team to provide the art for the main feature "Big Burger". I cannot tell you how lucky I am to have Jim join me on my comicbook adventure. It is truely amazing! But wait! There's more! There's a second story written and illustrated by me titled "Witching Hour" which follows Kierra and Nora as they try to take a night off and attend a Halloween party. However, their best laid plans are thwarted by a diabolical Witch with the power to conjure ghastly beasts...by throwing them up.

STW #1 REDUX:

After selling out of STW #1’s first print I decided instead of doing a boring ol’ second print, that I’d go back and spruce it up a bit. It’s still basically the same comic I launched with, but updated with better art. 

JIM LAWSON VARIANT:

I am so excited to bring Jim Lawsons amazing style, and experience to the Saving the World Universe! To celebrate I bring you the STW#3 Jim Lawson Variant! 

 

STRETCH GOALS:

Paper Dolls! This ended up being a bigger project then I first expected! They will be printed on heavy 130lb paper stock, and be guaranteed flip’n awesome! As the campaign continues even more surprises will be revealed!

 

ME BEGGING:

Any and all support is greatly appreciated! Unable to back this campaign? No problem. Just share the live'n heck out of it! Let's do this!

story:
Death Row Sorcerer is a whimsically dark 48-page psychedelic supernatural/prison adventure written, drawn and coloured by Nick O’Gorman with Kurt Belcher as co-writer.

The story centers around Mafia lackey Dresden Lang, a man whose gambling debts are catching up to him. After a botched burglary Lang is sent to death row after he (accidently) killed somebody in the commission of a felony. Between adjusting to prison life, reading legal books and drafting his own appeals, Dresden’s execution date nears and his window to escape the state-sanctioned terminus draws close.  All hope seems lost… until he is struck by a sudden inspiration; where legal-craft had failed, perhaps a (slightly) blacker, darker art may succeed!

Magic spells, lockdowns, necromancy, prison shivs, toilet potions, riots and more, Death Row Sorcerer is an action pact romp combining the well-known tropes of prison-fiction with the zannyness of Evil Dead. Nick O’Gorman’s art vividly creates a colourful world that leaps off the page, where your ethereal witch-familiar may just be some mangey prison cat and tomes of magic are one inter-library loan away!

For people that have read Nick O'Gorman's Beyond The Wall of Sleep or HPL 1920, you’ve seen his work with Kurt on the back up stories “Shafted” and “The Devil and Mrs. Clarrence”. They’ve been working together on Death Row Sorcerer for a while and Death Row Sorcerer is their most ambitious (and awesome!) collaboration to date!

 

This is Nick's fifth crowdfunding effort, the others are all smashing successes! Nick always includes tons of freebies randomly distributed to all his physical backers including silk screened bookmarks, sketches, sketch cards, lino-block prints, process art, thumbnails and much, much more! Each book is bagged in a silk screened envelope, and if we can hit $1000, all will be coming in Gemini mailers!

Silkscreened Necronomicon Envelopes:

Some Eldritch Delirium Commissions from Prior Campaigns:

"Chase" Silk Screen/Watercolor mix media Paintings by Nick OG. 5 available per 100 backers, signed and numbered and randomly included in reward packages

.

story:
Skippy n’ Elm’r is an Instagram humour swipe comic about two fuzzy friends that live in a van and who have crazy adventures. Now, with your help, you can see Skippy n’ Elm’r and all their wacky antics in print format for the first time ever!

Hi! My name is Jack Natolino, I’m 14 years old and I live in Halifax Nova Scotia Canada. Before COVID-19, I used to take weekend art classes at NSCAD with MAD Magazine cartoonist Kyle Bridgett. One boring quarantined day my mom got in contact with Kyle and arranged for us to do private mentoring over Zoom. Together we decided I should create a webcomic and put Instagram. The idea I came up with was Skippy n’ Elm’r! At the time we thought COVID-19 would only last a few weeks but I've been making Skippy n’ Elm’r for almost a year. Now I’d like to turn the first story arc into a comic book. I’ve made many zines in the past, but this one is going to be a REAL comic book. You’ll see Skippy n’ Elm’r kidnap an anteater, kill an angry old man and get thrown in the hoosegow! So put on your BEEF tee shirt and jump into the world of Skippy n’ Elm’r.

I’m raising $600 to print Skippy n’ Elm’r as a high quality comic art zine. The more I can raise the higher the quality of product I can put out! And hey, if I raise a little less, I’ll still print something! The first Skippy n’ Elm’r comic story is already completed, AND YOU CAN YOU READ IT RIGHT NOW! I just have to lay the panels out into comic pages. I will also 

make a custom back cover. Even if you can’t contribute, you can still help me by telling your friends and family by sharing this campaign on social media! Thanks a lot!

Check out Skippy n' Elm'r on Instagram @skippynelmr

And check out my mentor Kyle Bridgett too! 

WWW.KYLE BRIDGETT.COM

story:
SHADOW HUNTERS: Bite Me! is now available Only on IndieGoGo!

“SHADOW HUNTERS” : Bite Me! Follows the story of the rebellious half vampire who prefers her smokes and cold beer over drinking blood. Between the peer pressure of her clan insisting she feeds, and her enemies who see her defiance as a weakness, she refuses to give up what little is left of her humanity. Even if it means losing everything.

The Creative Team: Written by Jason Dube with Artwork by Noel Serrato & Jason Dube and with Cover Art by Summer Dale

This is a 40-page , self-contained storyline about Jenna continues the journey of the vampire world started in the pages of the "Lylith & Mara" comic book. We expand and explore the rich and dark landscape of the vampire clans, the evolution of their different races and blood that runs through its world. This is also a more "Mature Readers" comic full of blood, gore, partial nudity and vampire violence. A great read for fans of horror and vampires. Includes Art Concepts, and Cover Gallery and Cosplay photo gallery.

Lots of Vampire Goodies.

After the success of our last campaign we wanted to add a few more items this round to have something for everyone. Let's take a look at the different cover variants available to you.

NOEL SERRATO Variant Covers!

Comic Book Artist Noel Serrato, is offering this amazing homage image of Todd Mcfarlane's Spider-Man cover, but with vampire Jenna's own signature twist to it. And this cover comes in both English & Spanish variants. (**Spanish Edition is Limited to 10 Copies) NOTE: If you select the Spanish Homage you will be asked if you'd like to ADD-ON the English Edition as well.

 

JASON DUBE Variant Covers!

JENNA Variant

CARMELLA Variant

 

2nd Chance to get LYLITH & MARA: Sisters of the Dark

With so many requests to get a copy of Lylith & Mara after the campaign ended, we decided to offer a 2nd Chance Edition for this campaign only! If you didn't get it last time, now's your chance. With a new variant "Darkness Virgin" cover (All titles and logos removed from cover) featuring Summer Dale's artwork.

 

Shadow Hunters Comic Book Tie-In

Offered with this campaign only is the tie-in comic book "Shadow Hunters" special cover edition. This 28 page comic book offering will feature 2 variant covers by Randy Kintz. You don't necessarily need this comic book to understand "Bite Me", but its fun to see how the 2 books tie-in together. (**This book is filled with sexy monster girls. Purchase at your own risk). Available in Tame & Naughty covers. 

 

TEE SHIRT:

Show off to the world your love for both hot vampire girls and beer! Black shirt silk screened with White Ink. (Available in all sizes.) **Note: Shirts shipped separately from comic books.

 

POSTER PRINT:

This gorgeously delicious art poster print by cover artist Summer Dale comes at a huge 11" x 17" on thick cover stock and dropped into a hard plastic protective sleeve. **Note: Oversized Prints shipped separately from comic books.

 

BUNDLES!!

When you just can't decide on what vampire goodness to get, we've made some discounted Bundles for you to choose from.

 

 

 

 

ORIGINAL ART:

Lots of amazing Original Art perks for you to choose from. 

Original Jenna Art on CGC 9.8 Graded "Shadow Hunters #4". Noel Serrato masters his skills of drawing the vampire rebel with Ink and Colored Markers on a Blank Cover edition of the comic book. Only 1 of a kind!

 

John Rhodes of "Nothing-Man" and Hyperverse fame is here to add his stylish and sexy Original Artwork to a Blank Cover edition of "Shadow Hunters #4". You decide what you want drawn on your cover. He leaves the option to you if you want it to be a NUDE or TAME art piece. (Only 2 Available!!)

 

Jason Dube's Original Jenna Cover art. **Note: Original Artwork shipped separately from comic books.

 

Jason Dube's Original Vampire Sisters Cover art. **Note: Original Artwork shipped separately from comic books.

 

Noel Serrato's Original Cover art. **Note: Original Artwork shipped separately from comic books.

 

Noel Serrato's Original PENCILS to the Dia De Los Muertos Print.

 

Noel Serrato's Original INKS to the Dia De Los Muertos Print.

 

Jason Dube's Original Comic Pages artwork. **Note: Original Artwork shipped separately from comic books.

 

The Goal

The goal with this campaign is to provide you with fun and entertaining high quality comics. We need enough for the printing, distribution, and fees to bring these comic books to life and in your hands. Noel Serrato and myself will be packing and shipping the comic books with Gemini Comic Flash Mailers. (The choosen way to get comic books safely to you.)

ADD ON Extras!

When you check out with your comic book pledge you will be given some cool Add Ons to apply to your comics. Watch for these extras to make your purchase a one of a kind.

STRETCH GOALS:

WE HIT $1K!! All Physical Pledge Perks will get this "Jenna" Anime Backboard Print. (Image by iRYANiC) included in their package.

WE HIT $2K!! All Physical Pledge Perks will now get a "Bite Me" Vinyl Sticker. (The tattoo that can be seen on "Jenna")  included in their package.

WE HIT $3K!! Now All Physical Pledge Perks will get a "Jenna" Bookmark. (Artwork by Darth Sarch)  included in their package.

WE HIT $4000 !! All Physical Pledge Perks will now get this "Dia De Los Muertos" themed 11" x 17" Print of Jenna. (Artwork by Noel Serrato)  included in their pledge.

Risks & Challenges

The comic books pretty much all done, we just need to get it to the printers and ship it to you. Of course this is life and I suppose anything can happen, but I really don't foresee any kind of delay in getting these into your hands.

Please Help Us Spread the Word Please!

We would appreciate any help you can provide by Sharing this page to your friends and family by just hitting the Indiegogo share buttons at the top!

Thank you for taking the time to look things over here.

Jason Dube

Follow Jason Dube on his YOUTUBE Channel:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCznTnvuBBzPttS3630BsJNg
