After the success of our last campaign we wanted to add a few more items this round to have something for everyone. Let's take a look at the different cover variants available to you.
NOEL SERRATO Variant Covers!
Comic Book Artist Noel Serrato, is offering this amazing homage image of Todd Mcfarlane's Spider-Man cover, but with vampire Jenna's own signature twist to it. And this cover comes in both English & Spanish variants. (**Spanish Edition is Limited to 10 Copies) NOTE: If you select the Spanish Homage you will be asked if you'd like to ADD-ON the English Edition as well.

 
JASON DUBE Variant Covers!
JENNA Variant

CARMELLA Variant

 
2nd Chance to get LYLITH & MARA: Sisters of the Dark
With so many requests to get a copy of Lylith & Mara after the campaign ended, we decided to offer a 2nd Chance Edition for this campaign only! If you didn't get it last time, now's your chance. With a new variant "Darkness Virgin" cover (All titles and logos removed from cover) featuring Summer Dale's artwork.

 
Shadow Hunters Comic Book Tie-In
Offered with this campaign only is the tie-in comic book "Shadow Hunters" special cover edition. This 28 page comic book offering will feature 2 variant covers by Randy Kintz. You don't necessarily need this comic book to understand "Bite Me", but its fun to see how the 2 books tie-in together. (**This book is filled with sexy monster girls. Purchase at your own risk). Available in Tame & Naughty covers. 

 

TEE SHIRT:
Show off to the world your love for both hot vampire girls and beer! Black shirt silk screened with White Ink. (Available in all sizes.) **Note: Shirts shipped separately from comic books.

 
POSTER PRINT:
This gorgeously delicious art poster print by cover artist Summer Dale comes at a huge 11" x 17" on thick cover stock and dropped into a hard plastic protective sleeve. **Note: Oversized Prints shipped separately from comic books.

 
BUNDLES!!
When you just can't decide on what vampire goodness to get, we've made some discounted Bundles for you to choose from.

 

 


 

 
ORIGINAL ART:
Lots of amazing Original Art perks for you to choose from. 
Original Jenna Art on CGC 9.8 Graded "Shadow Hunters #4". Noel Serrato masters his skills of drawing the vampire rebel with Ink and Colored Markers on a Blank Cover edition of the comic book. Only 1 of a kind!

 
John Rhodes of "Nothing-Man" and Hyperverse fame is here to add his stylish and sexy Original Artwork to a Blank Cover edition of "Shadow Hunters #4". You decide what you want drawn on your cover. He leaves the option to you if you want it to be a NUDE or TAME art piece. (Only 2 Available!!)

 
Jason Dube's Original Jenna Cover art. **Note: Original Artwork shipped separately from comic books.

 
Jason Dube's Original Vampire Sisters Cover art. **Note: Original Artwork shipped separately from comic books.

 
Noel Serrato's Original Cover art. **Note: Original Artwork shipped separately from comic books.

 
Noel Serrato's Original PENCILS to the Dia De Los Muertos Print.

 
Noel Serrato's Original INKS to the Dia De Los Muertos Print.

 
Jason Dube's Original Comic Pages artwork. **Note: Original Artwork shipped separately from comic books.

 
The Goal
The goal with this campaign is to provide you with fun and entertaining high quality comics. We need enough for the printing, distribution, and fees to bring these comic books to life and in your hands. Noel Serrato and myself will be packing and shipping the comic books with Gemini Comic Flash Mailers. (The choosen way to get comic books safely to you.)


ADD ON Extras!
When you check out with your comic book pledge you will be given some cool Add Ons to apply to your comics. Watch for these extras to make your purchase a one of a kind.


STRETCH GOALS:
WE HIT $1K!! All Physical Pledge Perks will get this "Jenna" Anime Backboard Print. (Image by iRYANiC) included in their package.

WE HIT $2K!! All Physical Pledge Perks will now get a "Bite Me" Vinyl Sticker. (The tattoo that can be seen on "Jenna")  included in their package.


WE HIT $3K!! Now All Physical Pledge Perks will get a "Jenna" Bookmark. (Artwork by Darth Sarch)  included in their package.

WE HIT $4000 !! All Physical Pledge Perks will now get this "Dia De Los Muertos" themed 11" x 17" Print of Jenna. (Artwork by Noel Serrato)  included in their pledge.

Risks & Challenges
The comic books pretty much all done, we just need to get it to the printers and ship it to you. Of course this is life and I suppose anything can happen, but I really don't foresee any kind of delay in getting these into your hands.
Please Help Us Spread the Word Please!
We would appreciate any help you can provide by Sharing this page to your friends and family by just hitting the Indiegogo share buttons at the top!
Thank you for taking the time to look things over here.
Jason Dube
Follow Jason Dube on his YOUTUBE Channel:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCznTnvuBBzPttS3630BsJNg

story:
My name is Damion Waldbrunn, artist and creator for Day1Comics!

I have been making comics, specifically Realmer X comics for 25 years. This collects everything I've created for Realmer X from that point until today!

 

What We Need & What You Get!

FOR $5: You get the Digital Edition of the Realmer Omnibus 2021, combined over 125 pages of comics from across the timeline of Realmer X!

FOR $10: You get all the digital goodness, as well as the Realmer X Omnibus 12 track EP of original music inspired by Realmer X!

FOR $15: You get the Physical Edition of the Realmer Omnibus 2021, as well as the Realmer X Omnibus 12 track EP of original music inspired by Realmer X!

FOR $35: You get all the digital sights and sounds plus a rare Limited Edition Realmer X Action Figure! Only 25 figures will be produced!

FOR $50: You get all the digital sights and sound, the Omnibus Physical edition,  plus a rare Limited Edition Realmer X Action Figure! Only 25 figures will be produced!

 

Risks & Challenges

All the files are done, and the 3D printer is ready to go.

All digital releases will be sent out at the end of the campaign.

The Physical Editions and the Action Figure (created by OH! Toys) will be printed and packaged by the beginning of August and will be shipped out no later that the 8/15/2021

 

I can be contacted AT ANY TIME to answer questions you may have.

story:
With the dying words of a corrupt priest, New Detroit's top hitman is cursed and transformed into the demon crime boss Johnny Phantasm. Will his climb to the top mean the destruction of his soul? Or will he become the savior his city desperately needs?

Scarlet Heart is a hero from a past generation. He only returns in hopes to alter Johnny Phantasm's future and to see if he can help him control the burn!!!

 

If you haven't had a chance to get into Johnny Phantasm yet NOWS your chance. The complete story is available HERE. Check out the Merch Booth and go over our perks.

Everything is ready to ship!

Some of you are unable to attend cons right now but fear not, all these goodies are available for you right here on IndieGogo!

We have all our comics available as well as some limited comics and action figures. Act quick!

Also! Most of the stickers, buttons, pins, loose action figures, postcards, etc. are available as

ADD-ONs in checkout!

Thx for checking out Riot Press!

ART by PATRICK THOMAS PARNELL

story:
Genisis #1 is now available Only on IndieGoGo!

Genisis is the teenage angel girl sent from the heavens from the beginning of time to observe the evolution of Earth. Knowing what fate lies in store for not only the planet but all humanity, Genisis begins to wonder if there is a way that she can alter the path.

 

 

Genisis #1  is a Supernatural story taking place in Victorian England that will take you on a rollercoaster ride. Includes art gallery from various artists, with Concept and design sketches

The Creative Team: Written by Jason Dube, Artwork by Sarch D. (Sergio Robles), with Colors by Diego Vasquez and Lettering by Jaymes Reed

We are so excited to be able to bring this comic to you! This is a story I have been wanting to tell since the early days of my Scattered series. But I need your help to make this happen. I hope you take a look at the different reward tiers I'm offering and see something of interest to you.

The Goal

The goal with this campaign is to provide a quality comic product to you. We need enough for the printing, distribution, and fees to bring this "Genisis" comic book to life. I will be packing and shipping the comic books with Gemini Comic Flash Mailers. (Shipping is included in Tier rewards except Original Art as they must be shipped in larger packages)

We're keeping the perks simple.

Just click on a perk on the right to open its details.

 

Variant Edition Cover by Summer Dale. **This will be limited to 50 copies

 

**Original art by Sarch D. (Sergio Robles) - Front Cover

 

**Original art by Sarch D. (Sergio Robles) - Page 3

 

**Original art by Sarch D. (Sergio Robles) - Page 4

 

**Original art by Sarch D. (Sergio Robles) - Page 13

 

**Original art by Sarch D. (Sergio Robles) - Page 15

**Original art by Sarch D. (Sergio Robles) - Page 16

 

**Original Pencil & Ink art by Jason Dube (signed)

 

 

STRETCH GOALS UNLOCKED!

All Pledge Perks getting a physical reward being shipped, will also get this cool Vinyl Sticker included in their package. Next STRETCH GOAL will unlock at the $1000 mark.

All Pledge Perks getting a physical reward being shipped, will now get the Genisis Backboard Print. (Image by Summer Dale for the variant edition cover) included in their package. Next STRETCH GOAL will unlock at the $2000 mark.

 

Risks & Challenges

The comic book is in the final word bubble editing stages. Everything is done, we just need to get it to the printers and ship it to you. Of course this is life and I suppose anything can happen, but I really don't foresee any kind of delay in getting this into your hands.

 

Please Help Us Spread the Word Please!

I would appreciate any help you can provide by Sharing this page to your friends and family by just hitting the Indiegogo share buttons at the top!

Thank you for taking the time to look things over here.

Jason Dube

Follow Jason Dube on his YOUTUBE Channel:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCznTnvuBBzPttS3630BsJNg

story:
The paths of fate have brought you here!

In the northern most realm. In the cold wintry valley of Valerium the barbarians of Storm Fall follow the way of the fates. One such Valerian, named after the valley itself, takes a journey of here own. Carving her own fate one bloody body at a time, Valeria finds defying the fates comes with a price. 

DOOM FATE is a 48 plus page full color graphic novel that will take you on a sword and sorcery adventure like no other. If you like magic, monsters, blood and barbarians, this book is for you!

 

PREVIEW ART

Here you can watch the progress of these pages as they go from pencils to finished product.

 

 

 

 

CHALLENGES

Everything has been planned out. This is my second project. After successfully filling a prior campaign,  I have learned much about the fulfillment process. The only issue I see is printing and stretch goals being a hold up. But plans are in place to ensure those are taken care of early. Of course things happen, but I vow to always keep you informed (you will probally get sick of hearing from me)

story:
I WANT TO HEAR YOU SCREAM

PANOPTYS ARGOS, the last man, hunts the galaxies seeking to resurrect humanity after an alien conspiracy believed their human problem solved. A mere phantom, his cybernetic body consecrates an unholy rage with a singular goal. His wrath will not be denied.

He is joined by SYNESSA, an artificial human built for deep-space operations who, unbeknownst to her, holds a key to humanity's return. She aids only to gain the strange technology ARGOS seems to effortlessly wield. If humanity was wiped out, it was surely due to their weakness.

HUMANS WILL RETURN BUT IT WILL NOT BE A PEACEFUL REBIRTH

For fans of Y: THE LAST MAN, BLADE RUNNER, and V FOR VENDETTA, this limited series aims to tackle the philosophical implications of non-biological consciousness, the transient nature of morality, and humanity's future, all while venturing the cosmos, facing foes, and enacting a revenge more than a decade in the making.

This is ANOMYX STUDIOS' first project, so we hope you'll join us on this ride to blend poetry, art, and philosophy into stories for the age of chaos.

 

Early Sketches:

Not only do you have the choice to receive the digital copy of the story, you will also be able to purchase original, never-before heard DARK SYNTHWAVE music as produced by thegigisup.

You'll be able to choose one or all three of the original soundtracks, along with other bonuses not limited to sketches, the original script, and even the opportunity to have your name in the credits of the completed graphic novel (volume 5).

story:
HERE ARE THE STRETCH GOALS!!!

 

1st Stretch Goal - $12.5K - UNLOCKED!

If we hit the first goal, the story will be expanded from 28 pages to 32 pages.  This means you are getting 4 MORE PAGES of script and art from Chuck Dixon, Brent McKee and Jok.  All for the same price you already paid!

+ We will give away one original page of art by Brent McKee from AIRBOY #51 (we will select a random number from however many backers we have at the time we hit the Stretch Goal, and whoever has that number gets the page!)

 

2nd Stretch Goal - $15K- UNLOCKED!

If we hit the second goal, we will expand the size of the comic from 32 pages to 48 pages.  This will allow us to add other content, such as all the incredible AIRBOY sketches you have seen in this campaign, and maybe an essay or two about the history of AIRBOY!

+ We will give away one original page of art by Brent McKee from AIRBOY #51 (we will select a random number from however many backers we have at the time we hit the Stretch Goal, and whoever has that number gets the page!)

 

3rd Stretch Goal - $17.5K- UNLOCKED!

If we hit the third goal, we will include a back-up story featuring one of the other characters from AIRBOY.  Will it be Valkyrie, The Heap, maybe Skywolf?  You will only find out if the goal is unlocked!

+ We will give away one original page of art by Brent McKee from AIRBOY #51 (we will select a random number from however many backers we have at the time we hit the Stretch Goal, and whoever has that number gets the page!)

 

4th Stretch Goal - $20K- UNLOCKED!

If we hit the forth goal, everyone who backed this campaign will receive AIRBOY #51 and AIRBOY #52!!!!!!!!!  TWO NEW ISSUES OF AIRBOY WILL BE DELIVERED TO ALL BACKERS!

+ We will give away one original page of art by Brent McKee from AIRBOY #51 (we will select a random number from however many backers we have at the time we hit the Stretch Goal, and whoever has that number gets the page!)

story:
The Good Knight: Nightmare Realm #1 (of 12) is the first project from Mystical Comics, a new upstart publisher with a shared universe.

Sir Alexander, a medieval knight from the past, trapped in the form of a teddy bear by his previous Master, finds himself indebted to Eric, and tasked with protecting his son.

Queen Belladonna will stop at nothing to enact her revenge against Eric, of whom she shares a complicated and entangled past.

She plans to kidnap his only son and sacrifice him as a vessel for the Dragon King, who is foretold to one day return.

Now, Sir Alexander must enlist both friend and foe to retrieve Jack on a long and grueling quest, leaving Earth behind to travel to Zarthus, Queen Belladonna’s home world.

The Good Knight #1 preview page​ 1

The Good Knight #1 preview page​ 2

 

The Good Knight #1 preview page​ 3

The Good Knight #1 preview page 4

The Good Knight #1 preview pages 5 and 6

The Good Knight #1 preview page 7

The Good Knight #1 preview page 8

Check out all of the perks available for this campaign. 

THE GOOD KNIGHT: NIGHTMARE REALM #1 Main Cover (Sam White)

THE GOOD KNIGHT: NIGHTMARE REALM #1 (of 12) Cover B (Pablo Romero​)​

T-Shirt Artwork by Pablo Romero

Production is already underway on TGK:NR #1. All 12 issues of this maxi-series have been fully scripted and Francisco Narde is hard at work on the interior art.

Story by Crystal McGhee

Script by Crystal McGhee

Interior Art by Francisco Narde

Letters by Eric Weathers

Cover A by Sam White

Cover B by Pablo Romero

Cover C by Jean Luc Meisel

Comic Book Letter Column (all tiers can send in fan-art, letters, emails for this column) + Featured Fan Art from the backers + Preview pages of Lunar Phases! 

Set of 6 Trading Cards w/stats and power levels! ($50 tier and up)

Pullover Hoodies w/The Knight's Order Logo + 2 Folded Pin-Up Posters! ($100 tier exclusive)

Hoodie Artwork

Throne Room Pin-up by Pablo Romero

Transformation Pin-up by Joseph White​

Jean Luc Meisel Variant Cover ($50 tier and up) *work-in-progress of the variant below*

THE GOOD KNIGHT: NIGHTMARE REALM #1 (of 12) Cover C (Jean Luc Meisel​)​

The Good Knight: Nightmare Realm #1 will be accompanied by a second issue for all physical tier backers! + Performance bonuses for Francisco Narde and Pablo Romero! 

THE GOOD KNIGHT: SINS OF THE FATHER #2 (of 12) Main Cover (art by George Alexopoulos with colors by Jesse Heagy)

I have experience with prepping print files for indie comics, as well as, digital files for screen printing for various clients.

The most challenging part of this might be in regards to dealing with shipping but we have safeguards in place to avoid possible issues.  

-Crystal

Thanks for your support and don't forget to follow this project and our team on social media: 

 

MYSTICAL COMICS

  • Twitter
  • Facebook
  • YouTube

 

OUR TEAM

  • Crystal McGhee's Twitter
  • Eric Weathers' Twitter
  • Pablo Romero's Twitter
  • Jean Luc Meisel's Twitter
  • Sam White's Twitter, Twitch

Have a question? You can email us here: support@mysticalcomics.com.

($100 tier exclusive)Hoodie ArtworkThrone Room Pin-up by Pablo RomeroTransformation Pin-up by Joseph White​Jean Luc Meisel Variant Cover ($50 tier and up) *work-in-progress of the variant below*THE GOOD KNIGHT: NIGHTMARE REALM #1 (of 12) Cover C (Jean Luc Meisel​)​The Good Knight: Nightmare Realm #1 will be accompanied by a second issue for all physical tier backers! + Performance bonuses for Francisco Narde and Pablo Romero! THE GOOD KNIGHT: SINS OF THE FATHER #2 (of 12) Main Cover (art by George Alexopoulos with colors by Jesse Heagy)I have experience with prepping print files for indie comics, as well as, digital files for screen printing for various clients.The most challenging part of this might be in regards to dealing with shipping but we have safeguards in place to avoid possible issues.  -CrystalThanks for your support and don't forget to follow this project and our team on social media:  MYSTICAL COMICS
Twitter
Facebook
YouTube
 OUR TEAM
Crystal McGhee's Twitter
Eric Weathers' Twitter
Pablo Romero's Twitter
Jean Luc Meisel's Twitter

Sam White's Twitter, Twitch

Have a question? You can email us here: support@mysticalcomics.com.

story:
CAMPAIGN OVERVIEW

Chrono Mechanics is a self-contained 60-page PG-13 comic.  

This retro-fitted action/adventure time travel story follows a team of highly diverse and ego-driven Time Repairmen as they race the clock to keep the earth's erratically merging time lines from imploding.  To compound their problems is a self-centered work-a-phobic new recruit who may be the one thing they can't fix before the whole earth falls apart!

We hope you will join the side splitting adventures of Team 9.2 of Sector 7, the best team of 'knuckle-busting, working class Joes' to ever punch a time card.  So climb on board a Chrono, Inc. Time Ship with Oot (entrepreneurial caveman), Caravaggio (Renaissance artist/inventor), Zyn (alien child deity) and Doug (70s rock legend) as they and our full cast of insanely funny characters save Time.  Hey, to these guys, it's just all in a day's work!

 

Working on this book are:  Pamela Thibert (Co-Writer), Jeff Eckleberry (Letterer) and Render Contender (Pencils Assist) and of course, little 'ole me, Art Thibert!

 

STORY PAGES

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

WIP SKETCHBOOK

The Chrono Mechanics Sketch Book is a limited edition book that is signed by Art Thibert.  Follow Eugene, the Chrono, Inc. Elucidator, as he guides you through the history, development art, character designs, bonus facts and more as it relates to our Mechanics and their workday misadventures!      

SKETCHBOOK PAGES

 

 

VARIANT COVERS COLLECTION

BY SUPERSTAR TALENTS

OOT BY SEAN 'CHEEKS' GALLOWAY

 

DOUG BY TOM BANCROFT

 

ZYN BY AARON LOPRESTI

CARAVAGGIO BY CARLO BARBERI

(And inked by Art Thibert )

 

SOME FINAL CAMPAIGN WORDS:  I want to take a moment and thank everyone who supports the work that I do.  Basically, as an artist, I seem to live in the vacuum that is the inside of my head.  So it brings me great joy to know that people have embraced Doug, Oot, Caravaggio and Zyn as they set out on their crazy adventures.  Thanks for laughing along with me and Pamela.

Big thank yous also go to Render Contender and Jeff Eckleberry for their time and efforts to make this book look awesome!

If you would like to see Chrono Mechanics come to life subscribe to my YouTube channel, and you can watch the day-to-day creative process for this book.  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC47tEPJ2T2gEb8...

story:
"It's a pretty funny parody," - Cyberfrog and Green Lantern Artist, Ethan Van Sciver's endorsement of RoboToad!

 

Hello Potential IndieGoGo Backers!  Welcome to the campaign to fund ROBOTOAD: REKT MANLET! 

HERE'S THE STORY: 

It's 2020, and battlebots are the hottest new internet bloodsport.  Preston has made his finest bot yet, something that will transform battlebots forever -- but will RoboToad be enough? 

Bots have three rules: 

1. STEAL UNDERPANTS!  

2. ....

3. PROFIT! 

Survivors of the bot arena go back to their homes, hole up in their basements and eat cheetos.

ROBOTOAD: REKT MANLET  is the long-awaited book you've been waiting for!  It will be 22 pages long, and if we can reach $20,000 in funding, it'll also have the same beautiful chromium cover that some other frog comic sported!  We can do it!

Story by Jon Del Arroz

Art By Krimzon Flapjaques

Colors by JennC

And look at that fantastic cover! 

 

THE PERKS!

 

THE EXECUTIVE COMIC BOOK! 

This is the ULTIMATE way to enjoy ROBOTOAD: REKT MANLET! 

It's a comic book. With pages. To read a story. 

 

BUBBLE MAILER SHIPPING ENVELOPE 

Order one book or more, and your perks will be shipped in a padded envelope!  I won't even eat fried chicken and drag my fingers across it before packing it!  Your books will be protected by a bubble layer with a sticker label on the front of it!

NOTE: These are shipping containers, and no guarantee that they'll arrive in mint condition!  But they're pretty durable and tough!  

 

STRETCH GOALS!

 

ROBOTOAD: REKT MANLET has some terrific bonuses, and since it's gonna be such a successful campaign, let's make the most of it!  For ROBOTOAD: REKT MANLET I'd like to start off like this:

At $15,000: All versions of ROBOTOAD: REKT MANLET come with special collector edition bookmarks.

At $25,000: All backers of ROBOTOAD: REKT MANLET will have chromium covers.

At $50,000: All backers of ROBOTOAD: REKT MANLET  will receive a copy of ROBOTOAD: BLOOD MONEY, a comic book with art TBD! 

AT $60,000 ALL BACKERS will receive a promo trading card called "GAMMA."

AT $70,000 ALL BACKERS will receive a promo trading card called "BACK HOLE".

Let's do a CHROMIUM ROBOTOAD TRADING CARD once we pass $100K!

At $125K, let's do a CHROMIUM SALA-MA'AM-DROID TRADING CARD!

At $150K, let's do a CHROMIUM VIKKI VERSE TRADING CARD!

AT $500K ALL EXECUTIVE COMIC BACKERS will receie a 2021 ROBOTOAD WALL CALENDAR!

At $1 MILLION ALL BACKERS WILL BE INVITED TO A SPECIAL PARTY BEHIND A PIZZA PARLOR! 

Read if you love Cyberfrog, Cyberfrog: Bloodhoney, Cyberfrog: Rekt Planet, Ethan Van Sciver, Ethan Van Sciver's, Sweetcast, Downcast, Clint Stoker, Red Rooster, Preston Poulter, Doug TenNapel, Bigfoot Bill, Mike S. Miller, Lonestar Heart of the Hero, Lonestar Soul of the Soldier, White Widow, Cyberfrog Ribbitcoin, Cyberfrog: Unforgettable Tales, Kamen America, Timothy Lim, Mark Pellegrini, That Star Wars Girl Presents Vampirella, Richard C. Meyer, PANdemic, Jawbreakers Lost Souls, Jawbreakers God-King, Shadow Sentry, Cash Grab, Cecil, Jon Malin, Graveyard Shift, Super Harem, Wenger, Bigfoot Bill 2, Earthworm Jim, Jawbreakers Grand Bizarre, FragaBoom's Black Flag, The Lucent, Graveyard Shift Vol III, Six-Gun Gorilla, The Littlest Umbrella, Another Case for the Littlest Umbrella, The Plot Holes, Sean Gordon Murphy, That Umbrella Guy, ThatUmbrellaGuy.

story:
KAYAS- A Story of Blood and Stone, takes place long before the Earth was formed. In a realm that sits at the foundation of time. Where might, magic and high adventure reign supreme.

In issue #1 we follow a lone rider named Maya who is being hunted down. Her cargo is the key to her freedom and to her damnation. She blazes a trail across a foreign land and hopes that she will lose her pursuers in the crystal labyrinth known as the "Dragon Mouth Pass".  The ripple effect of this moment cascades into a chain of events that will echo throughout the lives of all in the realm, especially a teenage boy named Nito.  

Nito has lived his whole life in the "Ever-Growing Forest"and has been trained in martial arts under the watchful eyes of the strange (and stinky) hermit 'Cat Master Lee', 'Trigger' the chain smoking "fowl" mouthed chicken and 'Sissik' a giant and apathetic rattlesnake. But when Nito is entrusted with a rare oddity called a seeker stone, they are thrown into an odyssey of adventure and peril!!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Hello everybody!

I am Ryan Cardinal! Thank you so much for taking the time to look at my campaign! For 19 years I worked as a tattoo artist, but recently I’ve been working in the animation world doing storyboards. I’ve been lucky enough to work with a bunch of great people and have done some really cool projects. Most notably has been the fan favorite animated series on NETFLIX called The Hollow. On season one I was a storyboard revisionist and I just wrapped up doing boards for season 2 which has been announced for a release in 2020

 

But before all of that, all I have ever wanted to do was make and draw comic books. Now I want to tell the story of my creator owned project -KAYAS: A Story of Blood and Stone!  This series is all about high-impact action, martial arts mayhem, swords, sorcery, monsters and the spirit of adventure (plus some comedy and drama to break up all the battles and running around!).

 

KAYAS is intended for Young Adult Readers ages 13+.  It contains violence, use of tobacco/alcohol, body horror, suggestive themes and awkward scenarios

The campaign for KAYAS has a fixed goal of $3,000 to produce the 1st print run of this exciting Indiegogo exclusive!
 

STRETCH GOALS have been ACTIVATED!!
 

UNLOCKED!! - $5000- Trading card #1- A black and white trading card the Character Nito!

Currently Locked - $8000- Kayas bookmark - Art Nouveau drawn bookmark featuring an arrow and vial, these 2 items have their role to play in issue #1!

Currently Locked - $10,000- Trading card #2- A black and white trading card with Lady Kudara and "The Thief"!

Currently Locked -$15,000- 5x7 inch KAYAS Print exclusive to the Issue #1! This print is the 1st in a 9 part series that will be continued with each individual Issue of KAYAS! Issues 1-9 of KAYAS will have this stretch goal and when all 9 prints are collected together, they will form a 15 x 21 inch poster!

Currently Locked - $20,000- Sticker set- This sticker set will have Characters from KAYAS +Trading card #3 which will activate the “Original art -trading card contest” 

More information about the “Original art -trading card contest” when this goal becomes activated!


Currently Locked - $25,000- ? 

Currently Locked -$30,000- ?

Currently Locked -$40,000- ?

story:
SUPPLEMENTAL book features stories written by talent search winners Cal Jameson and Von Klaus with art by Render Contender and Todd Mulrooney! 3 stories, 60 pages in all with the Epilogue for VOL II, a 20 page introduction to new villain KILLER 99 and finally a special Prologue leading us towards VOL III by Graveyard Shift creator writer Mark Poulton and artist Mike McMahon featuring Mike S. Miller's LONESTAR!

Keep checking back here as we update with more art including SUPPLEMENTAL pages!

Books are planned to be colored by returning GRAVEYARD SHIFT colorist Anthony"ZEE" George and lettered by Eric Weathers!

$45,000 STRETCH GOAL*UNLOCKED*-GN UPGRADES! We will upgrade VOL II interior pages from 70 lb to 85 lb. making it a notch above the rest! Book Gets a spine! "Bigger, stronger, faster!"

$50,000 STRETCH GOAL*UNLOCKED*- First round of BONUSES to the GS WRITERS and ARTISTS(Jon and Mark excluded ;))! Every 50k raised gives another round of bonuses!

$60,000 STRETCH GOAL*UNLOCKED*- Campaign exclusive TRADING CARD! "YOU Get a trading card and YOU get a trading card!"

$75,000 STRETCH GOAL*UNLOCKED*- GN UPGRADE ROUND 2! VOL II interior pages will max out at the cherished 105 lb paper stock!

$85,000 STRETCH GOAL*UNLOCKED*- GRAVEYARD SHIFT PRINT by Andrew Huerta(SOVEREIGN)! One of the most dynamic styles in existence today, Andrew Huerta will create an exclusive print for all backers, dimensions will fit within a gemini mailer(approximately the dimensions of the book)!! BEAUTIFUL for framing!

$95,000 STRETCH GOAL*UNLOCKED*- Exclusive TRADING CARD of KILLER 99! Our Supplemental book introduces the 1st appearance of KILLER 99, now he gets his first TRADING CARD! If you miss out on the Supplemental hopefully this card will make the wait for VOL III easier where KILLER 99 is unleashed!!

$100,000 STRETCH GOAL*UNLOCKED*- #SIXFIGURESYOUNGLADY Second round of BONUSES to the GS WRITERS and ARTISTS(Jon and Mark excluded ;))! Every 50k raised gives another round of bonuses!

$130,000 STRETCH GOAL- GRAVEYARD SHIFT STICKER! Get a cool sticker featuring the GS logo for your Guitar, Tool Box, Skateboard, Laptop, car, sibling's face or whatever you'd like!

$140,000 STRETCH GOAL- GS DRAWN AND QUARTERED ART GALLERY! Join us and be apart of the book! We're adding an art gallery into VOL II for everyone that participated in the DRAWN AND QUARTERED drawing contest for GRAVEYARD SHIFT featured on Mike S. Miller's YouTube Channel and the "Draw along thread" ran by Edwin Boyette on Twitter. If you participated as a pro or fan we want to thank you by publishing your image if you would like, you may do whatever you want with the image to bring it to completion including adding color. If you participated you are IN! High Res final file must be no less than 300 DPI, send to KoniWaves@Gmail.com and title Email "GS DRAWN AND QUARTERED". Be sure to include your online screen name that you participated under and your real name(Not required) if you'd like it credited as such.

$150,000 STRETCH GOAL- Third round of BONUSES to the GS WRITERS and ARTISTS(Jon and Mark excluded ;))! Every 50k raised gives another round of bonuses!

$170,000 STRETCH GOAL- SECRET 'BEAT MIKE" STRETCH GOAL!!(Hint: It's another book for ALL BACKERS!)

 

Any questions or concerns please contact us at Koniwaves@Gmail.com.

Please note that when the campaign is closed, all sales are final so we can produce these high quality books and get them out to you as soon as possible. We value your patronage and endeavor to give you a top quality graphic novel. Thank you.

story:
Hello IndieGoGo Backers!

 

The MASSIVE crowdfunding success of CYBERFROG: BLOODHONEY and CYBERFROG 2: REKT PLANET have lead to curiosity about the early issues of CYBERFROG that I wrote and drew from 1993-1998!  Those books are scarce, and when you can find them, they're usually very expensive!

I've taken the two earliest comics, colored them and re-lettered them, and released them to much success with CYBERFROG: UNFROGETTABLE TALES, but fans have called for a complete, exhaustive collection.  And I listen to fans!

This campaign features a hardcover collection of EVERY CyberFrog project from those early years, unaltered, unimproved...just as they were originally presented, but in a much nicer format.  That means the issues that were originally in black and white will stay in black and white, and the issues that were in color, will be represented in their original color!

  The book contains:

Hall of Heroes CYBERFROG #1 and #2, plus Hall of Heroes Presents #0, CYBERFROG #1-4, CYBERFROG: RESERVOIR FROG #1-2, CYBERFROG #0, SALAMANDROID ZINE, CYBERFROG vs. CREED, AMPHIBIONIX #1-2, and every short story, interview, pin up, variant cover...we're even putting the house advertisements in here!  It's going to be as complete as we can possibly make it!  Plus, I've done a new wraparound cover for it, to make it as presentable as possible!

And because the writing and drawing work was already finished 25 years ago, I don't have to pay myself to do it!  And that means we can offer you this beautiful tome for $30.

JUNIOR EXECUTIVE EDITION!

We're also offering the WARTS AND ALL hardcover with an exclusive "Frog Skin" slipcase, autographed by me, Ethan Van Sciver.

Warts and All Compendium – Executive Edition
Same contents and specifications will be the same as the “standard edition” with the following new
features:

Unique 4C dust jacket with foil stamped logo
 Textured faux “frog skin” paper over board slip case with foil stamped logo and 4C printed
die cut on-lay 4” W x 5.5” H
 Gold foil page edging
 Green satin ribbon marker

and including a brand new collection of all of the CYBERFROG material that we could get our hands on that pre-dates the first published issue!

And that's called...  

CYBERFROG: FROGAPALOOZA ZINE '93-94

A bonus magazine that will offer a deep-dive look into the creation of CyberFrog and his earliest comics!  This 60+ page magazine features entirely never before published art, and will definitely amuse and delight Frog fans!  An exclusive bonus with the JUNIOR EXECUTIVE and EXECUTIVE Tiers! 

JUST ADDED!  CYBERFROG: SURVIVORS COLORING BOOK!

This awesome and fun classic COLORING BOOK is available to back for $12, but will also be included in BOTH EXECUTIVE BOX EDITIONS, free!

 

 

 

EXECUTIVE BOX EDITION!

Limited to 500, this is your SUBSCRIPTION to the campaign!  You'll receive the WARTS AND ALL HARDCOVER in the FROGSKIN SLIPCASE, plus one of everything (EXCEPT HATS OR HOODIES) that's offered here!  You'll receive one of everything that may be added to the campaign later!  You'll also receive the exclusive metal CYBERFROG figurine! If there's a new perk added to the campaign, YOU'RE ALREADY GETTING IT!  It'll be in your box!

 

CYBERFROG APPAREL!!  At last!

Because so many people demanded it, we've gotten one of the best clothing designers (these guys do merch for Coca-Cola and lots of other big brands!) to design our baseball caps and beanies, as well as an absolutely beautiful hoodie!  I can't say enough about the quality of these items...they're truly the best of the best!  The hoodie is soft, and exquisitely detailed from the lining to the silver CyberFrog image on the back!  You'll wear it everywhere!  Sizes from X-Small to 3-XL, we'll be able to fit almost everyone!  Choose your size at checkout!

ALSO: To save money on shipping, back ONE apparel item and then ADD ON as many more hats as you'd like at Check Out for NO ADDITIONAL SHIPPING CHARGE!  (this doesn't apply to the hoodies...they're bulky!)

 

And we've got 6 choices for hats!  Check these out!

Lots more stuff is coming!  

STRETCH GOALS to be announced on Day Two!

Thank you everyone!  Let's get this Frog jumpin'!

story:
(Indiegogo Exclusive Cover by Dave T)

My name is Michael Critzer, but most know me as Professor Geek from my popular YouTube channel on superheroes and mythology. For years I've published short fiction in genre anthologies from Firebringer Press and literary magazines such as The Rind and Golden Walkman. As a college professor, I study and teach on both comic books and the power of short fiction (read one of my short tales here: https://michaelcritzer.files.wordpress.com/2019/02/sirena-by-michael-critzer.pdf). But though I've authored plenty of short tales, I've yet to publish a collection or any in graphic form. As a graphic novel, Tales from the Stacks will combine both of those things. But I need your help!

I've hired incredible artists, Keung Lee, Illustrator Monk, Ralph del Mundo, and Dave T for the interior art. Together we seek to offer you a graphic novel that will thrill and haunt you and call you back for multiple readings.

 

(Librarian interior pages by Dave T)

 

(Lady Inanna Limited Landscape Variant by Dave T)

 

(Interior art for "The Lady Inanna" by Ralph del Mundo)

 

(Jon Malin's Wynter Variant Cover — Colored by Kyle Ritter)

 

(Interior art for the story "A Fire in Wynter" by Illustrator Monk)

 

(Evelyn Variant by Keung Lee)

(Keung Lee's interior pages from "Discovering Evelyn")

 

 

(The Bewitching Beauties Bundle, each print signed and numbered print by Dave T)

 

$10,000 Stretch Goal: Bookmark Keep your place when the suspense is too much to take with a bookmark featuring art by Pablo Romero of one of the ladies of the Stacks! See below (not the finalized layout), and if you want the entire set, see the add-on to the right.

$20,000 Stretch Goal: Library Card Issued by the Librarian himself, with special permission to borrow from the Stacks!

$30,000 Stretch Goal: Trading Card Add our thrilling anthology to your collection of Collectible trading cards!

$40,000 Stretch Goal: Graphic Novel Upgrade! We'll add a spine to the finished product and improve the page stock of the book!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't afford to back us just yet, you can still be a great help to us!

  • Share the campaign across Twitter and any other social media!
  • Tune into Professor Geek's YouTube channel and share the videos and streams promoting the book! https://goo.gl/Sbxwg4

story:
PRODUCT -- 200/200 PAGES COMPLETE!

XENOTYPE is an dark science fiction series that combines the best of western storytelling with shonen battle manga!

This genre redefining epic introduces the high-flying transformation hero ESPER and showcases his first contact with the enigmatic horrors of the BLACK DIAMOND conspiracy!

If you're a fan of Akira, Attack on Titan, Bio-Booster Armor Guyver or Tokyo Ghoul, XENOTYPE is going to blow your mind!  Don't Miss Out!

Featuring the art of multi-award winning mangaka, Odysseas Theodoratos!

If you've found your interest in mainstream comic books waning as traditional storytelling is undermined by social agendas that pay no reverence or respect to decades of world building and character development -- if you long for a return to high-octane action with heart -- this is the series you've been waiting for!






GOLD OR SILVER

Below are examples of the Gold Version (Color) and Silver Version (Black and White). The final pages on the Silver Edition will be adjusted to read like a traditional manga.

 * ART AND COLORS NOT FINAL

BONUS CONTENT

XENOTYPE: "YOU MATTER!" POSTER WITH GOLD/SILVER PLUS!

XENODEVIL VARIANT COVER AVAILABLE NOW!

THE TEAM

  • Liam Gray is an Australian author, former Ghost Writer, Crypto Journalist and founder of Conquest Comics. A classically trained comic book writer, Liam utilises traditional storytelling techniques passed down a line of succession leading back  to Stan “the man” Lee. 

  • Odysseas Theodoratos is a multi-award winning mangaka of Subject Zero (2nd Weekly Shonen Magazine & MediBang World Manga Contest) and UPIR (Kyoto International Manga Contest).

  • Jon Jay (aka spartanscotsmn) is a comic/graphic artist who has been pencilling, inking, and coloring for the last 25 years. He has been a background inker for some big name pros in the industry as well as producing his own art along the way.

STRETCH GOALS

As more people buy into XENOTYPE we will be sharing that success with our faithful backers by radically improving the product and throwing in extra rewards. Our immediate production goals are as follows, help us exceed them!

OUR GOALS

The goal of CONQUEST COMICS is to provide world-class comic books and manga for fans while uplifting other creators. Our ultimate dream for XENOTYPE is to achieve an Anime Adaption by Madhouse Entertainment. I hope we can count on you to help us make that a reality!

story:
Welcome to Chapter 3: Nocturnal Moon, a continuing adventure in the Demon Hunter Raven series! 

Raven, now joined by Hiro and Violet of the Nevi’im clan has been hunting in the twin cities of Minneapolis - St. Paul, struggling to keep a tight lid on demon activity. But a series of mysterious kidnappings and brutal murders grabs our hero's attention. Working from the shadows, the diabolical Coven is emerging to the forefront as they prepare to release the dreaded “Nocturnal Moon” upon the city. Raven and Violet will be put to the test as they must both learn to work and trust each other in time to stop the Coven from unleashing chaos and disaster across the city.

 

As the kidnappings increase and the bodies pile up, Detective Vail is called onto the case to investigate. She soon realizes that not everything is as it seems. As she dives deeper into each murder, drawing her ever deeper into the darker corners of the twin cities, will she find her answers or become another victim?

 

Will Raven and Violet be able to stop the Coven from unleashing the Nocturnal Moon? Or will the city fall into darkness? Find out in this soft cover 68-page action-packed trade paperback!

New to Demon Hunter Raven?

Missed previous chapters? You can get caught up with the catch up bundle! 

The Twin Cities of Minneapolis–Saint Paul are plagued by deadly demon cults, bloodthirsty vampires, and angry ghouls; luckily, a special team arises to eradicate them. Enter the Demon Hunters, a special unit of the church tasked with protecting the city from threats of darkness.

Love Demon Hunter Raven and want dive deeper into the Demon Hunter Universe? Then jump in with three great side stories included in the deluxe edition. You'll get 32- pages of extra behind the scenes and historical background content!

History of the Demon Hunters

Join us as we dive deeper into Demon Hunter lore and legend, starting with "History of the Demon Hunters". Join us as we look back at the founders and formation of The Order, and discover the very first Crusader as he fights to extend and defend the Order. Then journey to 1776 where the colonial Raven and teammates battle to defend the relics in the midst of the Revolutionary War.

SUN-CHILD

 Illustrated by Bill Jersey and colored by Ichthy5

Created by the upcoming comic writer Paul Tucker, go on this 6-page journey of a mysterious hunter and his path to becoming a feared Demon Hunter.

 

Destiny beckons him into the shadows. His past follows wherever his work takes him. Sun-Child has the potential to be a great warrior for the Demon Hunters, but doing what is right will only guarantee a brutal, bloody end for himself and the only family he has left.

Go back and re-watch the live stream of this piece being colored by Ichty5!

Mr. GHOST

Created by the outstanding Lucas A Ferrara, dive deep into this dark noir story of a hunter on the chase of a powerful political cult that has it's hands in everything. Will he survive or be cast to the depths of the sea like all those that have challenged them?

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Choose between the standard or the deluxe edition.

  •  Standard is 68-pages containing only Chapter 3: Nocturnal Moon in softcover format. Cover by Robert Nix.
  •  Deluxe is 100-pages with Chapter 3: Nocturnal Moon along with "Sun-Child", "Mr. Ghost" and "History of the Demon Hunters", in softcover format. Cover by Steven Cummings. 

Missed out on previous chapters? No problem, we have you covered in this collected softcover! Containing all previous chapters.

The Catch up Bundle

Chapter's 0, 1 and 2

In case you missed out on the previous books, no worries. In this collection you can catch up and read about the breakout hit of 2020. Collecting all the previous chapters of Demon Hunter Raven and adds two brand new stories in this soft cover format, over 100 pages of content!

Collecting

  • Chapter 0: First Night 
  • Chapter 1: Nevermore 
  • Chapter 1: Knights and Demons (NEW  BONUS STORY!) 
  • Chapter 2: Sustain the (un)Truth 
  • Chapter 2: This Despair (NEW BONUS STORY!) 

2 brand new stories.

  •  Knights and Demons: In a new story by Mathew D. Rhys, Raven is sent out to patrol the darkened nights of Minneapolis. There in the shadows he finds a girl, meets a ghost, and is hunted by the very demons he himself is seeking to hunt--all the while trying to bust up a slave ring.
  •  This Despair: following after the events of Chapter 2: Sustain the (un)Truth, this story details what happens when Adam's school is infested by demons! Can he keep his cover or will he blow it all? 

 

Patreon Bonus Reward!

Are you a backer and a Patron?

Receive an extra print that's exclusive only to Backers and Patrons as a thank you for supporting Demon Hunter Raven.

If you're not, then please consider becoming a patron here!

 

Once you back, send me a message with your info so I can put you down for a print or else I might miss you!

story:
Athena is the descendant of the goddess with the same name.  Combined with college student Erin, they fight gods, monsters, ninjas and more!

The story continues from Patriotika 2, Patriotika is up against the gravity controlling super villain Zero G and her empowered army of ninjas!

Zero G's blades cut through Athena's skin! What else does she have in store for Patriotika?

 

Zero G finds out that mocking Patriotika is a big mistake! And Patriotika heals fast!

Just when Patriotika thinks she has this battle won, Zero G stops playing around! And the Sun God Twins have a big surprise for her too! Patriotika could use a friend, or maybe a really big friend such as Collateral Dee? 

Patriotika 3 is a 24 page comic with superhero action, peril and  adventure. The story is written by Ron Zabala, the pages are by Mount Olympus Comics artist Danusko Campos. The comic is fully  illustrated, but I need your help to get it printed, get it noticed, and  get the next trilogy started! And there's variant covers plus cool swag you  can pick up depending on how much you pledge! Please consider sharing our campaign on social media too!

 

Rewards/Perks

 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

This is our fifth campaign, and while things do come up, we will do everything we can to get these books out to you with regular updates.

story:
New Stretch goal item!

Once we reach $13.000 in fundings, every shipment will contain a cardboard Perfect 10 stand!

We've now added A BRAND NEW ART BOOK to every physical perk, completely FREE!

The sequel YOU demanded is finally here!


With cover art by interior artists Pow Rodrix and Daniel Rodrigues!

Perfect 10 #2 is a 28-page full-color action adventure superhero comic book with additional pinups.
Perfect 10 #1 is also available during this campaign, combining for a total of 52 story pages!

Our ladies Perfect 10 and American Bliss meet up in the above EXCLUSIVE mini-poster by Clayton Barton and Federico Sioc. This print is ONLY available during this campaign.


Perfect 10 tells the story of an artificial assassin named Ten, who finds herself hunted by superpowered murderers. Burdened with guilt over a past she can't remember, Ten decides to fight instead of hide, throwing herself into a battle she can't possible survive. Or can she? 

Ten jumps into battle!

Creative team:

Just like issue 1, Perfect 10 issue 2 is written by its creator Dave Brink (Earthling, Dreamgirl Sleeper Agent), drawn and inked by Pow Rodrix (Wolverine, Justice League of America), and colored by Daniel Rodrigues (Earthling: Indie Wars).
And we welcome to our team letterer extraordinaire Joel Saavedra (Yi Soon Shin, Lovecraft P.I., Berserkers).


Introducing more heroes!

Issue 2 will also have a pinup section, featuring work from various artistic talents!


Fan art by Erik Hodson


 

What's this?! A second new book?!

 

Yes indeed! We're excited to share with you that we've also been working on another new book! This is an anthology book called Powertrip, collecting three shorter stories from the Genuine universe. We decided to not make an extra campaign for this book, but to present it alongside Perfect 10 issue 2! This means you can get TWO new comic books in one campaign!



Powertrip collects three new short comics with a total of 25 story pages! This book also comes with the exclusive Clayton Barton mini-poster!
The first two stories of Powertrip #1 (Auxilium and Mandevil) are completely finished. The third story (American Bliss) is currently being drawn by POW RODRIX and will be finished during this campaign.


The first appearance of American Bliss, by Perfect 10 artist Pow Rodrix!
 

STRETCH GOALS:



 

Partnership with Michael Oden's The Embrace!

We are excited to announce our partnership with Michael Oden, creator of the new dark superhero title The Embrace, which is also now on Indiegogo! By backing BOTH of these projects, you will receive a FREE crossover pinup of The Embrace and Perfect 10 drawn by Only Death Can Save Us creator, Russ Leach!
(This deal ends May 2 2021 and is inactive during the InDemand stage of the campaign!)

New Stretch goal item!

Once we reach $13.000 in fundings, every shipment will contain a cardboard Perfect 10 stand!

We've now added A BRAND NEW ART BOOK to every physical perk, completely FREE!

story:
True power lies hidden within...

"When a simple teenage boy is bullied at school he unknowingly sets off a genetic trigger alerting the Agents Nexus, the people who created him. Now a danger to everyone around him, he’s about to discover how deep this rabbit hole goes into a world of secrets and shadows."

*mock up of print version, not final version.*

Comic books were always a form of escapism for me growing up, being whisked away to new worlds of adventure, excitement, mystery and action!  Now after spending over a decade working in film and media, I’m working hard to bring back that same excitement that got me into reading with my first graphic novel series, BLACK PROJECT.

***Final cover art by Hugh Fleming***

BLACK PROJECT CHAPTER 1: MECHANISM OF CHANGE is a cinematic graphic novel series that takes you deep into the shadows of conspiracy! Opening the door to a new world where conspiracy theories are true: UFO's, Men in Black, Genetic Experiments and Secret Government Programs all exist as fact under a protected entity known as THE NEXUS.

THE STORY

YEARS AGO a clandestine group, known as THE NEXUS, was on the verge of harnessing the perfect weapon in the form of a small child - until an explosion rocked the facility destroying everything. It was believed that all was lost in the fire, but they were wrong…

Sixteen years later we meet Jack, a simple high school student who one day while being bullied, unknowingly sets off a genetic trigger alerting a strike team of mysterious men in black, Agents of NEXUS, who aim to capture him at any cost! What follows is the harrowing journey Jack must reluctantly take to save not only his own life, but to discover what ‘The Nexus’ is and who is behind this BLACK PROJECT. His only path is to go deeper down the rabbit hole, even if it kills him!

          

BLACK PROJECT is inspired by classic story lines from shows like 'Unsolved Mysteries', 'The X-Files', and 'Sightings', classic 80's films like 'Starman', 'The Terminator, 'Flight Of The Navigator', then weaving them all  together into a tale that follows the classic hero’s journey like  'Star Wars', 'The Matrix', and 'Harry Potter'. 

Created by Film & TV Storyboard artist Bulent Hasan, and co-written by Filmmaker Josh Whittall, they challenge you to experience your first step into a secret world of shadows...

We have so many stories to tell in this universe and we invite you to join us on the ride!

GOALS

Our goals are simple; getting BLACK PROJECT #1 into your hands and in your collection. The more you support Black Project and Crazy Pencil Comics, the more you'll get! With so much work  already completed it's easy to say that our risks are low, but by contributing to this campaign you don’t only get an exciting series with amazing covers, you help pay the artists and writers to continue to make great books!  We love working with cover artist Hugh Fleming and want him, and others, involved with creating not just more covers for future installments, but other stories as well. You can help by showing your excitement here on this campaign!

 

This Campaign and will be the only way to get THIS specific version of this book, in print or digital, thru Indiegogo. We have previously made our books available digitally first on may popular e-book formats, such as Kindle, Comixology, Line Webtoons and SpinWhiz Comics. We've updated those editions recently for a very low cost. Those editions feature only cover art by creator Bulent Hasan and a special making of section as well, but will not be included here. We are extremely excited about this special print edition with the fantastic new cover by Star Wars artist Hugh Fleming, and know you will too!

**Our "Close Encounters Of The Third Kind" Poster by creator Bulent Hasan**

CHAPTER 1 BOOK DETAILS

  1. Chapter 1 comes in at 70+ pages!
  2. Includes "Making Of" section.
  3. Special "Making Of" for Hugh Fleming's covers (from rough pencils to finished cover).
  4. High quality printing on cover and interior pages.
  5. Begins a 'binge worthy' series much like Netflix's "Stranger Things" and "X-Files" story lines.

SERIES ROAD MAP

Black Project is a 6 Chapter graphic novel series, with the first 3 completed! 

  1. BLACK PROJECT Chapters 1: Mechanism of Change, Chapter 2: Natural Selection & Chapter 3: Genetic Drift are completed, written, lettered and packaged!
  2. Chapter 4: Synthetic Nexus, written is currently in production line art is completed and being painted now, lettering is next, and coming in at 100+ pages!
  3. BLACK PROJECT Chapter 5 (untitled) and Chapter 6 (untitled) stories have been written and on scripting stages.
  4. Short stories like "IT AWAKENS" by Josh Whittall & Bulent Hasan are completed, with "Open Lines" by Bulent Hasan written (art in production) and will be added to future chapters 
  5. Each chapter is 60+ pages that includes cover galleries and a “making of” section.
  6. THIS IS THE ONLY way to have this book with Hugh Fleming's cover art in PRINT and PDF through INDIEGOGO!

With three chapters completed, we have more stories to include in future installments that expand on the world of BLACK PROJECT and we find out exactly how UFO’s, alien abductions, secret government programs, genetic experimentation, ancient aliens, and men in black, all tie in together to make one cohesive universe, showing exactly how far of a reach the Nexus truly has.

We have taken almost 5 years to truly develop, create, and launch this series because we care about producing the best series, the best book, the best experience, in comics today!

COMING SOON IN PRINT

JACK AND HIS DAD ARE ON THE RUN FROM THE NEXUS, AND SECRETS ARE REVEALED!

JACK DECIDES ITS TIME TO TAKE A STAND, EVEN IF COSTS HIM HIS LIFE!

NEAR COMPLETION! THE ONLY WAY TO DEFEAT YOUR ENEMY...IS TO BECOME THEM!

**art by Massimo Moda, later to be released as a print and/or trading card**

ABOUT US

CRAZY PENCIL COMICS is a Vancouver, BC based comic book company,  creating unique and cinematic experiences in the form of graphic novels.

Founded by Bulent Hasan when he started creating "BLACK PROJECT" in 2014, he brought in his friend and fellow filmmaker, Josh Whittall, in for dialogue writing. Both have a long history in the film industry here in Vancouver as writers, directors, and storyboard artists on multiple features, television series and video games. But they're more than that; they are also life long comic book fans.

Now they apply that unique perspective to their books,  cinematic in style, original in concept, binge worthy of a Netflix series, but tell them in a graphic novel format. Their work shows how much they care about immersing you in a new world with a great story! 

At Crazy Pencil Comics we don’t just create stories for you to read, we create experiences that you escape to!

BULENT HASAN (LEFT, creator/ writer/ artist/publisher ) is a professional storyboard artist from Vancouver, BC. For the last decade he has worked on over five dozen projects ranging from TV,  advertising, feature films and video game cinematic sequences. His last few major projects were “Noelle" & "Flora & Ulysses" both for Disney+, “Legion” for Fox, “Legends Of Tomorrow” for The CW, and "Project Blue Book" for History Channel, and also is an instructor of Storyboarding at CG Masters School of Animation. A comics fanatic since childhood, Black Project is his first of many comic series.

JOSH WHITTALL ( RIGHT, dialogue writer & story editor) has an extensive history in film as a 2nd Assistant Director, writer, director, producer and editor. His first independent film "The Gutter Diaries" went on to win awards at the New York Film Festival as well as various international film festivals.  He is a fellow comic book creator whose own book, FATE, is currently available on Comixology and explores Government Conspiracies, alien abduction, and mystery, and is currently writing his novel that dives into mystery, robotics, and music.

HUGH FLEMING (cover artist) is an Australian artist who produced cover art for a number of Dark Horse Comics' Star Wars & Indiana Jones series. He’s also credited for painting the first double bladed lightsaber for Star Wars as well as the artist who created the popular “Star Wars Rock Band” poster. He currently lives in Melbourne, Australia with his family creating amazing art for multiple projects and films.

STRETCH GOALS

  • $1,000 (CAD) Funded! 
  • $2000 (CAD) We release a new reward that lets us print some more posters and trading cards with all new art!!!
  • $3000; We hire  back Hugh Fleming to complete the covers for chapter 2 & 3 and will offer those as a reward as well!
  • $4500; We hire back Hugh Fleming to complete a cover for chapter 4 as well as ADDING THE SHORT STORY ‘OPEN LINES”. Get the book w/short story (now over 120 pages) and this short story will ONLY be available in this print edition. 
  • MORE STRETCH GOALS ANNOUNCEMENTS TO BE MADE LATER! STAY TUNED!

These stretch goals are only achievable with your support & excitement as we work hard to expand the Black Project Universe!

 **Preview; double page spread from Chapter 3: Genetic Drift" by Bulent Hasan**

Other Ways You Can Help

Share our campaign on as many social media platforms and tag your friends! Sign up for our newsletter on http://crazypencilcomics.com/#subscribe and sign up! Visit and support us on Patreon (www.patreon.com/crazypencilcomics ) and get involved! We truly believe we have a solid product and series to expand upon, want to get it into as many hands as possible. People who love comics need to see first-hand that they don't have to settle for mediocrity and the "same old same old" and go with something original!

Looking for more information? Check the project FAQ or contact us directly if you don't find your answer there.

story:
Thank you for checking out the Halloween Man: "Valentine's Day that Time Forgot" Indiegogo.

 

Halloween Man is the weird adventures of an undead superhero and his sexy mad scientist girlfriend. Throughout its nineteen year history, Halloween Man Comics has strived to bring you the best artistic talent indie comics can offer.

This special two-part Halloween Man tale is a story of love, Elvis, and dinosaurs! Fusing elements from classic science-fiction like Sir Arthur Conan Doyle's The Lost World, and Edgar Rice Burroughs' Caspak trilogy with modern cryptozoology, and other esoteric sciences, we've created an all-new pulp mythology, ripe for exploration!  

When Solomon and Lucy's date night is interrupted by a caveman fleeing ravenous vampires, indie comics' favorite couple are bestowed on a quest involving both Lucy's family tree and planet Earth's prehistory as they enter a legendary plateau filled with giant monsters! 

If quirky comics are your cup of T-Rex, here is your chance to show your support for this offbeat Texas original.  Your donations will help finance our creative team’s production costs, as well as the printing and promotions. Help us roar like a Mesozoic monster and prove that indie comics can take on the big two. 

 

Don't Let Indie Comics Go Extinct: 

 

 

A word from writer/creator, Drew Edwards. . .

“While Halloween Man has been around a long time, it's always been a tough road for what is essentially a labor of love for myself and everyone else who’s been involved over the years. As a small press comic, it's easy to get lost in the sea of mainstream media.  Your funds will not only help us have the biggest impact possible, but will also help our creative team get a leg up in a tough industry. I've always thought of Halloween Man Comics as a place for talent to build their resume and take the risks that help them grow and mature as artists. This is your chance to help the talent local to Texas to hit the international stage in as big a way as possible.

 

 

 

Unleashing the Beasts:

 

 

Our tale is an epic, two-part adventure of romance, rock 'n' roll, vampires, and of course, dinosaurs!

 

Estimated Release Date for Part 1: Feb 12th for Comixology and PDF.

Estimated Release Date for Part 2: April 8th for Comixology and PDF.

 

Collected edition will be released on completion of crowdfunding campaign.

 

 

 

 

Can we do it? You bet Jurassican: 

 


 

No comic is made without an awesome creative team, and here’s ours!

Drew Edwards, Writer/Creator

 Award-winning comic book writer, horror film historian, music journalist, rock promoter, and showman extraordinaire; these are all guises of the creative force known as Drew Edwards. Best known as the writer and creator of the long-running underground comic book series, Halloween Man, thousands tune in each week to hear him as a cast member of the horror movie podcast, Castle of Horror. Known as “Howlin’” Drew Edwards to many musicians, he’s helped bridge the horror and comic culture with Austin’s legendary music scene with Halloween Man Productions annual “Punk vs. Rockabilly” showcase during SXSW, now in its tenth year, and as a contributing writer for Rockabilly Online. Drew currently lives in Austin, Texas with his wife, musician/activist, Jamie Bahr and their fierce lionhead rabbit, Janis Hoplin.

 

JTA, Cover Artist

JTA's diverse work has been featured in a variety of media, including the children's book, One Day Luisito, the teen movie comedy, Ned Venture, the board game, Super PACS! The Game of Politics About the Game of Politics, and the music video/printed comic book, You Ain’t. Most recently, JTA succeeded in a Kickstarter campaign for his first fully colored art book, Aw, Hell! A Demon Art Book. JTA loves monsters, pinups and most foods (the variety of food options being one of the many reasons he loves Austin). JTA is a nerdy artist type, but likes to believe he also has some class. To that extent, he owns a pair of socks with a gentleman cat print and wears them. . . a lot." 

 

Jason Wilson, Artist/ Inker/Colorist 

Jason Wilson is an Austin, Texas based graphic designer, comic book artist, and special effects wizard!  

April Guadiana, Art Director, Colorist/Letterer/Design

Based in Dallas, Texas, April is a cover artist for Now Books and the art director for Halloween Man Comics. Previous credits include the Save Bomb Girls Campaign,  Steampunk Originals Vol. 1, and  Night of the Living Dead: Reanimated. She resides in Dallas, Texas along with her adorable orange tabby, Kitkat.

  

Jamie Bahr, Editor/Cosplay model

Lead Singer, slap bassist and bandleader for the Riot Grrrl Rockabilly and Soul band, Danger*Cakes, upright bassist for Queergrass/Americana band, Brand New Key, and Executive Director of the non-profit organization, Girls Rock Austin, Renaissance woman, Jamie Bahr was born and raised in Kingston, New York but made Austin, TX her home in 2009. Jamie started the independent music and comics publisher, Sugar Skull Media in 2015, producing Danger*Cakes' albums and the zany horror adventure comic series, Halloween Man with her husband, writer and film-critic, Drew Edwards, with whom she frequents as a cast member on the long-running "Castle of Horror" Podcast. When she's not busy rocking out or empowering girls, trans and non-binary youth through music, she enjoys whimsical adventures with Drew, baking decadent birthday cakes for friends and playing with her lionhead rabbit, Janis Hoplin.




 

Jme LaCombe, Photographer

Dark retro portraiture, pin-up, and rock 'n' roll photographer, Jme LaCombe has an eye for the eccentric and has been capturing stunning shots of Austinites since 2010. You can check out her work at heavyglow.co.

 

Joey Muerto, Videographer

Artist, musician and filmmaker, Joey Muerto is a fixture of the Austin music scene. When he’s not shredding the guitar in his horror-surf band, Bat City Surfers, he co-owns and operates the record label, Bat-Tone Records.

 

 

 

Your fandom is the pathway to a Lost World: 

 

We do this because we love it and we want to make the best comic possible for our fans.  Each backer helps us create the next great adventure for Halloween Man and Lucy.  So, become a part of comic book history today!  

Short on cash to help fund the book? There are other ways you can help! We’d truly appreciate it if you shared our Indiegogo page to your social media. Know someone who’s into indie comics?  Please send them a link to our Indiegogo campaign. Do you run a comic book store or website, or genre related fansite? Blog about it and share your passion for indie comics with the world!

Make no mistake, off-beat comics have to fight, fight, FIGHT for their place in the increasingly competitive comic book market of the 21st Century!  We know as fans, you have lots of other places your hard-earned dollars could go. But if you like seeing strange and unusual comics with an off-kilter world view, please help us achieve four color GLORY!   

Backers, loyalty such as yours will not go unrewarded! Amazing prizes await our donors! Get your hands on original production artwork, sketch covers, and even a COMPLETE Halloween Man library!  All this and more can be YOURS for just a few bones.
story_txt:
Thank you for checking out the Halloween Man: "Valentine's Day that Time Forgot" Indiegogo.
 
Halloween Man is the weird adventures of an undead superhero and his sexy mad scientist girlfriend. Throughout its nineteen year history, Halloween Man Comics has strived to bring you the best artistic talent indie comics can offer.
This special two-part Halloween Man tale is a story of love, Elvis, and dinosaurs! Fusing elements from classic science-fiction like Sir Arthur Conan Doyle's The Lost World, and Edgar Rice Burroughs' Caspak trilogy with modern cryptozoology, and other esoteric sciences, we've created an all-new pulp mythology, ripe for exploration!  
When Solomon and Lucy's date night is interrupted by a caveman fleeing ravenous vampires, indie comics' favorite couple are bestowed on a quest involving both Lucy's family tree and planet Earth's prehistory as they enter a legendary plateau filled with giant monsters! 
If quirky comics are your cup of T-Rex, here is your chance to show your support for this offbeat Texas original.  Your donations will help finance our creative team’s production costs, as well as the printing and promotions. Help us roar like a Mesozoic monster and prove that indie comics can take on the big two. 
 
Don't Let Indie Comics Go Extinct: 
 

 
A word from writer/creator, Drew Edwards. . .
“While Halloween Man has been around a long time, it's always been a tough road for what is essentially a labor of love for myself and everyone else who’s been involved over the years. As a small press comic, it's easy to get lost in the sea of mainstream media.  Your funds will not only help us have the biggest impact possible, but will also help our creative team get a leg up in a tough industry. I've always thought of Halloween Man Comics as a place for talent to build their resume and take the risks that help them grow and mature as artists. This is your chance to help the talent local to Texas to hit the international stage in as big a way as possible.
 
 
 
Unleashing the Beasts:
 

 
Our tale is an epic, two-part adventure of romance, rock 'n' roll, vampires, and of course, dinosaurs! Estimated Release Date for Part 1: Feb 12th for Comixology and PDF.
Estimated Release Date for Part 2: April 8th for Comixology and PDF. Collected edition will be released on completion of crowdfunding campaign.
 
 
 
 
Can we do it? You bet Jurassican: 
 

 
No comic is made without an awesome creative team, and here’s ours!
Drew Edwards, Writer/Creator
 Award-winning comic book writer, horror film historian, music journalist, rock promoter, and showman extraordinaire; these are all guises of the creative force known as Drew Edwards. Best known as the writer and creator of the long-running underground comic book series, Halloween Man, thousands tune in each week to hear him as a cast member of the horror movie podcast, Castle of Horror. Known as “Howlin’” Drew Edwards to many musicians, he’s helped bridge the horror and comic culture with Austin’s legendary music scene with Halloween Man Productions annual “Punk vs. Rockabilly” showcase during SXSW, now in its tenth year, and as a contributing writer for Rockabilly Online. Drew currently lives in Austin, Texas with his wife, musician/activist, Jamie Bahr and their fierce lionhead rabbit, Janis Hoplin. JTA, Cover Artist
JTA's diverse work has been featured in a variety of media, including the children's book, One Day Luisito, the teen movie comedy, Ned Venture, the board game, Super PACS! The Game of Politics About the Game of Politics, and the music video/printed comic book, You Ain’t. Most recently, JTA succeeded in a Kickstarter campaign for his first fully colored art book, Aw, Hell! A Demon Art Book. JTA loves monsters, pinups and most foods (the variety of food options being one of the many reasons he loves Austin). JTA is a nerdy artist type, but likes to believe he also has some class. To that extent, he owns a pair of socks with a gentleman cat print and wears them. . . a lot."  Jason Wilson, Artist/ Inker/Colorist 
Jason Wilson is an Austin, Texas based graphic designer, comic book artist, and special effects wizard!  
April Guadiana, Art Director, Colorist/Letterer/Design
Based in Dallas, Texas, April is a cover artist for Now Books and the art director for Halloween Man Comics. Previous credits include the Save Bomb Girls Campaign,  Steampunk Originals Vol. 1, and  Night of the Living Dead: Reanimated. She resides in Dallas, Texas along with her adorable orange tabby, Kitkat.
  
Jamie Bahr, Editor/Cosplay model
Lead Singer, slap bassist and bandleader for the Riot Grrrl Rockabilly and Soul band, Danger*Cakes, upright bassist for Queergrass/Americana band, Brand New Key, and Executive Director of the non-profit organization, Girls Rock Austin, Renaissance woman, Jamie Bahr was born and raised in Kingston, New York but made Austin, TX her home in 2009. Jamie started the independent music and comics publisher, Sugar Skull Media in 2015, producing Danger*Cakes' albums and the zany horror adventure comic series, Halloween Man with her husband, writer and film-critic, Drew Edwards, with whom she frequents as a cast member on the long-running "Castle of Horror" Podcast. When she's not busy rocking out or empowering girls, trans and non-binary youth through music, she enjoys whimsical adventures with Drew, baking decadent birthday cakes for friends and playing with her lionhead rabbit, Janis Hoplin.
 Jme LaCombe, Photographer
Dark retro portraiture, pin-up, and rock 'n' roll photographer, Jme LaCombe has an eye for the eccentric and has been capturing stunning shots of Austinites since 2010. You can check out her work at heavyglow.co. Joey Muerto, Videographer
Artist, musician and filmmaker, Joey Muerto is a fixture of the Austin music scene. When he’s not shredding the guitar in his horror-surf band, Bat City Surfers, he co-owns and operates the record label, Bat-Tone Records.
 
 
 
Your fandom is the pathway to a Lost World: 

 
We do this because we love it and we want to make the best comic possible for our fans.  Each backer helps us create the next great adventure for Halloween Man and Lucy.  So, become a part of comic book history today!  
Short on cash to help fund the book? There are other ways you can help! We’d truly appreciate it if you shared our Indiegogo page to your social media. Know someone who’s into indie comics?  Please send them a link to our Indiegogo campaign. Do you run a comic book store or website, or genre related fansite? Blog about it and share your passion for indie comics with the world!
Make no mistake, off-beat comics have to fight, fight, FIGHT for their place in the increasingly competitive comic book market of the 21st Century!  We know as fans, you have lots of other places your hard-earned dollars could go. But if you like seeing strange and unusual comics with an off-kilter world view, please help us achieve four color GLORY!   
Backers, loyalty such as yours will not go unrewarded! Amazing prizes await our donors! Get your hands on original production artwork, sketch covers, and even a COMPLETE Halloween Man library!  All this and more can be YOURS for just a few bones.

story:
FOUR CHAMBERS OF FRIGHT is an “Elvira” inspired horror anthology with a sinister twist!

From the writer/creator of "Witch Creek Road" and the artist/creator of "Monsterella", "Four Chambers Of Fright" features four heart-stopping tales of terror delivered by the sensationally sadistic, "Dizzy".

Nevin Arnold ("Monsterella", "Calavera The Undead") and Garth Matthams ("Witch Creek Road", "The Living Finger"), both monstrously huge fans of the classic horror comics and magazines of the 60s and 70s, have joined forces to create a sinister spin on the classic "horror host" narrated creepy comics of yesteryear.

In the tradition of the horror host, Dizzy spins multiple tales of terror, but unlike the many masters of the macabre that came before her, Dizzy tends to be a little more...involved in her work!

This all-killer-no-filler 24-page first issue features stunning cover art by Sun Khamunaki ("Lady Death", "Monsterella"), pin-up art by Pablo Verdugo ("Mr. Beaver"), and four shocking tales written by Garth Matthams and illustrated by Nevin Arnold and Rodrigo Trindade! 

THE CREATIVE TEAM

Garth Matthams (writer) had his first comic, The Living Finger, published through Darby Pop in 2016. His current project, Witch Creek Road, is a Featured comic on Webtoons, where it is available to read for free. You can follow Garth on Instagram.

Nevin Arnold (interior art) has worked on Honor of the Damned for Americanime Productions, Ghost-Woman (for Cloudscape Comics’ Joe Shuster Gene Day award-winning “Epic Canadiana” #2), and his creator-owned comics Calavera the Undead and Monsterella for Hangman Comics. You can find him on Facebook and Instagram. 

Rodrigo Trindade (interior art) has illustrated pages for Cybernetic Shylock for Vanbreed Studios, designed the character "Kandake", for Obsolete Studios, worked as an illustrator for Kingstone Comics, and is an on-going artist for the up-and-coming Monsterella MEGAzine for Hangman Comics. You can follow his work on Facebook.

Sun Khamunaki (cover artist) is best known for her amazing covers, and has worked with companies such as Coffin Comics (Lady Death, Zack the Zombie Exterminator and La Muerta) and Zenescope Comics (Grimm Fairy Tales, and various upcoming projects). You can follow Sun's work at sunkhamunaki.com, Instagram and Facebook.

Pablo Verdugo (pin-up) is an artist/creator whose previous work has included artistic duties on Winter City, along with providing pencils for Harris Comics' Vampirella Quarterly No. 0 and 1. He recently published his creator-owned comic, Mr. Beaver, through Action Lab Studios. His current project is Cat Knight, which you can read on Webtoons. Follow his work on Instagram.

 

 

ORIGIN STORIES

Though this comic was heavily inspired by horror publications like Eerie, Tales from the Crypt, and Elvira, it has a much more obscure origin: Winnie the Witch - the blue-skinned, mini-skirt-wearing, bespectacled host of Charlton Comics' "Ghost Manor".

Winnie the Witch, like other horror hosts, used humour and bad puns to introduce her stories. But she also spoke using every "hip" term that I imagine was available at the time. It was reminiscent of an older person doing his or her best to connect with their much younger audience, and it was AWESOME. It was like watching your grandmother trying to breakdance.

And one day I joked with Nevin that, "If I had my way, I'd make a 70s-inspired horror host named Dizzy the Disco Draculette, and she'd wear roller skates and make bad puns and speak like she was stuck in the 1970s." And, lucky for me, Nevin liked the idea - and Dizzy was born.

Thanks for checking out this project, and if you decide to back it, we hope you enjoy it as much as we enjoyed making it!

-Garth Matthams, Writer

 

RISKS & CHALLENGES

As with anything, there's always risk, and always outside forces that are out of our control. A blizzard. A postal strike. Murder hornets. But "Four Chambers Of Fright" has already been successfully funded on Kickstarter and although this is our first venture on IndieGoGo, between us, we've successfully delivered on 6 Kickstarters so rest assured that we not only know what we're doing, we're also going to pull out all the stops to get these books into your hands.
